This was my first web/html5 game I made back in 2013. My high school multimedia teacher did not understand how or why I made this.

name: Super Mario: Shatters of A Soul
Super Kyoutei 2
summary: Super Kyoutei 2 is a Racing game, published by Nichibutsu, which was released in Japan in 1996.

name: Sukashika Shipanman DS
summary: A DS game based on the Sukashika Shipanman Movie.

name: Super Real Hanafuda: Koi Koi Shimasho
Surprise Stack
summary: Holidays themed physics puzzle game!

name: Suvarnabhumi Mahayuth
summary: A historical 16th century mainland Southeast Asia warfare mod.

name: Super Chicken Run - Chicken Farm Racing For kids
Subway Princess Runner
summary: Subway Princess Runner is an endless princess running game. Rush as fast as you can dodge the oncoming trains, save your loved beautiful princess, run in the beach subway with new runner, Adam. And more awesome characters and outfits, such as Swimsuit Lucy, Agent Kaka, Dracula, choose your favorite runner, what are you waiting for?

name: Superhero Wrestling Battle Arena Ring Fighting
Subway Surfers
summary: An arcade port of Subway Surfers.

name: Sunshower
summary: For the Itsy Bitsy Jam (Sep 2018)

name: Super Robolom
summary: 2D platformer with a side view, in which the main player needs to go through 10 levels to achieve your goal. The player will prevent a wide variety of enemies, weapons, traps

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Waterfalls Puzzles

summary: "Summons Sword: Pot Guardian" is a top-down, highly challenging action game. Teleport to dodge enemy attacks, fight with swords and summoning magic, and recover the treasure "Clay Pot of Darkness" stolen by the evil summoner!

name: Survivalcraft
summary:
You are marooned on the shores of an infinite blocky world. Explore, mine resources, craft tools and weapons, make traps and grow plants. Tailor clothes and hunt animals for food and resources. Build a shelter to survive cold nights and share your worlds online. Ride horses, camels or donkeys and herd cattle to protect them from predators. Blast your way through the rock with explosives. Build complex electric devices. Possibilities are infinite in this long-running sandbox survival and construction game series.

This is the thirtieth release of Survivalcraft, and it adds a new armor and weapons tier - copper! You can now paint stairs, slab, fences and signs and place electric gates on the floor or ceiling. Wander in dense forests full of tall spruces and fallen logs. Explore bigger caves, but watch out for huge magma chambers underground (15x bigger than 1.28). There are new sound generator sounds for you to use, including hi-fi drums! Check out full list of 70 changes at game webpage.

Survivalcraft brings features you love in the PC version of the most famous blocky game to your mobile device: infinite worlds, caves, logic elements (electricity), weather, boats, rideable animals, explosions, clothes, armor and many more. It does so while maintaining its own realistic, survival-themed style.

Enjoy!

name: Surface: Strings of Fate

name: Sudoku Touch

Designed for touch devices, it offers intuitive controls, multiple difficulty levels, and smart features like pencil mode, error checking, and dark mode. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned Sudoku master, Sudoku Touch provides a relaxing and brain-boosting experience.

You will experience the full danger of a global catastrophe in the first person.

In search of a new world between portals, you have to go through a difficult path consisting of deadly traps, ferocious dinosaurs and boiling lava.

Test your skills in time dilation zones, acceleration boosters and trampoline jumpings.

Billions of fans all over the world have been asking for more Subway Surfers games - now we are answering your call with Subway Surfers Blast. Solve fun puzzles, collect stars, decorate your hangout, and much more!
Hip, hop, bounce, and blast your way through the coolest game around!

Best Friends love eachother. Best Friends care about eachother, look out for one another. Best Friends never go anywhere without eachother.

Best Friends should never lie to one another. Best Friends should never fight with eachother, make eachother jealous. Best Friends love eachother.

That's what he thinks, anyway. He's your Best Friend. Nothing more or less.

A piece of interactive fiction written by Ivan Cockrum.

name: Super Blox
summary:
SuperBlox is a shareware tetris clone with all the expected mechanics. The main difference this game does is that it has dynamic playing field, meaning specific blocks will at random points in the game will shift up or down in order to add more difficulty or randomness.
Another element that is also added are the addition of bombs, which will be dropped rarely but will help out clear out blocks.

The registered version of this game included full sound and music support (pc speakers only for shareware), support for joystick and mouse, and more.

name: Sukebe Office

This season introduces Deathstroke as a playable character, alongside new melee weapons, Infamy sets, Notorious gear, and a fresh map called Elseworlds Mayhem. The season is divided into two episodes—Episode 7: Control and Episode 8: Balance—culminating in a battle against Brainiac.

name: Super Mad Champ

name: Submachine 7: The Core
summary: Ok, then. As far as I remember Murtaugh betrayed us at the end of Sub6. Now, here lies the question: do we follow him into the rabbit hole? Yes, yes we do. As we end up in the Core, the epicenter of the Submachine structure (or network as some people call it) – we’re discovering completely new world within. Things you have never seen before in submachines, story unfolding before your very eyes and locations you didn’t think were even possible to construct in our physics bound 3-dimentional world. Mindblowage ensues.

Compete for milestones and anomalies with several other AI colonies backed by rival sponsors attempting to become this planet’s superpower. Super Mario Galaxy is an enhanced port of the Wii game under the same name) released only in China for the Nvidia Shield console. It was part of a batch of Nintendo games released for the console in a collaboration of Nintendo and NVidia.

This port runs in 1080p at 60 frames per second, and had the gameplay adapted to work without the need of motion controls.

All of the Nintendo games released in this deal ran on special versions of the emulator Dolphin, which made possible all of the changes applied.

Super Knight World

"Super Knight World" is a thrilling retro adventure that transports players to a captivating pixelated realm filled with delightful enemies, charming objects, and scenic landscapes. Armed with your trusty sword, you embark on a quest to vanquish nefarious foes, amass riches, and achieve the highest score possible.
Drawing inspiration from classic 8-bit console games, "Super Knight World" offers an enchanting blend of challenging yet straightforward gameplay, promising an experience rich in nostalgic charm. Traverse through meticulously crafted levels reminiscent of beloved jump-and-run classics, immersing yourself in a world brimming with old-school appeal.

name: Super Heavy Sword

Make all the daily business decisions to achieve the most profit but remember to keep your staff members happy or you will see your goal slipping out of your fingers.

name: Super Mario Galaxy 2: Cosmic Clones Challenge

They plan to go in haunted tours and participate in the group and go to Kyoto with other 2 members. They visited 2 places, an Edo castle and Seimei Abe.

The game features 2 different stories that takes places in those 2 places and different game endings (most of them bad ones in wich the player character will die) depending of the player choices during the game.

This game features a Story Mode, expanded tileset sheets for level editing, new music packs and sounds, several crossovers, and quality-of-life additions to the game engine.

name: Succubuses Love Creampie

name: Super Doom TV

Every eyeball on every creature on every planet will be tuned to broadcast-compliant screens everywhere to see him plow through 25 sectors of high definition carnage. Super Doom TV is a 25 map megawad where each map was given an arena title from the SNES classic Super Smash T.V. as a prompt for mappers to work from. ﻿

name: Sub Commander

name: Supermarket Duck Dash

The tragic incident has brought you closer to your sisters, but your lives are uprooted again when vampires and humans start coming up dead. The same way your parents died.

name: Su-27 Flanker Mission Disk

The expansion updates the game to version 1.5, introducing refined enemy AI behavior in air combat scenarios and adds 150 new missions created with the game's mission editor. The base game provides detailed flight controls and aerodynamic modeling of the Su-27 Flanker, offering players a simulation focused on the rarely-featured Russian combat aircraft.

name: Surviving Mars: Starter Bundle
summary:
The Surviving Mars: Starter Bundle gives you everything you need to build a thriving Martian colony.

The Starter Pack Bundle Includes:
◾Surviving Mars
◾Surviving Mars: Deluxe Upgrade Pack
◾Surviving Mars: Green Planet
◾Surviving Mars: Mysteries Resupply pack
◾Surviving Mars: In-Dome Buildings Pack

name: Super Shoot Owl

name: Super Football Champ

name: Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3-e - Vexing Doors

A user can choose from a selection of crypto-themed karts and play any of the available maps. The current version of the game supports 10+ maps with more on the way.

name: Super Star Pro Wrestling
summary:
Super Star Pro Wrestling is a 1989 Japanese professional wrestling, or puroresu, game made by Nihon Bussan and published by Pony Canyon for the Nintendo Famicom system. Released December 9, 1989, the game features play for both one- and two-player modes. It was released a year later in the United States as WCW Wrestling on the Nintendo Entertainment System, with different wrestlers.

The game featured several puroresu legends of the era, including Giant Baba, Antonio Inoki, and Stan Hansen. There are some inaccuracies in the game, mainly with the birthdates of some of the wrestlers, and Big Van Vader's hometown and date of birth are not listed in order to protect his gimmick. The only two wrestlers to appear in both Super Star Pro Wrestling and WCW Wrestling are Road Warrior Hawk and Road Warrior Animal.

name: SuperLite 3in1: Arcade Game Shuu
summary:
Superlite 3 in 1 - Arcade Classic Syuu is a compilation of 3 arcade games released for the Playstation One console:
- Superlite 1500 Series - Qix 2000
- Space Chaser 2000 [Superlite 1500 Series]
- Crazy Balloon 2000 [Superlite 1500 Series]

QIX 2000:
Qix 2000 offers both a perfectly-translated version of the original and the insanely fun arrangement version, which updates the graphics (giving the Qix itself a Tempest X3-style psychedelic flair) and adds a few power-ups to the mix. The speed-up power-up makes even slow draw fast, and fast draw faster, but the speed-down power-up negates that effect - and heaven help you if you hit the latter while already operating at normal speed.

As with just about every Qix variation since the bizarre Super Qix, claiming space on the playing field also gradually reveals an animè-style picture of a girl; I'll never truly understand why the original Qix underwent this transformation from a game of pure geometrics to a game of revealing pictures, but hey, it really doesn't affect the game.

Letting Qix 2000 sit on its startup screen for a bit will eventually show you the original arcade attract mode in both graphics sets (with a few Kanji subtitles here and there - Qix is a rarity in that it originated from Taito's U.S. operation, and therefore it's always only had on-screen instructions in English).

The most important new features of the PlayStation version are the vibration function and the new arrangement mode.

SPACE CHASER:
Space Chaser was an arcade machine made by Taito in the year 1979 which is comprised of 3 boards. Space Chaser was a 2-Dimensional maze racing game. You control your rocket through the maze to pick up the dots while at the same time avoiding the rocket, or rockets, that are constantly trying to ram you. Successfully get through one maze and many more await you. This is good practice for freeway driving in the big city.

Space Chaser 2000 is a remake of the classic Taito arcade machine that features the Original mode with the arcade graphics and a new Arrangement mode with enhanced graphics, new backgrounds and vibration function.

CRAZY BALLOON 2000:
Crazy Balloon was first released in 1980 as an arcade machine by Taito. This is a game of strategy and skill! The object of Crazy Balloon is to guide a delicate swaying balloon through a maze of pin wheel obstacles.

The PlayStation version features the dual shock vibration function and 2 different game modes: The original game and an arrangement mode that features remastered graphics.

The player will try to get a balloon from one point to the end of a spike-walled maze, without popping it. The balloon constantly sways back and forth so you must be cautious. You cannot take all day because you are timed, as well. To make matters worse, in the later levels, you face moving spikes, Hurricane Man, who will try to blow you into a wall, and magnets that try to drag you into the wall.

Though it shares its name with the Super Rugby international rugby union, the latter was formed years after this game's release so the name is coincidental. It is also not to be confused with the 1994 Super Famicom game Super Rugby. The game uses a top-down perspective of the pitch with the two sides oriented vertically, and the player is able to assign points to various stats before playing a match to focus on certain areas of their playstyle. Options include a one-off "Training" exhibition match, a "League" game which pits the player against several CPU teams, and a "Vs." mode for two human players to compete.

name: SUGOI
summary: SUGOI (Shut Up and Get On It) is a collaborative level pack created as a community project led by TehRealSalt. It was inspired by DUMP, a similar project from the ZDoom community. The premise of SUGOI was to encourage community members to make a level in a limited timeframe, similar to the Official Level Design Contest but without the competitive aspects. Any community member could contribute, regardless of their mapping experience, and all submissions made in good faith were accepted, regardless of their quality. The mapping phase lasted from July 9th until August 9th, 2016. Afterwards, TehRealSalt compiled the results into a level pack, which was released on September 6th, 2016. The project was much more successful than originally anticipated, receiving 30 maps from 25 different contributors. Its success inspired two sequels, SUBARASHII and KIMOKAWAIII.

Navigate the flooded city streets by boat, scale the drowned buildings, and use your telescope to scour the city for the supplies needed to save your dying sibling. As you explore the city at your own pace, you encounter the habitat that flourishes in this colorful place and discover hidden objects that piece together the story of a broken world and a broken family.

name: Sutte Hakkun
summary:
This version was released for use with the Nintendo Power cartridge, and included all the levels designed by game creators (which wasn't possible to do with the 8MB Satellaview Memory Pak). It was afterwards released as a Super Famicom standard cartridge and also for the japanese Wii and Wii U Virtual Console.

Sutte Hakkun is a puzzle action game in the shape of a platformer. The playing character is an abundant-beaked bird resembling a penguin, named Hakkun, that is able to walk and jump but not to fly. The Rainbow of Happiness shined in the sky above Peaceful Islands: one day it broke apart and now Hakkun has to track down, collect, and put together all rainbow crystals to relive it. The gameplay hinges upon two elements: blocks and potions, the latter of several colours. Hakku makes its way through levels by changing the position of blocks — that will be done by swallowing them to release them on an other place then — and sucking potions — that are to be injected to blocks by the beak, endowing them with new properties consequential to the colour of the fluid — from jars. A level is cleared when the rainbow shards in it are collected. Neither a time limit nor enemy characters are there impeding Hakkun's way. Equally distinctive is the score system: a set number of points is given at the beginning of each level, and a decrease happens with any move made, thus rewarding the player for completing levels with as little moves as possible.

The disc was however cancelled for unknown reasons.

A prototype featuring the complete version of the game was dumped and released on the internet in July 2017.

You might succeed, but can you earn the gold ranking on every level?
Get ready to plant, till and water to your heart's content! The more cash you rake in, the quicker you'll be able to upgrade your equipment and turn your crops into the products consumers want! Sunshine Acres features a superb user interface, gorgeous visuals and finger-tapping gameplay that's been fine-tuned to perfection. Each time you fit through another wall without crashing, more cubes are added to your cluster. Head tracking is critical in the game - as your cluster of cubes gets bigger, you will need to lean around it to see the hole and quickly determine what rotations to make. Stay alive as long as possible, and add your high scores to the ranks of players around the world!

name: Superbike World Championship
summary:
Superbike World Championship is the first product after the Screamer saga that Milestone develops with Electronic Arts. 
 
The game emulates the real physics of all five championship bikes (Ducati, Honda, Kawasaki, Suzuki and Yamaha), carefully reproducing the rider, his movements both on the ground and on the bike, and the real tracks of the Superbike World Championship in all their details and different atmospheric conditions. 
Six game options and eight realism settings (braking, traction control, assisted ride, Championship rules, etc) contribute in giving to this title a simulative yet funny driving experience, immersing the player in the Superbike world. 
 
The available game modes are Arcade and Simulation. Both have their own characteristics and allow the game to be adapted to the target. Arcade mode allows to select the bike to race with, the rider - his name can even be changed - and whether to start a single race or a full Championship. All that needs to be done is win all the single GPs or get the first position by the end of the Championship. In order to win a Championship in Simulation the player must get the best out of his bike by changing all the parameters that the game offers. 
 
Superbike World Championship provides 12 circuits around the world including Monza, Laguna Seca and Brands Hatch. Various bikes from the 1997 season are available in arcade and simulation modes; from Ducati, Yamaha, Suzuki and Kawasaki, driven by aces such as Kocinski, Carl Fogarty, Scott Russell, Aaron Slight and Pierfrancesco Chili.

name: Super F1 Circus 3
summary:
Super F1 Circus 3 is a 1994 Formula One racing game and the third of Cream/Nichibutsu's F1 Circus games for the Super Famicom. It focuses on the 1993/94 season and recreates circuits from sixteen different countries. The game offers a "quick race" mode that randomly picks a track and avoids the majority of the simulation elements.

The game sits between Super F1 Circus 2 and Super F1 Circus Gaiden in the series. As with its predecessors, it has licenses from FOCA (the Formula One Constructors Association) and Fuji TV (the TV station that covers F1 in Japan) that allow it to depict actual teams/drivers from the Formula One World Championship. It was never released outside of Japan.

name: Super F1 Circus Limited
summary:
Super F1 Circus Limited is largely identical to Cream's earlier Super Famicom racing game Super F1 Circus, however it was shortly after the release of that game that Cream was given permission by FOCA (Formula One Constructors' Union, an association of car manufacturers for Formula One) to use actual driver and team names for their subsequent Super F1 Circus games. Super F1 Circus Limited was quickly created to take advantage of this recent development.

With the exception of the use of actual drivers/team names, there is no significant difference between this version of the game and the earlier Super F1 Circus. The series would see a proper sequel on the Super Nintendo, with enhanced graphics and additional features, with Super F1 Circus 2 in 1993.

summary: Superior is a roguelite co-op shooter where all the superheroes have turned into evil abominations. Every session you’ll start out unpowered and outgunned, as you hunt the evil superheroes, steal their powers to take on even tougher challenges.

name: Subterranauts
summary: Subterranauts is a 2-6 player multiplayer horror game with proximity voice chat and terrifying creatures. Your job is to complete assignments by gathering scrap for the Association of Scrap Allocation. Work together with your team to complete assignments, earn company Bucks, and survive!

name: Super Commander XL
summary: A pararealistic battle commander simulator based on pseudo-historical events

name: Super Dungeon Explore
summary: A video game adaptation of Ninja Division's popular board game.

name: Super Mario 64: Shindou Improvement
summary: This is a hack of the Super Mario 64 Shindou Pak Taiou, or Rumble Edition. Using the Super Mario 64 decomp, many improvements have been made, such as the addition of English text, a reimplemented BLJ and “So long-a. Bowser!” sound clip, a fixed smoke texture, and tweaks to Mario’s voice lines.

name: Super Donuts!
summary:
Super Donuts is a Platformer without a jump button! Taking inspiration from the all time greats in the genre!
Collect sweets as you travel around the world of Sweetzerland in search of the Baby Donuts! Try out various power ups including Giant! Super Sprinkles, Sticky, Bounce and more!
Over 40 levels of increasing challenge will put your gaming skills to the test! There's plenty of hidden secrets too!
See if you can get 100% Complete to unlock something super special!
Keep an eye out for free updates which will add new features and levels in the future.

name: Survival in Snow
summary: You play as Hayan, a survivor who crashes into a snowy field due to the breakdown of the aircraft, she was on during his journey. To return home, Hayan needs to use his smartphone to gather various wild materials to create items or structures.

name: Super Mario Heardle
summary:
A spinoff of Mario Heardle, which is focused only on the platformer titles, also known as the "Mainline" series.
It ended on December 31st, 2022.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Spain Puzzles
summary: Puzzles about Spain!

name: Supaplex: Second Chance
summary: Unofficial remaster of Supaplex (1991) on Unity.

name: Super Lula Escape From Prison
summary: This is a real physics shooter where you need to show everyone that you can go further in trying to escape from prison, a very fun game with several funny Super Hero characters that everyone knows very well, Super Lula, Super Miner (Super Mineirinho), Super Psycho Bunny, Super Punk Duck, Super Dilma and Super Enéas.

name: Super Sunny World
summary: Super Sunny World is the ultimate love letter to the platformer greats of the 8-bit era. Jump, bump, and kick your way through 8 worlds of pixel-perfect platforming, cute characters, and exciting power-ups.

name: Survivor: Day One
summary: A cancelled Nintendo 64 action-adventure game by Konami. The premise was to see a human captive aboard and alien spacecraft mount an escape. Its only public showing came during E3 1998.

name: Super Radish Witch
summary:
The Potato Knight has spellbound everyone in Produceland!

Under the influence of his cunning Starch Magic, everyone hid away Produceland's magic gems. Without the magic gems in place, the land's crops started to wither! All hope is not lost though. The Super Radish Witch happens to be impervious to the Potato Knight's magic, and she's out to save the day!

Can you help the Super Radish Witch get the gems back and save Produceland? Fifteen exciting levels await!

name: Summer at the Edge of the Universe
summary: A multi-route, solarpunk yuri visual novel about intergalactic sightseeing and reconnecting (plus maybe falling in love) with old friends. Three routes to choose!

name: Summer Carnival '93: Nexzr Special
summary: Released specifically for Naxat Soft's Summer Carnival of 1993, Nexzr Special is a collection of short stages and modes that share their basic gameplay system and visuals with Nexzr. The regular mode introduces familiar regular enemies and a few new bosses. The "Carnival Mode" contains Score Attack and Time Attack modes, both requiring the player to focus on attaining the high score rather than just surviving. For that reason the difficulty in these modes is more forgiving; they allow more continues and have more generously placed power-ups. These modes also offer more destructible objects on the screen, as these specifically serve to increase the score.

name: Super Hiking Simulator 2020: Puzzles
summary: This game is a puzzle game. This is a free add-on for customers who purchase the Super Hiking Simulator 2020.

name: Super Puzzle Galaxy
summary: Come play with the sands of fun in our outer-space physics sandbox. Sculpt sand to direct the ball into the goal in this physics puzzle game. Race for position on the leader boards and make your own levels with the in-game editor and post them to the community.

name: Subterranean
summary: Delve into the ancient mines, unearthing vast treasures and forgotten secrets.

name: Summoners Mist
summary: Summon the enemies you kill to solve puzzles, including a horse, a tree, a miner and a dragon. Some areas are unreachable without the right summon so you must find out how to get one it to advance to the next area.

name: Surreal Deal
summary: Join Al, a simple man with a not-so simple job on his two-week journey as a salesman from another dimension. Make choices, sales and friends!

name: Super Slug
summary: Responding to a distress signal from a nearby planet, your ship detects no lifeforms, but sensors are picking up energy readings near an abandoned research facility. You are sent down with your away team as chief of security to investigate. Upon arrival, you are alone, there's no sign of your team, and your equipment is gone.

name: Sunflowers and the Goddess of Death
summary: A retro-inspired turn-based RPG of faith, loss, and rebellion. Overcome the designs of a dread goddess, liberate your people, and shatter the chains that bind you.

name: Super Tekkyu Fight!
summary: Super Tekkyu Fight! is an Action game, developed by Metro and published by Banpresto, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Summer Puzzles
summary: Move all parts to form the complete image.

name: Super Tetris
summary: Super Tetris is a Tetris variant. It contains additional features such as different types of gameplay (two player cooperative and competitive) as well as new block types (lightning bolts that eliminate an entire row, and bombs that eliminate from 2 to 16 blocks). The Moscow Circus in shown in the background.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Sealife Puzzles
summary: Puzzles of Sealife!

name: Super Bonk
summary:
The fourth game in the regular "Bonk" caveman series, Bonk is back on his first Super Nintendo outing.

In this side-scrolling platformer adventure, the gameplay is similar to Bonk 3. Super Bonk allows Bonk to travel through time from his prehistoric levels, the insides of a dinosaur, a version of modern Chinatown, and even the moon! Along the way, Bonk can find power-ups that can change his form to creatures such as a shooting Bonk crab, a dinosaur form called "Big Kronk", find candies that change his size from tiny to huge, travel through transportation tubes, and find multiple bonus levels.

Bonk still uses his head to smash his enemies, propeller seeds that allow Bonk to fly, and for the first time, can carry spring flowers on his head in his continuing battle against his arch nemesis, King Drool!

name: Sudokku Elite Collection
summary: A sudoku game developed by Strategy Empire.

name: Super Formation Soccer 95: della Serie A
summary: Super Formation Soccer 95: della Serie A is a Sports game, developed and published by Human Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Suburban Footy League
summary: In a town like yours the ultimate football adventure is about to begin.

name: Suero Zeus
summary: Consigue armas e items que te ayuden a abrirte camino por las regiones infectadas de monstruos sedientos de sangre, ayuda a los pobres sobrevivientes que encuentres en tu camino y encuentra la manera de resolver acertijos que dificultan tu gran escape.

name: Super Mario Bros: Dark Days
summary: Mario with guns and blood!

name: Summer Paws
summary: Summer days, warm rain, magical nights! Little kittens are hidden well. Can you find them?

name: Supraland: Complete Edition
summary: Supraland and the Crash DLC. The Crash DLC adds a separate 2nd campaign to the basegame. Combined you gets around 25-40 hours of Exploration, Puzzles and beating up monsters.

name: Sudokube
summary: A classic Sudoku game with a 3D twist, Sudokube provides both challenge and relaxation.

name: Super Mario 64 EX Alo
summary: A fork of SM64EX with extra features. It also includes support for other platforms.

name: Super Ride Grandpa
summary: Race your grandpa against other grandpas (and goompahs).

name: Sushi Catapult
summary: Sushi Cat has a new sushi catapult! The return of our bouncy blue friend sees him on a brand new adventure, featuring all new CATapult based gameplay. Collect sushi, buy upgrades and bounce your way through a whole new Sushi Cat story!

name: Super Slam
summary: An arcade tennis game.

name: Sufjan Stevens' A Christmas Game
summary: An 8bit style adventure game featuring music from Sufjan Stevens' Songs for Christmas album. The game contains several mini-games with 8bit chiptune versions of Sufjan's songs. The better you play, the more presents you'll receive.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Anime Puzzles 2
summary: Awesome anime images provided by Studio Ghibli, directly from their movies.

name: Sun Haven: Rock 'n' Roll Pack
summary: This Rock ‘n' Roll Pack includes 29 Rock-inspired Clothing Items, 4 Rock-inspired Wigs, 1 Punk Rat Pet, 1 Punk Horse Mount, and 12 different Furniture Items.

name: Substratum
summary: Marooned on a uncharted planet, you decide to explore. There's something strange about the rocks here - better be careful where you point that laser gun of yours.

name: Super Power League 4
summary: Super Power League 4 is a Sports game, developed by Now Production and published by Hudson, which was released in Japan in 1996.

name: Super Stingray
summary: A top-down tank shooter from Alpha Denshi.

name: Sudoku 9X16X25
summary: Sudoku is an amazing puzzle for everyone. Great for brain training.

name: Superluminal: A Universe Sandbox
summary:
Build your empire and discover new worlds with infinite freedom.
The goal of this sandbox like game is to expand humanity to 1 trillion people by developing technologies, building human colonies and expanding far across the galaxy. A procedurally generated universe allows you to explore 16 galaxies, 64.000 star systems, 300.000+ planets and expand to over 150 trillion people.
Gameplay relies on your ability to balance resources by either buying resource specific systems or technologies. Each planet and star has descriptions detailing their properties and usefulness.

name: Sumomo Theatre
summary:
This is an action game where you defeat enemies with kicks, jumps, and special moves.
Operation during the game uses a four-way controller + 3 button.
Equipped with pause and slow motion buttons.
You can choose between 2 difficulty levels to beat the 5 stages.
There is also a game mode where you can keep killing enemies endlessly.

name: Super Cooks
summary:
A parody of Golvellius II released in 1989 on the Disc Station Special #2.
You play as the character Kelesis who enters the world of cooking. You must
learn the culinary arts in five stages, and get 4 degrees before facing Golvellius.
You will find Randar, who is there to restore your vitality. Your starting weapon
is the frying pan, but you will get new ones in your quest.

name: Sudden Way
summary: This is a fun and unusual platformer with modern pixel art graphics and very simple controls. Take the hero through an unknown and dangerous world full of mysteries and dangerous traps.

name: Super Sized Rescue Squad
summary: Super sized Rescue Squad is a high energy 2D Platformer where you run, jump, and try to rescue as many little civilians as possible. All while fighting an evil cult hell bent on world domination.

name: Super Destronaut 3D
summary: Fight against waves of invaders in this arcade space shooter and collect power-ups to increase your fire power. Try to beat your high-score in Classic or Time Attack mode. If you like classic arcade shooters then you will love Super Destronaut 3D.

name: Subenishiki
summary: This is a shooting action game in the style of Metroidvania. It is not a very complex maze, and the emphasis is on shooting combat. There are several types of weapons that can be used, and maintaining firepower is an important key to the strategy.

name: Survival Nexus
summary: Survival Nexus is an exhilarating survival game that immerses players in a post-apocalyptic world filled with challenges and dangers.

name: SuperStar FNC
summary: A mobile rhythm card-collecting game developed by Dalcom Soft and FNC Entertainment, entertainment company behind some of K-pop's biggest stars, including F.T. Island, CNBLUE, SF9, AOA, Cherry Bullet, N.Flying, and more!

name: Suzuki TT Superbikes: Real Road Racing
summary: Suzuki TT Superbikes features more than 50 vehicles from all over the world, and includes the world famous 37.73 mile Isle of Mann racetrack. For the highest level of realism possible, the course itself has been mapped using data supplied by the government and data captured by the development team. In addition to the traditional racing, the game also features a "Mad Sunday" mode that brings riders from all over the world to test their chops on the mountain. Supplementary modes, such as two-player split-screen and sidecar multiplayer are also included, as are bikes from all classes -- from 125cc all the way to the F1 1000ccs!

name: Surge Breaker
summary: How quickly can you obliterate the crawler menace in this top-down action-strategy hybrid?

name: Super Mayhem 17
summary: Super MAYhem 17 is a 28-level Doom II megawad for Boom-compatible source ports, created by members of the Doomworld forums across May and June 2017. It is the sixth installment of the MAYhem series, and was led by Michael Fraize (Marcaek). The WAD features a unique Mario theme, with textures and sprite replacements from various games in the franchise, although monsters and weapons are unchanged, and the changes to power-ups are purely cosmetic. Maps were also limited to containing a maximum of 256 things and a playable area size of 5120x3840 map units, although some did exceed these limitations.

name: Summer Camp
summary:
GET INVOLVED IN THE CRAZIEST CARTOON GAME EVER! 
 
Maximus Mouse has to retrieve the lost Stars&Stripes for the grand Opening Day of Summer Camp - but where is it? 
 
Screen after screen of madcap action, addiction and the most colorful collection of cute, crazy but deadly characters you're likely to find! 
 
It’s the arcade game that tickles your funny bone but could wreck your vacation..!

name: Super Captain 3D
summary: Super Captain 3D is a shoot-em-up game where you become a Super Hero ready to fight the Pixel Invaders. It features an art style that combines 3D pre-renders with 2D pixel art. Use your Superpowers to protect the Universe!

name: Super Flipper
summary:
Hit the ball with the flippers and keep going up!

Move the flippers to hit the ball by tapping right or left. If you let the ball falls down, Game Over.

Let’s compete each other to see how high you can go with your ball.

name: Super Pixalo
summary: Super Pixalo is the story of a pixel from a 1960s Rock & Roll themed arcade cabinet. Join Pixalo as he travels through over 50 years of pop culture in a journey of self discovery.

name: Super Mario & Sonic
summary: Super Mario & Sonic is an unofficial 2D platformer featuring both Mario and Sonic.

name: Survive Wall
summary: Surviwall is a survival and roguelike game. Players struggle to survive while trapped inside the walls. A secret awaits the players inside the walls. With the changing platform, different challenges and surprises await players every time.

name: Suddenly an Ogre
summary:
Relive the magic of classic gamebooks.
Step into the adventure: Your story, your ending.
What path will you choose?

name: Supra Mayro Bross: Legend of the Lost Kingdom
Survival.io - Battle Royale
summary: Surviv.io - Battle Royale - indie survival battle royale game

name: Super Cat Tales
summary:
"Six cats are the new Jump'n'Fur stars!

Reunite Alex the Cat with his siblings and explore a mysterious island.

Control 24 paws with just 2 thumbs tapping the left or right side of the screen. You'll be surprised how easy it is to climb, swim, jump and run. Just don't forget to bring the right cat for the job!

Super Cat Tales is tailor made for the touch screen. It has never been so easy and satisfying to play platformers on your phone."

name: Sugarlawn
summary:
With a loud "click," the door closes behind you. Finally! You are locked inside an antebellum Southern mansion, alone, wearing only a chicken costume. You've fantasized about this moment for years.

Sugarlawn is a timed treasure hunt game where the goal is to collect as much cash as possible via the valuables you pick up.

name: Super Mansion
summary: Super Mansion is a third-person exploration game developed on Net Yaroze.

name: Super Cave Run
summary: Lose your patience, peace and tranquility, trying to save Hat Man from the most dangerous cave in the world.

name: Sunken Realms
summary: Descend into an abandoned underground city to battle orcs, solve puzzles, collect loot, and then return to the surface to upgrade your gear and stats in this modern, old-school dungeon-crawler.

name: Super Hiking Simulator 2020: After
summary: Short TPS game. The game is a free add-on to Super Hiking Simulator 2020.

name: Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3-e - 1-Up Mushroom
Super Momotaro Dentetsu II
summary: Super Momotaro Dentetsu II is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Make and published by Hudson, which was released in Japan in 1992.

name: Sudoku Master
summary: Sudoku Master is a logic-based number puzzle where the goal is to place the numbers 1-9 in each box so that each number appears only once in each row, column and mini grid. With our Sudoku app you can not only play whenever you wish, at different difficulty levels, but you can also learn sudoku techniques.

name: Superfight: The Anime Deck 2
summary: From Mewtwo to Hello Kitty, The Anime Deck 2 adds 90 new anime-inspired characters and powers to SUPERFIGHT: the game of absurd arguments. This deck can be played on its own or mixed with any other SUPERFIGHT deck. So grab your friends, it’s time to d-d-d-duel!

name: Super Bomberman R Online: Premium Pack
summary: This add-on pack contains 14 additional characters equipped with special types and abilities, as well as the feature to create private matches with your friends.

name: Sushi Food Cart
summary:
From today, you are the owner of this sushi restaurant!
As various customers come to the restaurant, make and serve sushi according to their orders.

There is more to it than just making sushi.
You have to prepare the fish, so go to the ocean and catch them.

name: Superpoke! Pets
summary: SuperPoke! Pets were a virtual goods game for Facebook and MySpace, where you take care of a virtual pet.

name: Sushi Cat Words
summary: Sushi Cat is always looking for new tasty treats to fill its belly! In Sushi Cat Words, you'll find all sorts of mouth-watering sushi dishes for our rotund hero. You'd better have eaten plenty of brain food, though. The only way to feed that feline is by searching out words in hundreds of levels of puzzling fun. Find big words, small words, words that go up, words that go down, or words that go all the way around.

name: Super Dinoblasters
summary: B3RN1 (Bernie) is a patrol bot with the Intergalactic Federation, tasked with keeping the galaxy safe from would-be villains. After receiving a distress signal from Galactic Blast Ranger Pink, B3RN1 changes course to investigate planet Cretacia.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Kenya
summary: Puzzles of Kenya!

name: Superhero-X
summary: Superhero-X: is a 2.5D create your own Fighter fighting game featuring real time HD Lighting and High Definition graphics.

name: Supra Mayro Kratt
summary: werid raceing game

name: Super Bowling
summary:
Super Bowling is a third-person bowling game. Players may bowl in several different environments, which range from ice ponds to neon-lit Chinese temples. Players can face-off against characters in their home stages, much like a fighting game. If the player wins they can then play on these stages in other play modes.

Multi-player modes are also available, with a number of different variations.

name: Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3-e - Castle Dash
Surviving the Fall
summary: In this game you play as an Nordic soldier in a post apocalyptic Open-World, with the beautiful landscape of Norway. The game is a Single-Player survival game where you have to fight against mutated creatures who has been poisoned by a mysterious virus that has taken over the city.

name: Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3-e - Caped Escape
Surfin' Sam: Attack of the Aqualites
summary: Surf's Up!

name: Surf's Up
summary: Surf’s Up is a sports/action game based on Sony Pictures Animation’s film of the same name. Unlike a traditional surfing simulator, the gameplay adopts mechanics closer to Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater: players control penguin characters who ride waves as though they were skateboarding halfpipes

name: Super Dangerous Trap
summary: Run and jump past traps and enemies. Avoid various obstacles, as platforms, holes and other leathal hazards.

name: Super Fighting Jam
summary: What is Super Fighting Jam? This work is a free 2D fighting game created by an author who does not know programming at all, reflecting his own values and tastes.

name: Sudoku Party
summary: Sudoku with daily competions, palying with friends and story campaign

name: Super Nova Stadium
summary: Join other alien contestants in a ricochet battle at the Super Nova Stadium! Chose your blaster, harness solar power to charge your weaponry and knock our your opponents to claim victory! Compete as a team in two game modes: Standoff or Overcharge in intense, ricocheting combat.

name: Super Mario World: Return to Dinosaur Land
summary: This is a complete hack of Super Mario World. Don't expect any new graphics here; this game is all about the level design. All the levels and worlds are new, and some of the worlds have themes not present in the original game, such as a water world and an ice world.

name: Super Shape Shooter
summary: hilarious fun, simple, fast-paced free-for-all deathmatch game with tons of unlockable hats! Super Shape Shooter is an online 2D Mutliplayer Shooter platformer. Choose from three different classes and play in five different maps against your friends and have some gun n jump fun in hilarious epic matches. Features: 2D Online Multiplayer Shooter Play against bots or humans 6 different maps 3 different characters Tons of cosmetic hats to make ur shape unique

name: Subpar Commander
summary:
Single Player  
 Real Time Strategy  
with robotic tanks

name: Super Kakuro: Cross Sums
summary: Learn and play the popular Japanese game of Kakuro (Cross Sums). Play a variety of different board sizes and use in-game assistance to solve the toughest puzzles.

name: Super MineSweeper
summary: In the classic Minesweeper game, there can be unsolvable situations. We introduced a feature to "view the number of mines around each cell in a 3x3 or 5x5 grid" to avoid unsolvable situations. There are fifty progressively challenging levels, each with a global speed leaderboard. Go for it!

name: Super Retro Fighter
summary: Classic STG game Have fun with your friends just like your childhood!

name: Sudoku: Casual Board Game
summary:
Sudoku is a very old puzzle for training the mind, logic and attentiveness!
Sudoku is the oldest and very popular mindfulness puzzle! There are riddles for every taste - from the simplest to the most complex. And if the task is beyond your power, then you can always use the hints that will help in solving the puzzle.

Pleasant music and colorful graphics will allow you to immerse yourself in the game, completely relax and have a good rest. Forget about paper sudoku, now the puzzle will always be with you on your device! Train your brain, develop logic and mindfulness!

name: Sundown
summary: The UAC has received reports of demonic presence in a mysterious desolate island that was the home of an ancient civilization.

name: SuperLite 1500 Series: Oekaki Puzzle 2
summary: Puzzle Game Collection Complete the picture will fill the number of vertical and horizontal mass based poker [first whenever visiting ?second puzzle. All 200 questions were prepared and recorded four different sizes small and large problems, and enjoy plenty of beginner to expert. Once you stop and start, features a simple rule profound they are also equipped with safety rules for beginners mode of explanation.

name: Super Freaks 1: Ultimate Edition 3.0
summary: An update for Super Freaks 1: Ultimate Edition 3.0 that triples the content of the game, adding The Uncle Swordsman Story, with faster-paced gameplay, and a set of new bosses to go with it!

name: Super Battle Skin Panic
summary: Card battle game developed by Gainax in 1991.

name: Summer Album
summary: A doujin of "White Album" that revolves around Morikawa Yuki.

name: Super Mario Maker 2: World Maker Update
summary:
Version 3.0.0 of Super Mario Maker 2.

Changes:

Adds a new set of Style Power-ups (SMB2 Mushroom, Frog Suit, Power Balloon, Super Acorn), Boomerang Flower, Cannon Box, Propeller Box, Red POW Box, Goomba Mask, Bullet Bill Mask, Mechakoopa, Larry, Iggy, Wendy, Lemmy, Roy, Morton, Ludwig, Cursed Key, and ON/OFF Trampoline.
Adds World Maker and Super Worlds.
Added a new opening animation.
Adds new Tags.
Players wearing a Dry Bones Shell stuck inside blocks can no longer jump out of the shell.

name: Super Soccer
summary: Super Soccer is a ball-and-paddle game released by Allied Leisure in late 1973.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Brazil Puzzles
summary: Puzzles about Brazil!

name: Super Bowl XX
summary: An American Football game released only in Europe.

name: Super Spy Girl Salon: Spa, Makeup and Dressup Game
Super Hyperspace Avenger
summary: Super Hyperspace Avenger is an endless scroller-shooter inspired by classic arcade games with tons of bullets and enemies.

name: Super Pinkie World 2
summary:
Super Pinkie World 2 is a platforming game resembling Super Mario World on the SNES and it is a squeal to Super Pinkie World.

Play as Pinkie trying to rescues her friends who are lost in various places while collecting cupcakes and avoiding parasprites.

name: Super Nano Jumpers
summary: Super Nano Jumpers is a retro hard as nails platformer with tight control mechanics, This semi autorunner's controls are simple enough - tap the left side of the screen to halt, tap the right side to jump. With over 75 levels to play across 4 different worlds and 2 different Game modes(Arcade & Time trial) you need to survive these dark dungeons,unlock new characters and make it to the end.

name: Super Real Basketball
summary: The original version (relased in Japan and Europe) of the game released as Pat Riley Basketball in North America.

name: SummitX 2
summary: Play the pros as they take on big name mountains. Rails? Jumps? Yes and Yes!! Carve down 3D mountain runs on brand name skis and snowboards, performing dozens of tricks as you go. Enjoy the best HD graphics and physics of any snowboarding or skiing game on mobile. Easy to play with simple controls.

name: Super Mario 14
summary: Super Mario 14 is a hack of the Japan-exclusive Famicom title Kaiketsu Yanchamaru 3: Taiketsu! Zouringen, the second follow-up to Kid Niki: Radical Ninja.

name: Sunburst
summary: Futuristic shooter where you navigate a space ship through various solar systems.

name: Super Drill Defense+
summary: Dig to the center of the Earth

name: Survival: Zombies aHead
summary: Survival: Zombies aHead is a swipe and cut game. The challenge is to survive as long as you can and cut zombie heads all over the place.

name: Sudoku
summary: A homebrew version of sudoku for the NES.

name: Sushi Time!: Complete Edition
summary: Welcome to Sushi Time! Manage a sushi bar and become a tycoon of Japanese food! Try to deliver the orders on time, but be careful not to mix them up! Upgrade your bar and beautify it, so that you'll be able to create the best sushi in town!

name: Sundae Picnic
summary:
· Make and sell ice cream in the park!

You can make various flavors of soft ice cream from vanilla, mint, chocolate to strawberry, matcha.
We should also have toppings such as rainbow sprinkles, chocolate chips, wafer stick and cherries, right?

· Be friends with cats and dogs

There are cats & dogs all over the park.
Please make ice cream. If the animals liked the ice cream you made, they might come to the picnic :)

Sometimes some animals are picky, so keep that in mind!

· Make your own picnic

Picnic mats, beach beds, swimming pools, BBQ party grills, and more than 100 kinds of picnic furniture, fences and tiles are prepared. Decorate it according to your preference.
Note that there are some furniture that animals especially like! Don't forget to decorate it with it :D

name: Super Grave Snatchers
summary: Use pixelated necromancy to smash villages, scare townsfolk, and generally cause a ruckus.

name: Survive Together
summary: Survive Together is a 2D world simulator where players are thrown into the many perils of nature, and together, overcome them to build a thriving empire.

name: Sum!!
summary:
It is a simple and interesting puzzle game.
At limited time, you need sum up the block number the match the line number.
It is best to kill time.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Original SJP
summary: All puzzles of the first Super Jigsaw Puzzle Game!

name: Super Sonic Battle
summary: Full fledged Sonic Fighting game - Super Sonic Battle. Developed to celebrate the 20th Anniversary of the GBA title Sonic Battle!

name: Super Badminton 2010 HD
summary: Experience the fastest racquet sport in the world at your fingertips with hyper-realistic physics, HD graphics, slick UI and real sound effects that will make you come back for more. So, grab your badminton racket, take a swing and hit that Smash!

name: Summon Night: Twin Age
summary: Reiha and Aldo grew up together as brother and sister on the tropical island of Jarazi, among a race of people with beast-like features. There they learned to commune with the Nature Spirits that surrounded them. One day, the Spirits began acting strangely, prompting Reiha and Aldo to investigate. Their quest to find out who or what is behind the corruption of the Spirits will lead them back to the human lands where the cataclysm first brought them together.

name: Sudoku Online
summary: Sudoku Online is an online playable version of the classic Sudoku puzzle game. The game features various difficulties such as easy, medium, hard, evil and impossible, as well as a mode for kids. The game also includes daily challenge boards to complete.

name: Sushi Master VR
summary: Sushi Master VR is a Sushi making game. You can experience basic operations of a conveyor belt sushi restaurant.

name: Sugar Box
summary: Sugar Box - Minimalistic beautiful puzzle game in which you need to help insects pick up sugar

name: Super Trump Collection
summary: Super Trump Collection is a Miscellaneous game, published by Bottom Up, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Super Real Mahjong P7
summary: Super Real Mahjong P7 (スーパーリアル麻雀P7) is an mahjong video game developed and published by SETA Corporation and released for arcades on December 1997 in Japan only and it is the seventh game of the Super Real Mahjong series.

name: Suzumiya Haruhi no Tensei
summary:
Also known as "The Reincarnation of Haruhi Suzumiya", Suzumiya Haruhi no Tensei is an online social card game released for japenese phone.

Player can collect cards of different scenes from the anime and use them to procede in a story mode which loop after a while, letting the player experience different scenarios.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Japan Puzzles
summary: Puzzles about Japan!

name: Submarines 2D
summary: Submarine Battles. Action Game. Second World War. Play With All Armies. Complete the Missions.

name: Survival Planet
summary: Stranded in alien planet, you need to find your crew while trying to survive and contact the earth

name: Super Dash
summary: Dash through enemies, collect power ups and survive waves of enemies in this fast paced bullet-hell

name: Super Professor
summary: Game #20

name: Super Spray n' Slay 3D
summary: Show those germs what for!

name: Super Sean 007
summary: Super Sean 007 is a platform game with a great world. The world consists of various beautiful sceneries of nature: forests, caves, mountains, and abandoned ruins telling the stories of when there used to be a civilization there.

name: Sudoku 100,000,000
summary: A Suduku game for the iPhone with over 100,000,000 Suduku puzzles

name: Sudoku Party
summary: There are 1,000 exclusive puzzles to solve on your own, or co-operatively with a friend.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Random Animals 2
summary: Puzzles of random animals!

name: Super Keepy Ups
summary: Have you ever tried to keep a ball in the air in real life only to find that physics is conspiring against you? Then it sounds like it's about time you left the real world behind to try to keep a digital ball in the digital air and let digital physics best you!

name: Super Tank Rumble
summary:
Super Tank Rumble is a sandbox strategy game where a player assembles their tank with various Blocks and plays 1 vs 1 against other user-built tanks.
If a player destroys the other player’s tank, the player wins the battle.
Increasing the player’s level by winning battles unlocks new Blocks to use for their tanks. Opening Supply Boxes rewards the player with Research Documents that can be used to upgrade Blocks or to unlock new Blocks. As a player wins more battles their ranking will rise, allowing them to climb to the top of the ladder and become a legendary tank captain.
A player can also make Blueprints of their original tank creations and share them with other players to download and use. They can show them off on social media as well.

name: Super Shield Dash
summary: Super Shield Dash is an arcade game where you smash enemies with your shield, while time moves as you move. No powerups, no fancy weapons. Just you simply dashing around, throwing shield to destroy enemies. So plant your feet, grit your teeth and eat those horses.

name: Super Zombie Arcade
summary:
Take on the zombie horde in this post apocalyptic crazy adventure.
This game gets more and more difficult and crazier zombies spawn when player reach higher levels. Unlock new weapons by reaching higher levels.
How many can you kill?
How long will you last?

watch out for the runners

name: Sudoki
summary: Are you desperate for zero time dilemma? Need something to refresh your memory? want to have a little fun before you suffer in hell for the rest of eternity?

name: Super Fighter
summary: Super Fighter is a MS-DOS fighting game by Taiwanese developer C&E. It was the first game to be later acquired and released by Super Fighter Team, which takes its name from the game.

name: Sudoku Quest
summary: A Sudoku game for mobile devices with a loosely-structured level system.

name: Subterraneus
summary: Subterraneus is a point&click video game. A mouse, curiosity and some (twisted) logic are your only weapons to beat this adventure.

name: Submachine 3: the Loop
summary:
This is the original flash version of the game
in high definition and playable in fullscreen.

name: Surfacing
summary: Surfacing is a Game Boy-style RPG in terms of color depth and screen size. Just pretend the resolution never changes due to text boxes, menus, or combat.

name: Submachine Zero: Ancient Adventure
summary: This game was created for the JayIsGames Casual Gameplay Design Competition #1 flash games contest and uses the new Float game engine designed by Mateusz Skutnik.

name: Submachine 4: The Lab
summary:
This is the original flash version of the game
in high definition and playable in fullscreen.

name: Super Galdelic Hour
summary: 4 animals turned into busty women, who then go on to play mini-games.

name: Super Ball Wrestle Yes
summary: Super Ball Wrestle Yes is a frantic local multiplayer physics based combat game from First Place Games. Challenge your friends in 2 to 4 player matches with goofy balls, tactical power ups and deep down silliness.

name: Sugary Garden
summary: Included in the Story Me app.

name: Super Distro
summary: "Super Distro" is a hard-as-nails 2D platformer in the style of retro games such as Megaman, Super Mario Bros 2: The Lost Levels and other such rage-inducing classics.

name: SuperTripLand
summary:
Welcome to SuperTripLand!

Join forces with players from around the world or engage in intense arena battles. Complete challenging quests, collect TripCoins, and visit the in-game shop to purchase items and upgrade your gameplay.

name: Super Mario Bros. 2
summary: Super Mario Bros. 2 is a pirated port of the All-Stars version of Super Mario Bros. for the Mega Drive/Genesis, made by Gamtec in 1998.

name: Super Bomberman BT
summary: A version of Super Bomberman (mobile) with multiplayer support via Bluetooth.

name: Superstore
summary: Build, manage, and thrive in the bustling world of retail.

name: Super Mario Sunshine Arcade 2
summary:
Super Mario Arcade 2 is a mod for Super Mario Sunshine that contains 96 unique levels that are similar to the secret levels in sunshine. 48 of those levels are from the original.

Also in each level, there is a blue coin as an extra challenge. Don't worry about collecting them all, since they aren't worth anything. You can always collect them at the end.

name: Super Light Saga: Dragon Force
summary: A port of a Taiwanese DOS Strategy RPG very similar to Shining Force. When brought to a console, the graphics were simplified but an overhead town exploration mode was created just for this version, making it even more similar to Shining Force.

name: Super Jagua
summary: Super Jagua is a classic 2D retro-style single-player platformer inspired by the greatest platformers of the 80s. Run, jump, swim, discover lots of secrets, fight brutal bosses and more in this classic NES inspired adventure.

name: Summon Night 4
summary: Summon Night 4 is a Japanese tactical RPG and the last entry in the Summon Night series developed by Flight Plan. The plot in this game focus on a parent/child relationship.

name: Superdimension Neptune vs. Sega Hard Girls: Segami's Astral Brave
summary: A new class for Segami.

name: Sudoku3D
summary: Sudoku puzzle - from easy to hardcore... Fully random generation with a choice of field size and difficulty.

name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Morgana Hat
Survival on Amazonia
summary: "Survival on Amazonia" is a survival RPG with four women to romance. You will craft and fight your way through powerful monsters, while making sure to keep yourself fed and well rested for optimal performance.

name: Sugoi Girls: Enchanting Elf
summary: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Suitchi
summary: Suitchi is a two-player co-op platformer that is all about switching. Able to switch positions and teleport to each other, Blue and Orange go on an adventure of puzzle solving to find their lost friend.

name: Super Probotector: Alien Rebels
summary: Super Probotector: Alien Rebels is the European port of Contra III: The Alien Wars. It changes the main characters and enemies into robots, like the previous Probotector ports.

name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Rumble - Sonic and Shadow Skins
Sudoku 23
summary: Sudoku 23 is a version of Sudoku that is playable on the NES.

name: Super Troll Islands
summary: Arcade platform game, based on the license of those bright-haired cute naked chaps. Each scrolling level was initially shrouded in an animated "mist". Large rectangles of mist could be cleared by running around platforms and ladders in the correct order. As the mist cleared, a brightly-coloured background was revealed. All the usual platform enemies and pickups abounded.

name: Super Cosmic Land
summary:
In this adventure, you are "Fierce" the self-proclaimed "Bandit King" who has just pulled of a heist and is basking in his stolen treasure on a remote planet from far, far away.

As he is reveling in his spoils, he is suddenly struck from the skies by a mysterious blot of darkness who also makes off with his treasure!

Help Fierce retrieve the treasure that he rightfully stole and find out who is behind this sudden theft of a thief!

name: Submarine war
summary: This is a military shooting game. Players need to find an aircraft carrier while driving a submarine and use torpedoes to sink the aircraft carrier to win the game.

name: Sudoku of Mana
summary: A sudoku game for kids that uses pictures instead of numbers.

name: Sudoku Office Style
summary: A sudoko game developed by Strategy Empire.

name: Super Super Super Super
summary:
Four players each take control of a superhero and work together to escape the laboratory!

If playing with two or three players, politely divide the super heroes among the players.

If playing with one player, make friends with the nearest human and convince them to play with you. If they refuse to be friends, suggest being frenemies instead. If they still refuse, make friends with the nearest cat.

Playing this game with a cat is still better than playing this game alone.

name: Super Star Panda
summary: A classic arcade game, from young and old - for old and young :)

name: Survival Games
summary: You don't know who you are, or where you are. How will you be remembered by your friends and enemies?

name: SubDivide
summary: Divide the world in this puzzle-platformer to venture into the unknown.

name: Super Frog's Quest
summary: Classic 2D platforming action with a delicious twist! Travel through nine different levels, each with their own unique challenge and style. Gobble up your enemies and use their own abilities against them. Fight your way to the alien menace and rescue the tadpoles in Super Frog's Quest!

name: Super Donkey
summary:
Super Donkey is an unreleased platformer starring an unnamed proto-Rayman-like aviator/explorer who resembles the main character of Nintendo's earlier game Sky Skipper. Two builds were found, though neither one has any sound or music and the onscreen timer is non-functional in both. Judging by the name and some unused sprites, this might have been a Donkey Kong-related project.
Various elements of Super Donkey would eventually be used in Super Mario World 2: Yoshi's Island.

name: Summer Flowers
summary: Experience a short story about a bisexual furry girl. Unscramble the tiles. Put them together and Discover Mary’s feelings about every event in her life.

name: Super Pixel Smash
summary: Compete in the retro-action world of Super Pixel Smash! Your skills with the Pixel Paddle and Gravity Gauntlet will trigger powerful point combos, super power-ups and extreme charged shots! How long can you hold the title of Super Pixel Smash Champion!

name: Super 10 Pin
summary: Strike your way through a wild world of bowling in Super 10 Pin! Use special abilities to jump, boost, and explode your way down unbelievable N64-styled bowling lanes in this wacky arcade bowling game!

name: SuperLite 3in1 series: Sudoku Shuu
summary: Compilation of all three Sudoku games released on the PS1 by Success Corp.

name: Super Monkey Ball Gaiden
summary: Super Monkey Ball Gaiden is a level pack for Super Monkey Ball 2 created by Cutsman. The pack would be critically acclaimed, with Cutsman becoming a level designer for the game Rolled Out! as a result. Super Monkey Ball Gaiden is best known for having extremely tough and long levels, and only a handful of people have beaten the Master difficulty.

name: Super Metroid: Project Base
summary:
Project Base is a Super Metroid ROM hack with smoother mechanics, level edits, new content, graphic edits, custom code, and much more.
It keeps the original Super Metroid map mostly intact, while adding new stuff. It doesn't force the player to take a new path, or to use any advanced techniques.

Sequence breaks and shortcuts have been left alone, with new ones added. Highly speedrunnable, and with a level of difficulty that is accessible to anyone.

The name "Project Base" refers its original purpose, which was to act as a base hack for others to build from.

name: Super Metroid: Polarity
summary:
Super Metroid Polarity is an exploration romhack where black & white will be the main colors you will see ! Explore a contaminated planet where it draws its energy from gravity.
Collect a brand new weapon to control the polarity of gravity but beware, Samus can also be contaminated by the atmosphere and enemies and lose these HP as it is infected.

name: Supaplex Think!
summary: Think! And if you need to run, run!

name: Super Sokoban
summary:
Super Sokoban (or Soukoban) is a puzzle game in which the player must push crates around a maze to their designated storage area, ensuring they do not accidentally push a crate into a position where it cannot be recovered. Thinking Rabbit created the original game in 1982 on home computers, and Super Sokoban is the first Super Famicom game to follow the same blueprint.

The intro establishes that the eponymous Sokoban, or warehouse worker, must perform enough box-pushing puzzles to earn enough cash for a flashy new car so that he might finally impress the girl of his dreams.

An added wrinkle is that each stage has a fixed move limit, and so the player must not only push the boxes in the right order but do so with maximum efficiency. The game was not released outside of Japan.

name: Super Mario 64: Gore/Hard-Mode
summary: Take a dive into the challenging world of Gore/Hard-Mode! Often called "Real life Mario 64", this mod originally started as a port of Kaze's Unfair Mario 64. It quickly grew into a cursed lovechild between Unfair Mario and 'I Wanna Be The Guy' sporting ridiculous obstacles and gory inspiration from both. Be prepared to die numerous times in unexpected ways!

name: Super Xblox 360!
summary: Rotate the sinking balls to earn a High Score! Enjoy 4 game modes, 4 unique power-ups, brand new configurations, and 4 original songs. Battle a friend head to head or compete with 3 others to see who is the best. Bearcat Coders - Matt Harbaugh, Greg Hill, Kurt Prenger.

name: Supercan 2
summary: Süpercan 2 is an action/adventure game that takes place after Süpercan 1. The game developed by Sobee was launched for the first time at GameX 2012.

name: Sun Warriors
summary: SUN WARRIORS is a frantic, hardcore, cooperative, twin stick shooter. The Moon Goddess, Aysel, is invading our world with a horde of creatures from the dark. As a son of the Sun God Naol, use the power of light to blast all enemies and stop the corruption that is invading our land.

name: Sudoku
summary: SUDOKU offers hundreds of number-crunching puzzles that will stretch your brain power to the limit.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Motorbikes Puzzles
summary: Puzzles of spectacular motorbikes!

name: Superhero Workout
summary: A fitness game that puts players in a super suit training to save the world!

name: SuperCollapse! II
summary: The first in the Collapse! series to be released in retail.

name: Sunset Survival Station
summary: After receiving a cryptic message with coordinates, you arrive at Sunset station, humanity's first stronghold in the past. Only ruins remind you of its former glory, and hordes of mutants roam around trying to tear apart uninvited guests.

name: Super ACiD Block Attack
summary: Super ACiD Block Attack is a puzzle game, probably one you have seen before. The idea is to try and make solid-horizontal rows using the pieces that are given to you. You can rotate the pieces before they fall down to the bottom of the screen. You can make more than 1 row at a time, but only up to five.

name: Super Angry Birds
summary: Angry Birds (also known as Super Angry Birds) is a port of the Sega Genesis bootleg version of the mobile game Angry Birds to the Famicom. It does not have relation with the Nice Code version.

name: Super Salome World
summary: A side-scrolling jump action game in which you control "Salome Hyakumantenbara" from "Nijisanji" Vtuber.

name: Super Mario 4
summary: Super Mario 4 is a hack of the Game Boy game Crayon Shin Chan 4, originally by Bandai. It is a very common title on multicarts.

name: Subrov
summary: Pilot a Remotely Operated submarine and explore the oceans. Chart unknown regions, sample hydrothermal vents, discover new species -all while defying the darkness, crushing pressure, and freezing temperatures of the deeps.

name: Super Ness
summary: Relax and have fun in this toy-like game

name: Super Mario Kart Xtreme
summary:
This is a bit more gory than the usual Super Mario game, but it is still family-friendly despite that.
Play as Mario or Luigi and kill enemies with your Kart. Use the Cursor Up and Down keys (Arrow keys) to move your Kart. Speed up by using the Right Arrow key, and stop by using the Left Arrow key. Press the "A" key to use the Nitro Boost.

name: Sudoku Relax 5 Full Bloom
summary: Flowers in full bloom. Let your mind take a break and refresh itself to the mind-soothing effects of Sudoku Relax 5. The popular "Sudoku Relax" title is coming out with a sequel, "Sudoku Relax 5". Flowers bloom and then scatter...You can enjoy the effects of transient beauty. Choose from EASY, NORMAL, or HARD modes with over 300 puzzles. Exercise your brain and wind down to the relaxing gameplay and music. Solving puzzles unlocks new backgrounds and music tracks. The game contains 3 backgrounds and 3 music tracks. You can choose to pause the game at any time and continue playing at your convenience. Simple touch controls make playing easy.

name: Super Mario: Battle for the Mushroom Kingdom
S.U.M. Slay Uncool Monsters: Paladin
summary: In S.U.M. you'll put your Quick-Math skills to test! The Paladin in a strong and durable fighter.

name: Sumikko Gurashi: Gakkou Seikatsu Hajimerun Desu
Super Seymour Saves the Planet
summary: Join Seymour in his first action film, saving the Earth from nuclear waste in this Bomb Jack clone.

name: Supreme Ruler The Great War Remastered
summary: Real-Time Strategy/Wargame. BattleGoat Studios invites you to travel back to 1914 and select from more than 50 playable regions at the onset of World War I, as European powers struggle to survive and new technologies transform warfare.

name: S.U.M. Slay Uncool Monsters: Wizard
summary: In S.U.M. you'll put your Quick-Math skills to test! The Wizard can deals a lot of damage with its Fireball Bonus Attack.

name: S.U.M. Slay Uncool Monsters: Assassin
summary: In S.U.M. you'll put your Quick-Math skills to test! The Assassin hits the enemies where it hurts the most.

name: Sunlit's Star Fox Minihack
summary: A mini Star Fox hack with 1 route and 6 levels.

name: Super Boba: Pachinko Cafe
summary: This is a modern twist on arcade-style pachinko! This is the perfect AFK game for when you would rather watch or put minimal effort and still win! Create shockwaves and gravity wells to manipulate falling objects into target cups. The more you more catch, the more you score!

name: Submarine Adventure
summary: This is a shooting casual game, you can control your submarine to take risks, move up and down with mouse clicks, shoot bullets through the keyboard to clear obstacles. Go and start your adventure!

name: Super: Taxi Simulation
summary: Explore the city in 'sUper: Taxi Simulation'! Navigate busy streets, pick up diverse passengers, and customize your cab. Balance speed and safety, tackle traffic and day-night cycles. Thrive in this dynamic taxi driving adventure. Ready, set, drive!

name: Summer Bubble Splash
summary: Solve fun matching puzzles underwater and use different boosters to splash to the next level!

name: Super Luigi Wii: The Emissary
summary:
SLWii: The Emissary is a a complete revamp of Ultimate Super Luigi Wii that was released in a rush and unpolished state back in 2020.

Based around Newer SMBWii, The Emissary stars Luigi in an adventure heavily inspired from Super Smash Bros Melee and Brawl with custom music, models and inspirations coming from those respective games.

name: Super Evolution Illustrated: War World
summary: Super Evolution Illustrated adopts a unique multi-choice evolution mechanism, which can customize the evolution direction of Digimon. Each Digimon can break through the upper limit and achieve ultimate combat power. Here, Digimon are not just companions in battle, they also have their own stories. Here, a new adventure in your name is about to begin. Be the next to be called and go now!

name: Super Math Saga
summary: Super Math Saga is an educational platformer game that combines adventure and math, designed to help players improve their math arithmetic in a fun way. Work your way through levels dodging enemies, climbing platforms, and solving math questions. Beat all the levels to face the final boss!

name: Super Gem Fighter Mini Mix
summary: It's the most outrageous fighting game ever! Innocent but deadly, these pint-sized champions from Street Fighter and DarkStalkers pack one heck of a punch. Battle to collect power-up gems and duke it out with the most insane attacks and hilarious fighting combos of all time.

name: Sudoku Portal
summary:
the objective of sudoku is to fill a 9 × 9 grid with digits so that each column, each row, and each of the nine 3 × 3 subgrids that compose the grid contain all of the digits from 1 to 9. The puzzle setter provides a partially completed grid, which for a well-posed puzzle has a single solution.
are you looking to solve some interesting sudoku look no more, enjoy solving exciting sudoku in a beautiful and relaxing environment where the Portal takes you to the highest pikes of sea cliffs and the coldest regions of the pole where Eskimos live build igloos, and rest their wooden sleds and the silent of desert canyon where you enjoy the base campfire and a full moon and wonderful waterfalls?

name: Sunday Funday: The Ride
summary: Sunday Funday: The Ride is a Christian video game that was released for the Nintendo Entertainment System by Wisdom Tree, formerly a subsidiary label of Color Dreams, in 1995. The game was the last to be released by any company for the American NES. Like all Wisdom Tree games, Sunday Funday was not officially licensed by Nintendo. According to the game's instruction manual, the player controls a skateboarding hero who is late for Sunday school. In the game, the hero must use his skateboard and any objects he finds, such as balloons, grapefruits, and newspapers, to defeat bullies, clowns, and businessmen who are attempting to impede his path to Sunday school. The Sunday Funday game cartridge included two features other than the game itself - an arcade-style game titled Fish Fall and a sing-a-long of a song by Christian pop band 4Him. Sunday Funday is a ripped-off version of Menace Beach, also released by Color Dreams, excepting a few graphics and a complete story change. While the hero in Menace Beach fights ninjas and evil clowns on his way to rescue his girlfriend from Demon Dan, the hero in Sunday Funday fights bullies and businessmen on his way to Sunday school. Additionally, the hero carries a bible in Sunday Funday but not in Menace Beach. Finally, in Menace Beach, the hero's girlfriend appears wearing less and less clothing between levels, but she is replaced by a fully clothed Sunday school teacher in Sunday Funday.

name: Summer Sports: Paradise Island
summary: Check into the Paradise Island Resort and explore the vast array of recreational activities in a lush tropical environment. Compete against friends in a collection of summer-themed games including Basketball, Croquet, Lawn Darts, Badminton, Volleyball, Horse Shoes, and Mini-Golf. Bump, set, spike, throw, putt, shoot, swing, and more - all with intuitive Wii Remote gestures!

name: Summer Party Time
summary: Get ready for the best summer ever! Party with your friends anytime, anywhere!

name: Summonsters
summary: Summonsters is a roguelike auto-battler game where you buy summons and combine artifacts to survive against oncoming enemies. Utilize summons that fight on your behalf to defeat bosses and elites. To ensure survival, strategically combine artifacts to forge powerful legendary artifacts.

name: Super Black Bass 3
summary: Part of the Black Bass series of fishing games by Starfish, and their third title for the SNES. Unlike the previous two Super Black Bass games, however, this one was not released outside of Japan.

name: SuperLite 1500 series: Sudoku 2
summary: More number puzzles and stuff for your PlayStation.

name: Survival Sisters
summary: Survival elements added to the popular slide puzzle! Grow crops, fight zombies, and survive as long as possible! Use bombs to destroy the zombies that come at you!

name: Superstore Simulator
summary: Develop your store, order goods, and sell, sell, sell. Hire employees and take care of customers. Enjoy a rather humorous approach to trading and running a store where you can look forward to hours upon hours of great entertainment.

name: Sudden Attack
summary: Sudden Attack is a fast paced game with speed and user battlefield And that seems to provide tension. In addition, the ease of operation and user-friendly Interface that you can enjoy the FPS for Everyone Pursued.

name: SuperCluster: Void
summary: SuperCluster: Void is a space adventure RPG. You can explore a massive randomly generated galaxy, Interact with alien factions, Battle massive enemy fleets and take even command of a fleet yourself. Fight for your people, explore the galaxy, and fulfill your destiny, in SuperCluster: Void.

name: Super Chinese 1-2 Advance
summary: Compilation of the first two Super Chinese games, as well as a bonus game called Super Chinese Labyrinth.

name: Sua
summary: Sua is a rather dark adventure game. This game was made by RPG Maker MV. The game was created by referring to the history of South Korea. I think there will be difficulties in encountering neutral or hostile characters. Everyone, try to escape with the girl.

name: Summoners War: Lost Centuria
