summary: Collect and upgrade cards featuring iconic monsters from the Summoners War world to use in battle. Equip your monsters with unique combinations of Runes and Skill Stones. Join an Alliance with friends to share monster cards and earn additional rewards. Craft the perfect strategies and teams to battle your way through an epic adventure.

name: Sudden Death
summary: A game by Benny Barassi and Geelong Catgirl with additional help by Mother Goose. No pads, no helmets, no gameplay.

name: Super Cucho
summary: Caution! Fierce hardcore about the toad. Only for those with nerves of steel. Help the toad feed his cat!

name: Sudoku 50! For Beginners
summary: Sudoku Student brings you the first Nintendo DSiWare sudoku experience with all the features you’d expect.

name: Surgineer
summary:
Have you ever dreamed of being a real surgeon? Well… you are not gonna learn that here.

Welcome to the most unrealistic surgery simulator where everyone can instantly become a terrible doctor.

You will have to solve hilarious surgical procedures ranging from CPR to brain transplant or even removing alien eggs from a poor patient using a robotic arm!

You always thought you had that surgeon in you? You better have a bulletproof malpractice insurance before getting your virtual hands on a patient!

name: Super Hero Sakusen
summary: Super Hero Sakusen is a turn-based RPG crossover between the Gundam, Ultra Man, and Metal Heroes series as well as various other Toei-owned tokusatsu TV shows such as Kaiketsu Zubatto.

name: Super Paper Mario Memory Match
summary: Super Paper Mario Memory Match was an online advergame developed in Adobe Flash and published by Nintendo to promote Super Paper Mario, first released in 2007 for the Wii. It was playable on the Nintendo Arcade section of nintendo.com, which comprised many other web advergames published by Nintendo.

name: Super Volley Ball
summary: Super Volley Ball is an indoor volleyball game for one or two players. The single player mode offers two game options: normal game and World League. Choosing normal game pits the player against the computer in a single game. Choosing World League pits the player against all other teams available. A password save is available in this mode.

name: Subject:Love
summary:
Love. A feeling coveted by writers and detested by those who live by logic.

A natural sensation that arises at the most unexpected moment to bring out the best in you.

But what happens when someone who has never felt it before tries to understand it? How far can this person go?

A heartless witch and six confused boys join this journey for an answer.

Now. Will they find love, or will another feel awake inside them?

name: SuperLite 1500 Series: Slither Link
summary:
Slitherlink (also known as Fences, Takegaki, Loop the Loop, Loopy, Ouroboros, Suriza and Dotty Dilemma) is a logic puzzle developed by publisher Nikoli.

Slitherlink is played on a rectangular lattice of dots. Some of the squares formed by the dots have numbers inside them. The objective is to connect horizontally and vertically adjacent dots so that the lines form a simple loop with no loose ends. In addition, the number inside a square represents how many of its four sides are segments in the loop.

Other types of planar graphs can be used in lieu of the standard grid, with varying numbers of edges per vertex or vertices per polygon. These patterns include snowflake, Penrose, Laves and Altair tilings. These add complexity by varying the number of possible paths from an intersection, and/or the number of sides to each polygon; but similar rules apply to their solution.

SuperLite 1500 Series - Slither Link is a puzzle game based on the Slitherlink logic puzzle featuring over 200 different stages.

name: Summer Days
summary: Briana has been craving some time off all summer and finally with her shoot wrapped for hiatus she can relax at her summer cottage on the lake. To really enjoy herself she even drags her female co-stars along for the ride.

name: Superfight: The Red Deck
summary: The Red Deck is an expansion to SUPERFIGHT that adds over 80 R-Rated cards to the core deck. This expansion contains the most inappropriate and terrible cards in the game. We'll be honest: there is some nasty [CENSORED] in this deck.

name: Super Scattergories
summary: The classic category game is back and better than ever! Now you can test yourself or challenge your friends and family with four all new brain-teasing games, plus the original Scattergories. Put on your thinking cap and use your quick wits to go for that perfect score!

name: Super Street Fighter II X for Matching Service
summary:
Super Street Fighter II X for Matching Service is a fighting game developed by Capcom and released for the Sega Dreamcast exclusively in Japan in 2000.

It is an enhanced port of Super Street Fighter II X: Grand Master Challenge (known as Super Street Fighter II Turbo in Western regions), which was the final arcade update to Street Fighter II. The game plays similarly to other ports of Super Street Fighter II X (including the earlier Sega Saturn version that was released as part of Street Fighter Collection), but it was compatible with Capcom's Matching Service, meaning players could compete online.

name: Suborbital
summary: A sci-fi survival game with a twist. Set in a suborbit of a black hole, collect materials and scavenge in orer to repair your damaged ship. However, time is not on your side.

name: Super Skelly Belly
summary: Meat Climber

name: Surviving Skeleton Island
summary: Surviving Skeleton Island is a challenging survival RPG set in a vast 3D low poly island world of 12 unique biomes. Explore, hunt, craft, build, farm and fish to survive, while quests and clues unveil the secrets of the island, and your past. Forge your destiny and plot your escape!

name: SuperStar Starship
summary:
Fly your starship to any part of the galaxy and to any planet. Collect beacons on the planet surface. Beacons offer missions, points, credits, minerals and possibly fuel. Collect all beacons on a planet for extra points/credits.
Your mission as starship captain is to explore and map the galaxy for the IGDB (Intergalactic Database). Use your local and galaxy map to help you accomplish your mission or just fly by the seat of your pants.

name: Super Mario Bros.: Crimson Hours
summary: Mario with guns and blood! And explosions!

name: Super Ice Hockey
summary: Super Ice Hockey is an ice hockey video game that enjoyed a release in Japan and Europe for the Super NES/Famicom. It is based on the international level of ice hockey with teams from 1994 as opposed to domestic (intra-national) ice hockey leagues.

name: Summer at Catmai: Fishing Purrrfected
summary: A third-person, cozy adventure game set during a young teenage girl's summer getaway. Travel to Catmai Lake and learn different styles of fishing, how to catch bugs, and learn the importance of family.

name: Super Fun Maths Science Quiz
summary: This is a super fun trivia game quiz which can help.

name: Super Metroid HOTA
summary: This hack was created to show off Samus's ability as much as possible. It's like glitchtroid and impossible combined.

name: Sub Wars
summary: An LCD handheld game by Tiger Electronics, released in 1980.

name: Suddenly My Stepsister!?
summary: Our protagonist has done his best to try and gain the attention of the school’s most popular girl, but in the process, he’s broken the heart of a classmate that he deemed as 'boring.' However, when his mother remarries, he now has an incredibly cute stepsister who turns out to be that boring girl he wasn’t interested in! Why is she hiding her true identity?

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - France Puzzles
summary: Puzzles about France!

name: Super Solvers: Midnight Rescue!
summary: Morty Maxwell, the master of mischief, is up to his old tricks again, and this time the Shady Glen School is the target of his outlandish plot. Armed with paint that turns things invisible and five robot paintbrushes, he's trying to erase the school, and you only have until midnight to stop him. To stop the evil mastermind, kids will need to read for clues and collect evidence to determine which of the robots is really the Master of Mischief in disguise.

name: SuperSuperMarket!
summary: WELCOME TO MARKETING CITY!" SuperSuperMarket! is a tycoon based on time and money management ! Build, sell, improve your shop and your character to stay in town...

name: SugarStellar
summary: Alice bakes the best cupcakes around, but can she steer through the dangers of the outer space sweets business?

name: Super Mighty Power Man: The Champion of the Galaxy
summary:
Super Mighty Power Man is a genuine 2D action-platformer game reminiscent of video games from the late 80’s early 90’s. It is like games found on the NES console when fun was more than QTE, lengthy tutorials, and never-ending cinematics.

Super Mighty Power Man (SMPM) is greatly inspired by the famous Mega Man game series as well as others including: Castlevania, Contra, Duck Tales, Kirby, Super Mario Bros. and more recent ones like VVVVVV, Retro City Rampage and Shovel Knight. Besides being a true love letter to the NES legendary gaming era, it is above all a tribute to the renowned Blue Bomber and our passion for such games that has stayed with us since childhood.

Play as Corey, a gutsy kid who accidentally finds himself caught in a most unexpected adventure to save the galaxy. Helped by a clumsy extraterrestrial robot named Robby, and armed with a mysterious device called ‘The Power Grasp’, Corey must defend the Earth from the spreading evil forces of General Mok. He will need to fight (and jump) his way through deadly environments, hordes of monsters and other hazardous traps to free occupied planets from the tyranny of his enemy’s lieutenants.

‘The Power Grasp’ grants Corey superhuman powers, allowing him to merge with other lifeforms and become one of the many forms of Super Mighty Power Man!

name: Suburban Hive II: Crimson Moon
summary: Crimson Moon is the sequel to Suburban Hive, made by dozens of talented mappers.

name: Sunset Overdrive: Dawn of the Rise of the Fallen Machines
summary: Featuring an all new story and area to explore, “Dawn of the Rise of the Fallen Machines” is a tech-tonic addition to the Sunset Overdrive universe with brand new weapons, trap, amps, enemies and outfits, including the giant Energy Ball as the latest new traversal mechanic. So, jack in and face-off against the avaricious Fizzco. One. Last. Time. Well, maybe. It depends on sales and market research, etc. You know the drill.

name: Super Mario Bros.: The Extra Objects
Super Mario: The Cursed Forest
summary: Super Mario: The Cursed Forest is a Brazilian rom hack that places Mario in a scary forest that he needs to find a way out of.

name: Sufficiency
summary: Sufficiency is a 3D first person room escape puzzle game with unique puzzle solve system and artstyle. Players have to figure out the usage of each item/facility on their own, and solve all the puzzles based on their understanding.

name: Super Metroid: GBA Edition
summary: GBA Edition is a romhack that ports in the map of Super Metroid into Zero Mission engine.

name: Super Ninji Land 2: A Ninji's Journey
summary: The sequel to Super Ninji Land. Join Ninji on their quest to find Bowser and learn the truth about his old lab.

name: Super Wakana Land
summary: Help Wakana finding her missing donations box in an entertaining quest! She will encounter lots of characters along the way, which will either help or obstacle her. Will she find her donations box?

name: Super Spell Heroes
summary:
"Super Spell Heroes is a real-time 1v1 puzzle duel game published by Flaregames and developed by a team of industry veterans (formerly InnoGames, Bigpoint, Goodgame Studios) at Hamburg studio Sviper. 
 
In Super Spell Heroes, players engage in quickfire battles against fellow wizards using simple colour-matching controls. To win a duel, players match mystical spells to damage their opponent, block against their moves, or quickly replenish their own health. Leaving a trail of fallen wizards in their wake, players will journey through magical realms while unlocking and upgrading new spells. Several playable characters can be discovered and levelled up along the way, from Tierra The Huntress to Lua The Voodoo Priest, each harnessing their own unique spells that enable fresh competitive tactics."

name: Super Monkey
summary: Super Monkey is the Mario game style with very funny gameplay.Simple gameplay, nice graphic, funny monsters and sound, very funny and very interesting, Players can collect gold in exchange for clothing, skin, and new weapons as they go through the gates. Game for everybody!

name: Suppressed
summary: Escape from an isolated, totalitarian nation modelled after North Korea in Suppressed, a visual novel and 2D platform game.

name: Super Real Mahjong Dousoukai
summary: Super Real Mahjong Dousoukai is a Miscellaneous game, developed by AI and published by Rocket Company, which was released in Japan in 2004.

name: Super Freaks 1 Remastered
summary: Super Freaks 1 Remastered is a remastered version of The Search of Tikiman made to celebrate the original game's 10th anniversary. It also served as a soft reboot of the series and introduced the modern characters/designs.

name: Super Vadimka VI: A Terrible Threat there is No Vadimka
summary: Super Vadimka VI: A Terrible Threat There is No Vadimka is an action platformer with survival horror elements, created by VadimBallzGames released on January 5, 2023, for Windows. In this sixth installment of the Super Vadimka series, players follow the exploits of Vadim Kulev, an infamous figure from Velizh who has gained legendary status. The game boasts a retro 16-bit aesthetic reminiscent of SNES classics, featuring around 100 levels filled with challenging, bloodthirsty bosses that embody the disturbing Kulechkophobia virus that plagues the protagonist.

name: Sunpolis
summary:
The mysterious city of Sunpolis opens its gates for the first time...
You, the Glorious Bird, will guide the sun in its quest to bring back the light in this enigmatic city.Will you be agile enough to overcome the obstacles as you pursue your infinite journey?
Drift away, and be inspired by the meditative mood of Sunpolis!

name: Super Cross Kings
summary: Supercross Kings allows players to compete in 6 stunning international stadiums and over 12 gruelling races to become the ultimate Supercross King. You can choose your team and earn points to be used towards modifications and power ups on your bike. Each track can be raced forwards and backwards.

name: Super Tetris
summary: Super Tetris is an unlicensed version of Tetris, released for the Sega Master System in South Korea.

name: Super Mario Bros. Funk Mix Deluxe
summary:
Super Mario Bros. Funk Mix is a full game overhaul based off of Super Mario Bros.
With a faithful replication of the NES art style and original music based off of Koji Kondo's work, this mod will have you feeling the Mario groove!

name: Super Maze Planet
summary: Super Maze Planet is a relaxing Retro maze game that gives you bigger mazes as you progress through the levels. Super Maze Planet has over 900 mazes in 10 zones, with coins to pick up and characters to collect. When you earn enough gold you can unlock infinite procedural mazes too!

name: Super Mario Bros. S: Road to Infinity
summary: Run as far as you can in an infinitely-generating level! Collect coins and moons to buy powerups such as the iconic fire flower and ice flower and the custom blade star, and defeat both familiar and custom enemies to earn more time. As you run, you'll face increasingly dangerous foes and obstacles, so be prepared!

name: Super Nova's Symphony
summary: Super Nova's Symphony: Sci-fi RPG rhythm game.

name: Super Army of Tentacles 3: XPack II.V - Apocalypse Bunny Saves Christmas
summary: Help Apocalypse Bunny save a holiday that he hates.

name: Superfight: The Orange Deck
summary: The Orange Deck is an expansion to SUPERFIGHT that adds over 80 geek based cards to the core deck. This expansion references video games, television and movies, comic books, and things from the weird part of the internet.

name: Sugar High
summary: Meet Biscuit, a dog with a huge sweat tooth. Every time he falls asleep, he dreams about worlds full of candies to eat. Run with Biscuit through sugar-filled levels, avoid obstacles, collect power-ups and eat all kinds of sweets.

name: Super Shot Soccer
summary:
Tecmo's Super Shot Soccer is a hybrid of simulation and arcade-styled soccer. Featuring over 30 teams from around the world, the game's play modes are based on international-styled soccer. The four play modes are Test Mode (exhibition play), World Tournament Play (inspired by soccer's World Cup), International League (a round-robin league) and International Cup (a 16 team tournament). Of these modes, only Test Mode allows two players to play the game at the same time.

Differing itself from typical soccer simulation titles, Super Shot Soccer provides over the top arcade-style plays. Called Super Shot Special Moves, each team has two or three special moves that tie into the team's nationality. These provide a unique twist to simulation soccer, as gameplay can be interrupted by national monuments, disaster attacks and more. Special moves can be used to affect both offensive and defensive strategies.

name: Super Snake 3D
summary:
Super Snake 3D is a new take on the classic Snake. Eat, increase and get faster!

Travel through different levels while eating fruits and collecting coins to unlock new levels and beat your highscore.

Avoid all the dangers in space, volcanos, a polygon world and even a multiverse while getting bigger and faster!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - USA Puzzles
summary: Puzzles about USA!

name: Summoner
summary: Summoners have toppled empires and challenged gods. They are venerated as saviours and feared as destroyers. With rings crafted by the ancient Khosani, the gifted can call forth demons, dragons, and elementals, but only the strongest can control the forces they unleash.

name: Super-Patriota Simulator
summary: Heads up! In 72 hours something very important will happen, stay in the streets, do your part and wait for the armed forces! For the future of the country and for the future of your children! The Super-Patriot is coming!

name: Super Mario World 2021
summary: Super Mario World 2021 is a classic-style romhack but with new powerups!

name: Super Mario 2D World Deluxe
summary: Relive the adventure of Super Mario 3D World now in 2D! Super Mario 2D World Deluxe is a fangame where players can spend hours of fun with friends. Players will be able to enjoy the new static and environmental objects, and the same characters from the Mario universe.

name: Super Mario Greetings
summary: Mario needs to manipulate switches in order to collect all the red coins.

name: Suicideville
summary: This is a casual game about Suicideville - where people dying every minute

name: Sunset 20 Drone Racer
summary: Fly your drone up mountains, underwater and in space, racing against your rivals and firing missiles at them in this casual yet skillful arcade drone racing game.

name: Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3
summary: Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3 was originally released for the Game Boy Advance and had physical expansion in the form of a collection of e-Reader cards. When the game was re-released on the Wii U Virtual Console, it included the full game with all of the level expansions found in the World-e. All levels were included in this version, even the ones only released in Japan and the promotional exclusives (not included in any card pack).

name: Super Diagonal Mario 2: The Ultimate Meme Machine
summary: A Super Mario World rom hack based on jokes.

name: Suguri: Perfect Edition
summary: A compilation of SUGURI, Acceleration of SUGURI, the Acceleration of SUGURI X-Edition expansion pack, and the soundtracks to both games.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Colorful
summary: Beautiful colorful images!

name: Super Maze Labyrinth
summary: It's time to relax and enjoy the art of finding your way out of the mazes of Super Maze Labyrinth. Park the haste, enjoy the music and the experience through the 100 mazes divided into 5 visual themes that this game offers you.

name: Super Mario World The Pit Version
Sun In The Shade
summary: High school student Hiroyuki Nasukawa, whose father is a piano tuner, aspires to become a respectable adult. Yet he resorts to cheating on a test. Unsurprisingly, he gets caught. The punishment imposed on him was unexpectedly, “Please repair the school's piano.”

name: Super Mario Bros. Next: The Lost Levels - Part 2
Super Bubble 2003
summary: An advanced version of a classic type of game. Moni & Chris are on a quest to rid there island of viscous invading monsters.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Abandoned Places Puzzles
summary: Puzzles of intriguing abandoned places!

name: Super Mario Bros. Next: Halloween Special DX
summary: SMBNext: Halloween Special DX is a complete remaster of the original Halloween special, replacing its stages with a wide variety of new ones.

name: Summer Lesson: Hikari Miyamoto
summary:
Take on the role of a private tutor for Hikari Miyamoto, a high school girl struggling with her studies. Guide her through daily lessons, provide encouragement, and build a connection all within a week so Hikari can improve her skills before a crucial test.

Multiple playthroughs enable new choices that can lead to different outcomes and unlock additional content.

name: Super Mario Bros. Next: The Lost Levels - Part 1
Subway Surge
summary: Subway Surge is a fun endless runner game featuring pirate heroes. Navigate using your mouse, and collect gold coins by running, jumping, and sliding. Help the pirates gather all the gold!

name: Super Kart Racer
summary: Super Kart Racer is an old-school isometric karting game. Enjoy high-speed racing along with many other game modes to keep things fresh.

name: Sundown: Boogie Frights
summary: A city builder/tower defense game.

name: Superfight: The Sword & Sorcery Deck
summary: Ancient dragons, powerful wizards, and deadly quests await you in this high-fantasy themed expansion for SUPERFIGHT. Grab your wand and your sword and prepare for the most epic verbal battles you've ever encountered!

name: Super Catscape
summary: Super Catscape is a 2D sidescroller retro platformer about Kim, a brave kitten who is abducted by strange alien creatures. Kim has to find a way to escape from the strange alien planet, saving all captive pets in his way back to Earth.

name: Super Mu
summary: Super Mu is an original Shoot 'em Up. Through the 7 levels, face your enemies, become stronger and fight for your destiny.

name: Superfight: The Election Deck
summary: Tired of all the same old Trump vs Hillary internet fights? Wish they were a little more… SUPER? Well delete your emails and hold on to your cyber, because we’re going to kick November right in the primaries with the digital-only Election Deck for Superfight the Video Game!

name: Sudoku Classic
summary: Sudoku is an addictive puzzle the world over! A grid divided into nine 3x3 boxes have a few numbers inserted to begin with. Fill the empty spaces so that the numbers 1-9 appear only once in each row, column and 3x3 box.

name: Superfight: The History Deck
summary: From Alexander Hamilton and Harriet Tubman to Vlad the Impaler, the greatest heroes and villains from human history are ready to fight in this SUPERFIGHT expansion. So get ready for the most absurd historical debates you've ever had!

name: Surrender 2
summary: Surrender, Book 2 is the second and final book of the Surrender series. It succeeds its first book, Surrender, Book 1.

name: Super Mario Kart DS
summary: A Super Mario Kart hack that put all of the MKDS nitro tracks / nitro battle arenas in Super Mario Kart. It also replaces Donkey Kong JR by Donkey Kong.

name: Super Bikes 2
summary: Super Bikes is now in Hi-Def! With a 42” LCD, 10 never-before seen tracks, all new light show and tons of electrifying effects, Super Bikes 2 will blow your mind! Race through Moab as fighter jets attack UFOs, descend into the haunted catacombs of Paris, and dodge giant worms in hyperspace. Escape elephants in the jungles of Thailand, jump through the flaming hoops of Vegas, run with the bulls in Spain and cruise through the unbelievable snow-covered mountaintops of the Himalayas. Choose from 9 riders and 12 bikes with multiple tricked-out upgrades for engines, decals, tires and more! Players can create a unique PIN to save and track their statistics. Super Bikes 2 retains all the exciting components as the original Super Bikes, and is built on a highly reliable system featuring RIO and DELL computers.

name: Surgeon Simulator 2: Deluxe Edition
summary: Scrub up with the Surgeon Simulator 2 Deluxe Edition and really get your heartbeat racing with Closed Beta access (7-9th Aug 2020), the Superhero cosmetic set, the Season Pass and more! Out 27th August 2020.

name: Super Lemonade Factory Part Two
summary: Usually when you see a description of a sequel that starts with "The two main characters are back and bigger than ever" it's a sure sign of a cash grab. Andre and Liselot are back, and this game is bigger than ever! Super Lemonade Factory Two has more of everything you loved about the first, more zany dialog, more gorgeous pixel art and more spikes. Taking place around the globe in Sydney Australia, New York City and a military base.

name: Super Pinball Maker
summary: Make and share your pinball creations, draw pixelart on the layout!

name: Sugoi Girls: Lovely Wife
summary: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Super House of Dead Ninjas: True Ninja Pack
summary: Now you can play as the fearsome One-Armed Ninja from the original House of Dead Ninjas, try your hand at the all new super hard "Ninja" Difficulty, AND refine your weapon skills with the dreaded Hookshot. Can you handle all this ninja goodness?

name: Sudoku Micro
summary: Sudoku Micro is a homebrew sudoku game for the Game Boy Advance.

name: Suzuki Bakuhatsu
summary: A bomb-disposal puzzle game released exclusively in Japan.

name: Summer Mahjong
summary: Summer themed Mahjong game for mobiles

name: Sugar Jelly Crush
summary: Join this sweet adventure through the candy burst match deliciously sweet game. Connect matching delicious candy with jelly slime to create a flow.

name: Super Mario Bros: Mythical Mushrooms
summary: There is a legend that tells of five mythical mushrooms of untold power. Mario sets off on a journey to collect these mushrooms in this challenging metroidvania platformer.

name: Super Mario Bros: Bloody Battles
summary: Bowser somehow got ahold of deadly weapons, and is using them to terrorize the Mushroom Kingdom, spilling blood everywhere. It is up to you to avenge the deaths of so many. Annihilate Bowser and his minions with all kinds of weapons.

name: Survival: Fountain of Youth - Sea Wolf Pack
summary: Customize your home with a set of nautical decorative items

name: Super Mario Bros: Journey to Peach
summary: Mario goes on a journey to save Peach.

name: Subject 264
summary: You wake up in a room with a total black out, a lot of creepy noises can be heard, you want to leave but this place doesn't want to let you go. Your only chance to escape will be to remember your past and to overcome any obstacles placed on your paths. Will you escape ?

name: Survival & Horror: The Damned City
summary: Survival & Horror: The Damned City tells the story of a cursed city where you'll have to face various enemies and bosses, each requiring a unique approach and knowledge of their weaknesses. Your father has disappeared, and you have come to this city to find him.

name: Supernatural
summary: A rhythm game focused on fitness, exclusive to Oculus Quest. A new workout is added daily.

name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Zero's Armor and Helmet
Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Proto Man's Armor and Helmet
Super Tony Land
summary: Super Tony Land is a platformer with a powerful level editor and an emphasis on telling stories and building entire game worlds.

name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Teddie Hat
Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Persona 3 Protagonist Outfit and Wig
Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Knuckles Outfit and Hat
Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Sans Outfit and Mask
Super Mario Bros. 2: 2nd Run
summary: This is a hack of the original SMB2 game with new levels. The idea behind this hack is that it’s the same SMB2 game we all love, but with entirely new levels.

name: Sunny School Stories
summary: Create your own school life stories playing with tons of characters and objets

name: SushiChop
summary:
SushiChop is an easy to learn, but difficult to master slicing game. Your finger or mouse is the razor-sharp knife, as you swipe your way to sushi chopping glory!

Cut with precision and skill to fill each tray before the timer runs out. Fill a tray chopping the fewest fish necessary to earn a Perfect Chop bonus, but beware the stinky green fish!

Satisfy your Sushi craving and download SushiChop today. Don't worry, if you lose, you're already at the chopping block!

name: Super High-Way
summary: A driving game in the style of Night Driver and 280 ZZZAP by Taito.

name: Survival
summary: FPS games. Players in the game as a soldier is about to enter the battlefield, there is no teammate in the battlefield, only the enemy, as soon as possible to collect surrounding materials to arm themselves, survive to the end to win!

name: Super Infiniboss: The Gauntlet
summary: Super Infiniboss: The Gauntlet is an endless boss battle arcade platformer. It's about you, an ever-changing boss, and tons of projectiles. Choose a character, get as many points as you can, and work towards unlocking more characters.

name: Super QuickHook
summary: The hat filled sequel to the hit iPhone game Hook Champ.

name: Sunshine & Overcast
summary: Sunshine & Overcast is a visual novel.

name: Super Family Circuit
summary: Super Family Circuit is a Racing game, developed by Game Studio and published by Namco, which was released in Japan in 1994.

name: Sus Hat
summary: A game with mostly linearly gameplay and turn-based battles about looking for secrets and colecting items, outfits and equipment.

name: Super Arcade Soccer 2021
summary:
SUPER ARCADE SOCCER 2021 lets you play soccer like never before, combining the best in new technology and classic retro games. It’s the best of both worlds!
Tactics meets intense gameplay in a one-of-a-kind game you’re sure to enjoy.
Face off against IA like you’ve never seen before. Enjoy a wide variety of competitions and an extensive database with the best teams and players in the world.

Play with or against your friends in leagues, cups and friendlies. Even a local 2 vs 2 match!

Pass, dribble, shoot, head, volley... Do whatever it takes to outscore your opponent by the final whistle.

FEATURES

-Real-life teams and players (Clubs and International Teams).
-Leagues, cups and friendly matches.
-Local 2 vs 2 matches.
-Awesome ball physics.
-Configure your lineup.
-Choose from different tactics.
-Real-life sound.
-Player has 7 skills (shooting, passing, aerial ability, strength, control, stamina and speed).
-Endless ways to customize each player (hair, beard, physique, skin tone, etc.).

The game includes 100 clubs, 60 international teams and 1,800 players based on real-life players.

name: Summer BBQ: Grilled Barbeque
summary: Summer BBQ: Grilled Barbeque was a game playable in the German Burger King app.

name: Sunset Land
summary: Our story takes place on Venture, a planet that has recently been colonized by several corporations to harvest its valuable resources. You play as a psychic named Marco, who is tasked with stealing 3 stellar crystals (artifacts which contain tremendous amounts of energy) for an intergalactic mob boss.

name: Super Pixel Kid
summary: Super Pixel Kid is 2D platform adventure game. There are 5 adventure worlds in the game, a total of 100 levels, each adventure world ends with a final boss. Control pixel kid to run, jump blocks and explore the arcades. Travel across dangerous jungle, cave, etc. Collect coins, gold, acceleration props to help you defeat the Monster! Have fun!

name: Super Metroid: Global Warming
summary: After defeating Mother Brain and detonating Tourian, the shockwave of the explosion shifted the orbital path of Planet Zebes, moving it closer to the sun. Over time, the Zebian polar ice caps melted, leaving the entire planet submersed underwater. Samus returns to Zebes twenty years later to confront a second Mother Brain that spawned out of the depths, along with new dangers.

name: Succubus Dating
summary: What do you do when you find out your date is a succubus? Either run away or...

name: Super Vadimka X
summary: Super Vadimka X - a free action video game made by two developers VadimBallzGame and HyperTheLoopa420 for Windows. This is the first Super Vadimka game for 16-bit style and the first game in the Super Vadimka X series, a spin-off of the original Super Vadimka series that started on the predecessor. The Super Vadimka X game was first released in honor of the International Women's Day holiday on March 8, 2023 and was released in Europe and America in the same year. The game takes place after the event 1 month ago, years after the original Super Vadimka, in a beautiful world inhabited by both people and "Monsters", the Evil Super Pupkin decided to somehow take over the world and kill the main character will the main character be able to survive.

name: Super Trashforce
summary: The near future. The world was flooded with waste from factories. Over time, almost all the land is bogged down in the waste. All garbage and chemicals were able to reach even to hell itself. Satan did not like it very much and he sent his creations to the ground in order to destroy all people for this garbage.

name: Super Speed Race GP V
summary: A deluxe cabinet variant of Super Speed Race GP.

name: Sushido vs. Zombies
summary: A new spin on the classic Sushi Ninja Action genre. Throw sushi like ninja stars to protect your shop from the approaching zombies.

name: Super Cube Attack
summary: Super Cube Attack is an action-filled minimalist twin-stick arena shooter. Blast your way through randomly generated levels with a variety of different unlockable weapons.

name: Survive the Troll
summary: Survive the Troll is a "Chill" Real Time Strategy game in which you play as a Troll, a charismatic Hero you can upgrade in your base, or as an Elf, a builder which is common food for the Troll. Cooperate or destroy. You choose.

name: Super Clash Crossover
summary: Adventure mode & Battle mode! Play as indie characters or "Workshop characters." Make your own levels & campaigns with the in-game editor. Workshop support includes adding new graphics & sound. Unlimited free skins from the community.

name: Survarium: Steam Shotgun Pack
summary: This package is designed for lovers of mid-distance fights. Shatter your enemies with the formidable MP-27M Lancaster "Thunderbolt" and benefit from other items provided in this exclusive shotgun pack!

name: Summer of Love
summary: In Summer of Love, you can have a happy ending (Romance Ending or Harem Ending), a neutral ending (Swinging Ending) or a sad ending (Netorare Ending) depending on how you play.

name: SuperBoys: The Big Fight
summary: A mobile platform fighting game from mooffgames.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Cats 2
summary: Puzzles of cats!

name: Sus Virus Amogus
summary: Sus Virus Amogus is a sci-fi action-roguelike game. A lost scientist on an endless space station battles hostile soldiers and robots, using random weapons with unique effects to progress deeper into the station.

name: Super Zugan: Hakotenjou kara no Shoutai
summary: A Super Famicom comedic Mahjong game with an overarching storyline. It was followed by a sequel a few years later.

name: Survive to Live!
summary: This is a casual game that combines tower defense and survival, constantly gaining strength in a tidal wave of monsters. Combine tower defense trap river players to swim and survive.

name: Suspension Railroad Simulator
summary: Experience the unique atmosphere of the Wuppertal Suspension Railroad Simulator!

name: Super Navecitas 2
summary: This video game is a space shooter in which all the elements are made in cardboard. The game tells the story of Cafard a Martian cockroach on his journey to Silcon Valley where the fate of his race and humanity will be decided.

name: SubRoc 3D
summary: SubRoc 3-D is a shooter, where you look through a periscope and shoot at both sea and air-targets. The arcade version features 3-D effects.

name: Super Formation Soccer 95: della Serie A - UCC Xaqua
summary: The UCC Xaqua version is a kind of promotional edition, the idea was to promote a sports drink (energy drink) called Xaqua (manufactured by UCC and endorsed by the Italian Football League) with the participation or partnership of the Italian footballer Roberto Baggio (clearly visible on the back of the game packaging), via a contest held in 1995 in which the participants had to correctly answer three questions and return the postcard. The winners received the cartridge as a prize. Only 3000 copies were distributed. In the opening scene instead of having the cinematic intro sequence showing all the team logos, there is an advertisement of Xaqua featuring Roberto Baggio (1993 FIFA World Player of the Year). Also the box art is different, and in the UCC Xaqua version there is a strong hidden team called Xaqua.

name: Sunset Coast Collection
summary: Solve cases and bring help along the sunset coast!

name: Survive In Strange World
summary: Action adventure strategy game with tower defense, in a fantasy world, use your own combat skills, weapons, and the power of your partners to survive. Face the ultimate fate with your unique combat style.

name: Suspension
summary:
A 10 minute game about Mark Wonnacott's final year of university.

One good ending, and one satisfying ending.

name: Suzuka 8 Hours
summary: A motorcycle game from Namco.

name: Superhero Girl Salon: Kids Makeup and Dressup Game
summary:
This is the fully unlocked version and it does not have advertisements! 

Are you ready to be a hero girl that is loved by millions of people worldwide? In Hero Girls Salon you can now be the hero in the sky that everyone looks up to and admires! But before you start your first mission, you need to get pampered at the spa with a facial, put on your makeup and costume, and choose a super power! Have fun but be careful: like all heroes, you must keep your true identity a secret. That means no one should be able to recognize you after your makeover! 

Features:
* 3 powerful girls of different skin colors to choose: Electric Blue, Pretty Powers and Mighty Maria
* You can do spa, makeup and dress up in cool hero costumes
* Countless makeup, costumes and accessories to choose from

So don't hesitate anymore, now it's your turn to create your own hero style and become the most shining one!

name: Suuri muumijuhla
summary: A game about waking the Moomin family and setting up a Spring Festival party. Game has a number of minigames, such as a side-scrolling ballooning game, directing a play and navigating a maze.

name: Super Pole Riders
summary: A pole-vaulting polo game, part of the Sportsfriends collection.

name: Survival Diary
summary: Survival Diary, a telltale-sandbox game with strong RPG characteristics and based on random events.

name: Super Kickers League: Vikings and Valkyries!
summary: Super Kickers League : Vikings & Valkyries! brings nordics theme and elemental powers to Super Kickers League! Get two new teams with their own captains and abilities, as well as one new map (playable by day or by night) and new music !

name: Sun Sport Fishing: Keiryuu-ou
summary: Sun Sport Fishing: Keiryuu-ou is a Sports game, developed by Lenar and published by Imagineer, which was released in Japan in 1994.

name: Superfight: The Anime Deck
summary: The Anime Deck is an expansion to SUPERFIGHT that adds over 80 cards inspired by your favorite anime. From pocket monsters, to titans, to sailor scouts, this deck is ready to raise your fights to a new level of insanity, the kind you can only find in Japan.

name: Sunrose.p8
summary: Sunrose.p8 is a demake of Sunrose featuring little sunroses. Z + left and right arrow keys.

name: Super Lee World
summary: Inspired on the classics, but with unique challenges, enemies and worlds.

name: Surface: Game of Gods - Collector's Edition
summary: Save your friends and escape from a deadly game!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Beaches 2
summary: Puzzles of beautiful beaches!

name: Super Passport Bros
summary: Join Matt and Pat as they traverse through strange lands to find their love interests. This game is a 3D platformer with platforming elements. This game has secret levels, secret characters and multiple endings.

name: SuteF
summary: suteF is a puzzle platforming game where you must push boxes, grapple walls, activate switches, and avoid lasers to make your escape from the dreaded land known only as the 'Abyss.'

name: Surprising My Neighbors 2
summary: Surprising My Neighbors 2 – a first-person game where you will be leaving your surprises at the doors of your favorite neighbors. You moved to a new city a year ago. One morning, you went outside and found poop at your door again. It looks like someone of your new neighbors left it there.

name: Super Runner VR
summary: SUPER RUNNER is a virtual reality game where you have to complete hard challenges interact with a variety of tools , weapons vehicle and objects to complete the challenges

name: SushiVR
summary: SushiVR is a VR game in which the player becomes a general of a sushi restaurant and holds the sushi as the customer wants one after another and provides them quickly.

name: Supreme OS
summary: Supreme OS is an operating system that runs on your operating system. With such stupendously amazing features as agile mail servers, exciting terminal commands, puzzles for your puzzles and the occasional AI singularity, Supreme OS is bound to be a game-changer!

name: Supertan Marioner 3D Infinity World Adventures
summary: The adventures of Super marioner continue. This time with 3D design. Travel through the jungle with marioner. Jump between platforms. Try not to fall in this endless speeding adventure. You have 3 rights. Try to make the highest record

name: Successor of the Moon
summary: A classic 2D side-scrolling action (Metroidvania) game. The young priestess embarks on a journey to solve the monsters' suspicious movements in Parthenope. Seek the help of your peers and elves, Acquire a variety of abilities, and reach the end to discover the truth.

name: Super Hamster Ball
summary: The cutest puzzle action game ever! Hamsters are so cute!

name: Superhero Fruit: Robot War
summary: Create your own style and become the ultimate fighting robot in the extremely lovely and interesting free game - Superhero Fruit

name: Sugar Coat Freaks
summary: Sugar Coat Freaks is a visual novel developed by Littlewitch.

name: Super Armand
summary: Super Armand is a game about a mime who has to find his way back to his girlfriend! Help Super Armand overcome junk food enemies to find his girlfriend.

name: Suits: Absolute Power
summary: A business planet full of mystery, relics of power, dangerous jobs and terrifying monstrosities. Will your company defy the toxicity of this environment or will you find yourselves courting the power of corruption itself, in absolution.

name: Super Pipeline 2
summary: Connect the pipelines correctly for the water to reach its destination.

name: Sudoku
summary: A homebrew game of Sudoku for Atari 8 bit systems.

name: S.U.D.O.K.U.
summary: Place a number inside a square grid and ensure that all rows and columns do not contain the same number twice.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Butterflies
summary: Puzzles of beautiful Butterflies!

name: Super Slapshot
summary: A generic 5-on-5 hockey game endorsed by 'Mr. Hockey' Gordie Howe. There are 32 international teams to choose from in exhibition and tournament. The gameplay features realistic hockey action with penalties and up close fights. There are 10 or more pages of hockey stats available during games.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Random Puzzles
summary: Puzzles of awesome random images!Content: 30 Puzzles in 4 levels of difficulty.

name: Super Solvers: Spellbound!
summary: Super Solvers: Spellbound! teaches players to spell elementary-level words with a variety of colorful minigames.

name: Super Mario Logic
summary:
Super Mario Logic is a ROM hack/mod of Super Mario World, which transforms the game in a puzzle/platform game. The player has to use the game mechanics to proceed to the next screen.

Kamek has cast a magical spell on the Mushroom Kingdom, turning it into a strange new land. Join Mario on a brand new adventure as he conquers each task an order to break the spell and return the land back to normal.

name: Superman Returns: The Videogame
summary: Inspired by the Warner Bros. Pictures feature film and more than 60 years of DC Comics' lore. As the Man of Steel, you’ll hone your unworldly super powers such as Flight, X-Ray Vision, Heat Vision, Super Hearing, Super Strength, Super Speed, and Super Breath to fight villains that only Superman can defeat.

name: Super 20 in 1
summary:
A bootleg cartridge released in Korea. It included NES games.

1. Spartan X (Kung Fu)
2. Super Mario Bros.
3. Antarctic Adventure
4. Twin Bee
5. Battle City
6. Circus Troupe
7. Galaga
8. Yie Ar Kung-Fu
9. Star Force
10. Road Fighter
11. Pinball
12. Bomberman
13. Tetris
14. Arkanoid
15. BallonFight
16. Donkey Kong
17. Gorilla 3 (Donkey Kong 3)
18. Donkey Kong Jr.
19. Mr. Mary (Mario Bros.)
20. Popeye

name: Super Bomberman
summary: Super Bomberman is an action-maze game, part of the Bomberman series, released for mobile phones

name: Super Star Wars: Return of the Jedi
Super Tyrone Land
summary:
Tyrone has finally gotten a day out of the hosptial treating his horrible cancerus tumour. When he is about to buy an ice cream with his last savings however, a man in a wheelchair wheels up and stabs him in the kidneys! It´s up to Tyrone to get his wallet back! 
 
Super Tyrone land is a game in the same vein as the first super mario game, you progress through levels, collect coins (supplimented with candy canes) and try not to die horribly. The twist however is the smooth controls, wall and double jumping and incredible hazards in the way. 
 
Can you complete the game? Get the highest score? Or will you perish in the flames of failure?

name: Super Island Survival
summary: An action adventure cartoon sequel, thrilling monster challenges, gorgeous exploration career, meet expectations

name: Superpower Squad
summary: Feel free to talk to us in the steam community and give us your game Suggestions.High energy group is a unique funny action class ported game, you need to select the kapa incarnation hero, with friends a super art fight, play to your imagination, select and match the joy of the good equipment, show off your operation, you can choose...

name: SuperHero in Training
summary: SuperHero in Training is an upcoming VR Action Platformer planned to be released in late 2019/early 2020. The game puts the player in a comic-styled futuristic city. The player’s goal is to become the best hero they can, but in a world of heroes how is this possible?

name: SuborWin 2000
summary: A Windows 2000 simulator for the NES.

name: Sub Hunt
summary: In Sub Hunt you control a group of four submarines one at a time. The goal is to destroy six convoys which will be attempting to cross the stretch of sea you are guarding. You can aim and fire torpedoes using a periscope view, have your submarine dive and surface, and adjust your speed. An overhead display allows you to strategically move your submarines in the position of your choice. There are five difficulty levels to choose from.

name: Superstar Ping Pong
summary: Superstar Ping Pong is a table tennis game for Commodore 64.

name: Super Orb Collector
summary: Super Orb Collector is a fun top down agility game that lets you test your hand-eye coordination. The goal of this game is to collect all the white dots and reach the exit portal while avoid hitting the colored objects. Many moving obstacles can kill you at any time, so plan your moves carefully!

name: Super Stardust HD Team Add-on Pack
summary:
This is an upgrade pack for Super Stardust™ HD. You must already own the full title to make use of this upgrade. 
 
Give your trigger finger a boost with the new Team Pack! Team Pack features Split-Screen Versus mode and Split-Screen Co-op for Super Stardust™ HD, the reinvigorated, High Definition version of the asteroid-blasting format that’s been a classic since the early days of video arcade games. Split-Screen Co-op allows players to work together at blasting the asteroid menace, while Split-Screen Versus features game modes including ‘Deathmatch’ and ‘King of the Hill’ for up to four players. The pack also features a Ship Editor feature that allows gamers to customize their spacecraft, as well as enhanced visual effects.

name: Super Smash Bros. for Wii U: Ryu
summary: Ryu joins the world of Super Smash Bros. to continue his quest to be the strongest, and he even brought his own stage! Enter his famous button combos to power up his special moves!

name: Super Meat Boy: Ultra Edition
summary:
Super Meat Boy: Ultra Edition is the retail edition of Super Meat Boy.
Items in the case:
A Meat Boy 40 page booklet that is half comic half sketchbook.
A mini poster hidden in the box.
A soundtrack disk.
Warp Zone art collection.

name: SuperEat Man
summary: After 6 years of self-exile, food delivery hero SuperEat Man returns to Pepper City to fight for his redemption and honor against him and his father's nemesis in this "stunt 'n gun" third-person shooter.

name: Superstar Shootout
summary: Superstar Shootout was an online Flash game that was part of the official Mario Hoops 3-on-3 website. The game is not currently playable from any official source, as the site is defunct. Superstar Shootout was not listed in the Nintendo Arcade, the section on nintendo.com dedicated to promotional web games. Dribble Skillz, on the other hand, was.

name: Super Gloves Hero
summary: Can you save the Shubby planet from the most dangerous pirate spaceship?

name: Substation
summary: Substation is a first-person shooter set in an underwater base taken over by aliens.

name: Survive Undead Rush
summary: Outrun, upgrade, and survive the relentless zombie onslaught!

name: Super Mario Bros. Enhanced
summary: This is a remake of the classic Super Mario Bros. in the SMW engine using SMB3 graphics. There are also two new worlds for you to explore.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Summer 2020
summary: Great images to say good bye to Summer 2020

name: Super Mario 64 Sonic Edition
summary:
Super Mario 64 Sonic Edition is ROMhack/mod of Super Mario 64 that replaces Mario with Sonic, changing the gameplay style to be similar as the gameplay seen in the Sonic Adventure series.
Sonic can run much faster, run over the water and do recognizable techniques such as the Homing Attack, the Spin Dash. When in water, Sonic can't swim, he jumps infinitely instead.
Sonic can also go Super and the player can change the damage system to that of Mario 64 or that of the Sonic series.

name: Surviving the Aftermath: Day One Edition
Suzuki Super-bikes II: Riding Challenge
summary: Suzuki Super-bikes II: Riding Challenge is the sequel to Super-bikes: Riding Challenge and was released on the PS2 and DS.

name: Suzumiya Haruhi no Tomadoi
summary: Suzumiya Haruhi no Tomadoi is a visual novel where you are tasked to help the super game producer Haruhi Suzumiya to create the best video game in the world! Give orders to the SOS Brigade members, manage their timetables, and create one in four weeks to make it worthy of Haruhi's tastes.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Bridges
summary: Puzzles of Bridges!

name: Super Lobster Run
summary: Embark on an Epic Journey as Laughy the Lobster

name: Supersonic Acrobatic Rocket-Powered Battle-Cars
summary: Supersonic Acrobatic Rocket-Powered Battle-Cars is a football game where players drive around in cars. Players can drive around on the walls and ceiling, and can do tricks to speed up their cars.

name: Super Friends Party
summary: Play minigames with up to 6 players in this online minigame multiplayer game! Connect up with your friends or strangers as you battle it out to find a champion! All minigames are free to play, so get a friend or 5, what are you waiting for?

name: SuperTanks
summary: Battle against friends using tanks and their weapons. Find bonuses on map and use them to your adventage. All tanks can use bullets, lasers, bombs, temporary speed or special sphere where bullets are slower. Game can be streamed on Twitch and other streaming platforms.

name: Subwaydle
summary: A daily puzzle game in which players must reach a target station in the New York City subway system using only a series of three trains, Each incorrect guess will reveal information about which trains are used in the solution, and at what point they are taken.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Big Cats Puzzles
summary: Puzzles of spectacular Big Cats!

name: Super Space Snake
summary: Slither your way in this super space snake game! Control the Space Snake up, down, left and right in this endless snake game! Slither through space and grow your snake by devouring the space pellets in your path. As you grow from Baby Snake, Tiny Snake all the way to Super Space Snake, the space grid grows to create an unlimited universe for you to navigate. Slither fast to reach your meal before they suddenly turn into deadly space mines. And watch out for the laser borders, slither into them and it’s snake game over! Enjoy exciting endless snake game set in space that is arcade fun for all ages!

name: Super Mario Bros. Dimensions
summary: Super Mario Bros. Dimensions is a fan game by LangtonLion64. It features a dimension switching mechanic that changes the level and its challenges.

name: Sumrak
summary: A short visual novel about fear, choice, miracle, adventure, friendship, love. A game for one warm, dreamy evening with a cup of tea and cookies. At the beginning of the story, a small surprise awaits in the form of a mini-platformer to find out what happens next.

name: SurrealVR
summary: Giant emojis? Check. Robot puppies? Check. Avatars? Check. Doodle with friends? Check. Come hang out in a surreal, magical place being built by people who love virtual reality, gaming, and buzzing dinosaurs with drones.

name: Summoner: A Goddess Reborn
summary: As the Queen of Halassar, your fate is written in the Book of the Prophets as the savior of all creation. Millions adore you as the goddess reborn, yet enemies surround you. You must fulfill the prophecy and become the goddess Laharah. But the path you follow remains a mystery that takes the Queen and her companions to the far-flung corners of the world and beyond. To save your people, you must learn to summon godlike powers to let your destiny unfold.

name: Sun City
summary: Losing your father a few years after your mother's death caused great trauma to you. You wanted to go to the house of the step-aunt, who lives in SunCity. That's where your intrigue, sex, fun and career adventure starts for you.

name: Summer Memory of Bell
summary: 这是一款在三年前由暨南大学无名漫画社Galgame部制作，在三年后的今天重新优化了的、关于夏天的纯爱Galgame。

name: Surfer Bunny
summary: A tiny gameboy game based on a cool character created by cool friends, one of whom is Peter who drew the cool fullscreen art!!!

name: Super Dogfight
summary: Two-Player only game

name: Super Skidmarks Data Disks
summary:
This package adds a number of new features to the chaotic and thrilling racing game Super Skidmarks. The major additions are 2 new track disks, featuring a total of 12 new tracks (taking the game up to 36), featuring the succession of loops, jumps and crossovers of the original.

In addition, the track disks are now fully hard-disk installable (the program and car disks always were). The program disk has been replaced with an updated one, featuring two new difficulty levels and new championships to take advantage of the new tracks.

name: Surface: The Noise She Couldn't Make
summary: On a lonely stretch of highway, a young girl is found unconscious, a bloody knife lying next to her. Was she a victim, or did she attack someone? Her doctors are baffled when she fails to respond to treatment. Desperate, they call you in to help. As a psychic, you’re used to working with clients who can talk to you. But this girl can’t. Enter her mind and work to discover...the noise she couldn’t make...

name: Super Price Series: Paipai
summary:
Super Price Series - Paipai is a mahjong paipai game since in this game the player doesn't compete againts 3 players like in a classic mahjong, instead of that in this game the gameplay is similar to the Shanghai series, the player has to make all the pieces dissappear 2 by 2, matching 2 pieces of the same form.

The game features a 2 players vs mode and different computer difficulty levels.

name: Survivor Jones
summary: Jump, Swing, Fight, Survive! Fast paced game-play, arcade style, rogue lite mechanics and procedurally generated levels. Each level is a new challenge every time.

name: Super Retro Platformer Collection
summary: Our partner Leoful has announced a collection of four Nintendo Switch games we have developed or ported to Nintendo Switch. The Super Retro Platformer Collection will release in Asia on 13th of January 2023

name: Super Pika Land Ultra: Chocolate Version
summary: The sort-of sequel to Super Pika Land Ultra Vanilla, another Super Mario World ROM hack. Unlike Vanilla, it uses custom blocks, sprites, ASM, and all that other cool stuff. And the enemies are actually Pokémon this time! Ain't technology wonderful?! It's about 60 levels long with a couple of well-hidden surprises and "references."

name: Super Mario Starlight
summary: Super Mario Starlight is a solo project that takes a unique spin on a traditional hack. The game has a hub world that lets you explore and find levels freely, but the stages themselves are linear, like a traditional Mario game. Think Peach's Castle from 64 with about 20ish linear stages instead of open world stages. Yoshi Coins act as the main collectable. The more you collect, the more levels and areas of the hub world you will be able to access.

name: Sugar-Coated
summary:
My only immediate family died. I relied on my uncle and moved to Mokari village, where my father's home was.
The words that cross my head are words relentlessly repeated since childhood.
"Suoh, no matter what, I will never return to that village. Even if its body is destroyed, the demon's grudge will never go away."
Surrounded by friendly friends and beautiful features, gradually getting used to a new life.
The world peeped at the poison under the sugar coating, as if watching it.

name: Super Mario Outbreak
summary: A new virus has allegedly spread throughout the Mushroom World, and Bowser's minions are enforcing strict stay-at-home orders to prevent its further spread. Mario, knowing Bowser's history of evil deeds, is suspicious, so he violates the orders to investigate.

name: Super Live Stadium
summary: Super Live Stadium is a baseball game developed by Squaresoft in 1998. The game features a funny sense of humour (like when your character is out, etc), and some game modes like championship, and different vs modes (against another human player or against the computer), all of them with good graphics and different times of the day (day or night).

name: Super Candy Ball: Color Clash
summary:
Move balls! Match the same colors in any direction to boom them in this addictive puzzle game 2018.
If you are a big fan of brain blast games, don’t miss our matching games. Super Candy Ball -Brain blast will not let you down. Escape from boredom and stimulate your mind by moving your finger and using your talent for solving level puzzles.

name: Super Jolly RPG
summary: It's Christmas season and our pink-haired protagonist needs to buy a gift for a friend. Luckily for him, the newest mall in town has just opened! Together with his other friend, he decides to shop there. However, the mall's owner has an evil plan for that place...?! When a blackout occurs and locks our protagonists inside just as they finish buying gifts, they must venture further into the mall to find out what exactly is going on, and how to get back home in time for Christmas!

name: Super Mario World: Piranha Island
summary: Adventure through merciless piranhas which will devour any human beings who cross them.

name: Suction Co-Op
summary: Have you ever wondered how life would be as a suction cup? Now is your chance! Bring a friend – and let the sucking fun begin!

name: Super Dram World 2
summary: Super Dram World 2 is a ROM hack of Super Mario World created by PangaeaPanga and is a sequel to Super Dram World. The ROM hack was dedicated to dram55, who is best known as being one of the top Kaizo Mario World speedrunners.

name: Sukeban Deka II: Shoujo Tekkamen Densetsu
summary: Sukeban Deka II: Shoujo Tekkamen Densetsu is an Adventure game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1987.

name: Survivor
summary:
The object of the game is to perpetuate the race by introducing ten pods in the incubators which can be found all over the ship. The alien has an energy level which slowly decreases. The only way to restore the energy levels is dropping the pods in the incubators, or else devouring the little engineers to be found on board the ship. The creatures can defend themselves spitting paralysing acid, or hiding in the air vents, etc. 
 
The ship consists of 142 areas divided into four zones, which are joined by doors or air vents. Each zone has various levels, which are entered by lift. To enter a lift, a door or a vent, you only need to place yourself in front of it, and duck.

name: Subway Simulator: Moscow Train
summary: 81-765 Moscow Train. By popular demand, we are adding a train without which it is impossible to imagine the Moscow subway now. The maximum speed of the Moscow train is noticeably faster than other trains' in the game.

name: Success Story
summary: Fast food business time management game

name: Superman: World's Finest
summary: Rumored game in development by Rocksteady Studios.

name: Super Ultra Mucchin Puripuri Cyborg: Marilyn DX
summary:
Kenji was just a regular teenage boy who had a normal life, which included a girlfriend. However, everything changes when one day he comes home and discovers that his insane father has created a female cyborg. His previous attempts failed because he used an artificial brain; this time, to avoid this mistake, he takes out his son's brain and puts it into the cyborg. Poor Kenji gains a second life - as a beautiful artificial woman, whose task is to oppose a dubious world government organization.

Super Ultra Machine Cyborg Marilyn DX is an adventure game with very light RPG elements. The interaction is point-and-click; the cursor changes to icons corresponding to examining, talking, and exiting commands when placed upon an object on-screen (during sex scenes, the cursor may change to icons representing sexual actions). The player will also have to explore maze-like pseudo-3D dungeons, encountering enemies at pre-set points, and fighting them in simple one-on-one turn-based battles. The player character can use various moves, some of which deplete special energy bars, which can be replenished with items found in the dungeons. Enemies are mostly female and undress upon defeat. There are no equipment, money, or experience system of any kind.

name: Survival Zone
summary: Rich levels, in-depth gameplay, and diverse turrets. In the game, you will use your turret to defend against a variety of enemies.

name: Survivor
summary: 16 adventurous men and women, and you! With rudimentary equipment and limited resources, you must tame the environment, find your place in the team, and pass the tests that await you. Survivor is a challenge, an adventure in 3D, with challenges inspired by the hit YV show and an island to explore.

name: Sugar Sugar Rune: Koimo Osharemo Pick Up!
summary:
Based on the anime adaption of the manga by Moyoco Anno.

Aim to become a popular witch! Raise your charm and 'pick up' the boys' hearts! Make-up, exercise, making sweets and studying at the Dollhouse will all raise your charm. Use the hearts you capture to purchase clothes from the "Makai Mail Order Book", including outfits from the anime. Includes new original illustrations and full voice over by the anime cast.

name: Superfight: The Expansion One Deck
summary: The Expansion One Deck is an expansion to SUPERFIGHT that adds over 80 new characters and attributes to the core deck. This expansion contains characters and attributes that everyone will love, with the same broad appeal as the original SUPERFIGHT core deck!

name: Super Off Road: The Baja
summary: Super Off Road: The Baja is a sequel of Super Off Road. Unlike its predecessor which uses an isometric top-down view of a single-screen track, this arcade racing game is made specifically for the SNES and uses its Mode 7 hardware for a 3D racing experience with a 3rd person perspective.

name: Super Snake HD
summary: Super Snake HD is a modern take on the classic "Snake Game" formula.

name: Super Mario Advance 4: Card e+ - 3UP Mushroom
Super Turrican 2: Special Edition
summary:
Super Turrican 2: Special Edition includes:

- Super Turrican 2 Retro Cartridge
- SNES compatible game
- Manual

name: Super "Mario" World 2
summary: Super "Mario" World 2 is the sequel to Super "Mario" World from 1UPdudes. Reswob Tuppa has been defeated but the Princess is once again kidnapped. With "Mario's" biggest enemy gone who could of kidnapped the Princess? "Mario" sets out on a brand new adventure to find who is responsible! Although using a cartoony style, S"M"W2 is a full-fledged romhack with custom mechanics and a large world of 87 exits.

name: Sushi Go!
summary:
Sushi Go! is a digital adaptation of the popular card game of the same name. Players compete for the highest score, by picking sushi from a conveyor belt, and scoring the sushi they took at the end of each round. Each type of sushi earns points in different ways, and players must max their combos and prevent opponents from doing the same. 
 
Play a pair of Tempuras for 5 points, but play one on its own and you'll get none! Nigiris can be dipped in Wasabi to triple their points! Pudding doesn't score until the end of the game, but it can clinch a victory or cause a defeat! 
 
Sushi Go is simple enough to play with the family, but thousands of sushi combinations will keep even diehard strategy fans playing. Do you take a Tempura to get points for a pair? Or take Sashimi to stop your opponent from completing his triplet? Pudding doesn't earn points in the round, but you'll lose points at the end of the game if you have the fewest!

name: Subterrarium
summary: Subterrarium is a puzzle game about digging, gardening, and vending machines.

name: Super Ship Blaster
summary: This is a game that combines drifting and shooting. Players control various space ships to challenge incoming enemies. During battles, they collect different bullets and items to enhance themselves. The default basic controls for the game are as follows:

name: Super Gridland
summary:
Match tiles to collect resources while the daylight lasts. When night falls, the same tiles call bloodthirsty monsters to your meagre village.
What else might be found in these lands?

name: SuperLite 1500 Series: Oekaki Puzzle 3
summary: Complete collection of puzzle games will fill the picture based on the mass number of vertical and horizontal scratching puzzles first whenever visiting ?[third. Offers a wide range from beginners to advanced, are newly written and contained 200 questions for fulfillment. Course descriptions are also equipped with safety rules even beginners course. The configuration also introduces new features, making it more comfortable to operate.

name: Survivers
summary: A game very similar to Slender, but with a multiplayer component.

name: Super Asqr
summary: Super Asqr is all about a square, trapped in a collection of mazes and requires your precise maneuver ability to avoid obstacles and deadly hazards, such as red walls, moving orange blocks, lasers, mines and many more.

name: Suburi
summary: This App is a VR batting simulator for kids who wants to improve their batting skills.The pitcher (right handed) will throwing balls into your 16 point pitch zone randomly so you can train your hand-eye coordination at home.

name: Sulphur Nimbus: Hel's Elixir
summary:
You are Sulphur Nimbus, a hippogriff who gets stuck on a cursed island during a sidequest gone wrong. Collect magical blobs, fight weird monsters, and get lost in the depths of the earth.

You'll be able to fly wherever you want, but you're a horsebird so it won't be easy. As you dive deeper into the island's underground caverns, you must learn to manage your momentum with increasing care and precision.

Sulphur Nimbus: Hel's Elixir takes inspiration from momentum-based platformers, six-degrees-of-freedom games, action adventures and collectathons.

name: Super Girl
summary: A simple game. Collect coins, defeat monsters and get the best high score you can in this endless sidescroller.

name: Supernova
summary: Supernova is a text based adventure where you must find another life to live, after years of working your life away in some dusty, mucked up mine. The mines main source, barren metal, is running low, so it's time find another way of bringing in the profits.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Dogs Puzzles
summary: Puzzles of dogs!

name: Super Brain Cube
summary: Super Brain Cube! Your color cube puzzle clicker in space with great soundtrack.

name: SuperStar JYPNation
summary: SuperStar JYPNation is a rhythm game, made by Dalcomsoft, featuring artists from JYP Entertainment. It is also a sister game to SuperStar SMTown, SuperStar BTS, and SuperStar PLEDIS.

name: Super Robot Wars 30: Digital Ultimate Edition
Superstars V8: Next Challenge
summary: The latest game in the Black Bean racing series, developed in cooperation with professional racing driver, Gianni Morbidelli.

name: Super Robot Taisen XO
summary: Expanded port of Super Robots Taisen GC.

name: Survival & Horror: Mortanis Prisoners Prologue
summary: Survival & Horror: Mortanis Prisoners Prologue is a first part of the Survival & Horror: Mortanis Prisoners.

name: Suicide Hero
summary: Multi-person cooperative action adventure with Rogue elements, go deep into the mysterious dungeon with partners, destroy the monster nest, and carve up the ancient heritage! Or challenge the powerful magic and swallow the treasure alone!

name: Subsequence
summary: Subsequence is a linear single player story driven 3D adventure game about overcoming obstacles, solving logical puzzles and exploration of the world.

name: Super Head Esploder X
summary: Billy, our hero, falls asleep watching SMOSH videos and becomes a super hero in his 8-bit dreams. Now he must use his propeller hat, weapons skills and agility to esplode evil flying heads and SMOSH enemies to escape from this horrifying nightmare.

name: SudoKats
summary: Cats are very demanding and peculiar animals. Use your sudoku skill to help them feel one of a kind.

name: Survival & Simulator
summary: Struggle to survive on a perilous and unknown planet. Environment, climate and creatures are threats all the time, but also may be your powerful boosts. Survival Simulator - How you survive on the last day?

name: Super Mega Baseball 4: Peril Point Stadium
summary: Go yard in more stadiums across game modes with Super Mega Baseball 4 Peril Point. Stay tuned for more details coming soon!

name: Super Jungle Wrestling
summary: Can you beat the wrestling champion El Bullito?

name: Subterene
summary: Bore deep below the earth's surface in your all-terrain mining vehicle. Drill for ores, scan for artifacts, and explore an expansive subnautical cavern system.

name: Super Bros. 8
summary: Super Bros. 8 is a hack of Don Doko Don 2, released sometime in the early 1990's (likely in March 1992, as implied by its manufacture code). It was likely developed by J.Y. Company, as its PCB has two PROMs suggesting this: one reads JY-A1 and another JY211.

name: Sunset Giant
summary: "Sunset Giant" is a VR game that fights big monsters while running through a virtual city illuminated by the sunset.

name: Super Pinball Arcade
summary:
Use the flippers, plungers or shake the machine to control the ball and try to get the highest score. Sit back and watch the ball mix in with the lights and sounds.

Available via the Inflight Entertainment Service on EVA Air flights.

name: Supercooked!
summary: Cook your way to the top by beating eight exciting stages alone or with up to three friends in this action-packed new title for your SNES inspired by Ghost Town Games' Overcooked!

name: Super Mike: Classic Adventure Game
summary: A 2D adventure platformer with various levels full of opponents! Jump and fight!

name: Supreme Ruler 2020 Gold
summary: Overnight, the US dollar crashes AND the sound echoes across the globe. The economic crisis amplifies global instabilities and regional disputes, tearing the world asunder. Nations dissolve, economies collapse, and tensions escalate. Anarchy reigns supreme. The world needs a leader. At last, your time has come.

name: Super Space Jump Man
summary: Super Space Jump Man is a fun and challenging gravity based runner. Traverse from planet to planet while dodging spikes, lasers and collecting oxygen.

name: Super Chesslike Adventure
summary: A Chess RPG/strategy adventure set on an open world map. Made for people who want something different from standard Chess. Equip items to gain magic powers.

name: Suleiman's Treasure
summary: A game released for the Mega Duck/Cougar Boy in 1993.

name: Succubus Domination
summary: Succubus Dominance - is a game linking “bullet hell” and “hot succubus”.

name: Super Glow Puzzle
summary: Super Glow Puzzle is THE new and challenging puzzle game for your mobile device.

name: Super Space Serpent SE + Perpetuum: Mobile Bundle
summary: This bundle contains two Retro-Neon indie games from retro arcade inspired Belgian developer, Petrus-Games. Super Space Serpent SE: a permadeath neon retro inspired twin-stick shooter. As a ace pilot only you can save us from the invaders that came from …

name: Suzumiya Haruhi no Gyakuten 2
summary: A sequel to the fan made Japanese doujin game based on Haruhi Suzumiya and the Ace Attorney. The sequel comes packaged with the first entery in the franchise.

name: Super Choppy Orc
summary: Help Choppy Orc release his friends from their chest prisons. Strike enemies with your Axe or pin it on a wall to make a bouncy platform for Choppy Orc to jump on. Utilise the different kind of walls, each one alters the way you move through the level. Spring up, dash forward or float away!

name: Surreal Experience
summary: Surreal Experience is a surreal horror game where you've been tasked to "clean up" an abandoned office space full of homeless people. Can you kick out all the homeless people and leave the building without getting jumped?

name: Sunky the PC Port
summary: An awesome parody of SONIC-PC (by JoeDoughBoi and John-Kun) in which Sunky needs to invite 1 more friend to start a DANCE PARTY!

name: Super Wizard
summary: Super Wizard is a Roguelike action game in which more than 20 magic skills can be chosen. The different combinations of magic skills will create different battle styles. Besides, the mass amount of artifacts with various spell effects will make the battle unlimited.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Paintings Puzzles
summary: Puzzles of famous paintings!

name: Sudoku
summary: Sudoku is, obviously, a Sudoku game for CPC and Speccy. Players can select the grid size of 4x4, 6x6, 8x8, 9x9, 10x10 and 12x12, although 9x9 is default. Players then choose the difficulty. The object is to fill in each empty spot with a number of 1 to 9. On the 10x10 and 12x12 grids, the letters A and A to C are also used. Each horizontal row, vertical column and sub-grid can contain a number only once.

name: Super Stardust Portable
summary:
Experience Super Stardust Portable originally released on the PSP system, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

Defend five vulnerable planets from incoming danger as you explode into some manic shoot ’em up action. Take out entire space fleets across two exciting game modes: Arcade and Planet.

name: Sugar Fruits
summary: Sugar Fruits offers a serene puzzle experience where you release a cascade of colorful fruits with strategic taps, aiming to align matching types for chain reactions and high scores before the basket overflows.

name: Super Mario 3D World
summary:
Rescue the Sprixie Princess and her followers by yourself or with three other players in this enhanced version of Super Mario 3D World, released as part of the Super Mario 3D World + Bowser’s Fury bundle.

As an enhanced version of Super Mario 3D World, some brand new gameplay improvements have been made to spice up this adventure. All characters have received a boost to their running speed and climb even higher after picking up a Super Bell, making platforming that little bit snappier. You can now also use gyro controls for certain sections of the game that previously required touch controls.

As well as same system and local wireless co-op play with up to four people, you can now play Super Mario 3D World together online for the very first time! Choose your character before each course and use all four characters’ different abilities to see everything that the Sprixie Kingdom has to offer.
developers: Nintendo EAD Tokyo Software Development Group No.1

name: Super 3D Maze 16
summary: Trapped in a neon labyrinth, Elias Nova wished he'd played Super 3D Maze 16 during his astronaut training. Unfortunately, he didn't, so it'll be up to you, intrepid gamer, to guide Elias through these mazes in search of a way out.

name: Super Keiba 2
summary: Super Keiba 2 is a Sports game, developed by Tomcat System and published by I'Max, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Sunset of Ate
summary: An open world TPS science fiction game

name: Super Collapse! II Platinum
summary: One of the most popular and addictive games to ever hit the web goes Platinum! Now with over 120 challenging puzzles, this updated edition also includes all new blocks, music, sound effects and more! Even post your scores to the Global High Score list and see how you rank with other players! Collapse fans will also find the full original Collapse, with enhanced graphics, sound effects and some surprises. The ultimate version of a classic hit, go Platinum today!

name: Super Mario Gravity
summary: Super Mario Gravity is a Super Mario Galaxy 2 mod featuring brand new galaxies. This mod will feature over 30 galaxies and will be playable legally on any homebrew-enabled Wii or Wii U console.

name: Super Scrabble
