summary: With all that Super Scrabble has to offer, even the most traditional Scrabble player will smile with delight. Watch the computer scan its 40,000+ word dictionary! ZOOM to any part of the game board for a close-up view. Think your opponent's trying to pull a fast one? CHALLENGE the word! Stuck trying to use your letters? Use the DUMP option to replace them! 5 skill levels and 4 different playing options make every game a mind-bending challenge!

name: Sunland Hike
summary: Unveil the tranquility of nature in this captivating walking simulator. Immerse yourself in the picturesque landscapes of Sunland, where every step leads to a new discovery. Your ultimate goal? Find hidden gems scattered throughout the terrain, each more breathtaking than the last. ️

name: Summit of the Wolf
summary: Summit of the Wolf is a poignant point-and-click graphic novel adventure. A young girl wakes up in an ethereal garden and sets out on a personal journey to the fabled Summit of the Wolf, whereupon she must uncover the tragic events that led to her arrival in this fantasy realm.

name: Super Hero VR
summary: Attacking enemies, using all kinds of skills to save human beings. such as Laser, magic ,gun, missile ,curse, bomb, bow .Be a HERO. You can move freely using HTC Vive (if you have enough space) and teleport yourself. Huge battle scenes, advanced game level design.

name: Super Vadimka X2
summary: Super Vadimka X2 - is a free video game made by two developers VadimBallzGame and HyperTheLoopa420 for Windows. The game was released on April 9, 2023, and in North America in 2023. This is a direct sequel to Super Vadimka X, released in the same year. The action of Super Vadimka X2 takes place in the near future, a new opponent named Chris Chan wants to take over the world and kill the main character Super Vadimka X will the hero be able to survive a second time.

name: Suns of Wiraqocha
summary: Help the God Wiraqocha to recover all the stolen suns that have been hidden in different dimensions, which you can access through the Great Gate of the Sun, to return light to the Milky Way.

name: Sunless Sea: Zubmariner Edition
summary: Take the helm of your steamship and set sail for the unknown!

name: Survive Planet Yubglub
summary: Survive Planet Yubglub is a survival rouge-lite, where Earth Representatives must hurl dodgeballs while evading toxic slime aliens and their lethal projectiles. The Earth Reps. must carefully navigate through the harsh environment of planet Yubglub. Choose your character, and Survive Planet Yubglub!

name: SuperSecret
summary: SuperSecret is a tiny 3rd-person adventure where you run around, meet a couple of weirdos, solve a puzzle, and do cool stuff. You like cool stuff, don't you? I think maybe you like cool stuff.

name: SuperDriver
summary: An arcade game in the style of retro games, fast, fun and incredibly challenging game.

name: Suzy Cube
summary: 3-D platforming perfection full of variety, peril and smiles around every corner!

name: Super Pinkie World 3
summary: After Pinkie Pie rescued her friends they decided to throw Pinkie a party as a way of saying thank you. Follow Rainbow Dash to the party while avoiding Parasprites and David Bowie.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Birds Puzzles
summary: Puzzles of awesome birds!

name: Super Chinese Fighter
summary: A fighting game starring characters from the Super Chinese series.

name: Super Pixel Maker
summary: Create, play and share levels

name: Survivor's Guilt: Survival
summary:
What would you do if you were trapped in an elevator by a great earthquake?
Can you survive an unprecedented disaster?

name: Survivor!
summary: Survivor! is an adventure roguelike game. In the game, you can endlessly harvest enemies, upgrade your skills, and defeat the menacing enemy army. Waves of legions are coming, ready for a battle of heroes?

name: Super Karts
summary: Drive your own racing kart, passing and dodging your opponents and earning gold with Super Karts! Track you scores on the leader board and watch your winnings grow. Develop your driving skills at practice speed. Then power up the action for faster, more challenging racing.

name: Surveillance Kanshisha
summary:
Surveillance Kanshisha is a First-Party PlayStation 2 Adventure Science fiction interactive game published by Sony Computer Entertainment Japan with animation created by Production I.G.

It takes place in the 2050s where a United Nations-created special forces unit called Shadow Sword is deployed to protect the Earth-Mars travel route from anti-UN terrorists called Neo Kleit, conducting terrorist attacks to remove the UN's control of the space program. A special public security surveillance network is unveiled for the first time called Project Surveillance, which is used to assist Shadow Sword operatives in their work in apprehending and hunting down the terrorists.

name: Survive the Orcs
summary: Slay thousands of pesky orcs and survive as much as you can! Survive the Orcs is an Action fantasy game with Roguelike elements. Create the ultimate build to survive the hordes. Explore the map to find extra power, unlock environmental sites & annihilate everything in your path!

name: Super League Manager
summary: Super League Manager is a football management game set in a completely fictitious game-world, with fantasy teams and players. You start off managing Folkford United, the worst team in the country, with players including Brian Evans, Nicky Moody and Bruce Roberts, and rival teams include Oldcastle, Marwick and Stoke Berry.

name: Super Frog
summary: When an army of plant-eating monsters invades the forest, only Super Frog can save the day! Run, jump and somersault from platform to platform as you rescue plants and send your enemies sailing over the treetops in enormous bubbles. Along the way, keep your eyes peeled for colorful candy bonuses and powerups to increase your energy and give you special powers. So what are you waiting for? Get off your lily pad and leap into adventure!

name: Super Kitty Boing Boing
summary:
Get ready to Boing!

S.K.B.B Is a fast paced local multiplayer extravaganza built for 2-4 players.
Control your Cube Kitty (left analog stick), boing/attack using your psychic powers (X,Y,A,B) and Nya (RB) your way to victory!

name: Super Mario 64 Plus
summary:
Super Mario 64 Plus is a standalone fork of the Super Mario 64 PC Port that focuses on customizability and aims to add features that not only fix some of the issues found in the base game but also enhance the gameplay overall with extra options.

These features include (but not limited to):
- More responsive controls
- Improved camera
- Extended moveset
- The ability to continue the level after getting a star
- Optional extra modes
- 60FPS support via interpolation
- Various bug fixes

name: Super Green Rally
summary: Super Green Rally is a modern adaptation of the 8-bit/16-bit retro racing games of the 80s and 90s. The player drives an exotic and extremely powerful electric car through different levels generated procedurally under the theme of the renewable energies and social issues.

name: Surprise Attack
summary: In this game, you attempt to collect bombs whithin the time limit while shooting at terrorists. The faster you complete the level, the better the rank you will have.

name: Suboptimal
summary: Suboptimal is a small horror Point & Click adventure game where you must escape the submarine you are commanding, one way or another...

name: Survivors Last Stand
summary: Survive waves of alien invaders. Upgrade your weapons and create insane builds. Addictive arcade roguelike action awaits you!

name: Super Move Quest
summary: A basic puzzle game similar to Move Fun.

name: Surface Rush
summary: Show your reflexes and reach the Surface! Surface Rush is an arcade, skill based game, where you must throw Pumpum and make him bounce through the ocean bottom. Keep an eye on the oxygen bar and keep moving towards the goal.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - SJP Anime Reloaded Puzzles
summary: All puzzles included in Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Anime Reloaded!

name: Surferman - A FC pixel surfing to avoid obstacles
summary:
How many meters you can surfing?
You are a pixel surfer man. Try to avoid all obstacles.
It's the 8-bit retro game for iPhones, iPads & iPods.

name: Super Scope 15
summary: A sequel for Super Scope 6 was being developed around 1993/1994, but was never announced. It became public when found in the 2020 Nintendo Gigaleak.

name: Super Robin Hood
summary:
You will need skill and quick reflexes to survive in the dangerous
castle complex. Watch out for the guards who shoot bolts at you with their
crossbows, you can duck or jump to avoid them, or even run away. If you get
hit you will lose vital HEALTH points. These start at 99 and if they fall
below 00 you are a dead man! There are tablets lying around which will
increase your HEALTH points if you can get them.

You must collect all the hearts around the castle and then go to the
East Tower to save Maid Marian. However, to make progress through the castle
you have to get the keys needed to operate the mechanical mediaeval lifts
which elevate you to different sections of the castle.

name: Super Glob
summary: Guide the insatiable Glob through corridors, up and down the elevators and through the side tunnels in his never-ending search for snacks. An assortment of crafty animals relentlessly pursue the Glob and fight him for control of the elevators. Kill them by sticking to the ceiling and dropping on them or just avoid them and munch a dozen different snacks to clear the 24 unique levels.

name: Sudoku Topology
summary: Explore classic sudoku variant rules on 3D boards ranging from cubes and spheres to dodecahedron and the Klein bottle. Experience beautiful logic of handcrafted puzzles where no guessing is required. Or design your own 3D sudoku puzzles and share them with the world!

name: Superku
summary: Inspired by classics such as Super Mario (64), Metroid and Mega Man, Superku is a hobby developer's 5-year-passion-project and a modern take on the side-scrolling platformer genre. The game features challenging jump'n'run'n'gun gameplay across 30 highly varied stages!

name: Super Army of Tentacles 3: The Search for Army of Tentacles 2 - God Makes Gnome Mistakes
summary: In the first of three quest packs, choose the fate of a displaced race of creature that threatens our worlds gardening supplies. Two new quests are included.

name: Summit
summary: A game written by Phantom Williams for the 21st Annual Interactive Fiction Competition.

name: Super Peko 35
summary: A 2D pixel shooter hololive fan game!

name: Super Dapper Man vs. Furries
summary: The Furries must go! Do u really need to know more? Most games have double jump, this one has QUINTUPLE JUMP! Use it to defeat the furries and get "killer combos" that say a funny furry diss and improve your stats until hit. Also there is like, slow motion n' stuff. WISHLIST NOW!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Russia Puzzles
summary: Puzzles about Russia!

name: Surface: The Soaring City - Collector's Edition
summary: Your brother is kidnapped during an air show. Search for him in a beautiful world where the sky is as wide as your imagination.

name: Super Fire Pro Wrestling: Queen's Special
summary:
Super Fire Pro Wrestling: Queen's Special is based on All Japan Women's Pro-Wrestling.

Every wrestler has three different variations of moves that work at different times; grappling only become available to the player after using the strongest move to weaken the opponent. Creating up to 16 customized wrestlers is a possibility; with a generous display of wardrobe options. The referee has the ability to be knocked out. He cannot do pinfalls or count out opponents who are outside the ring while unconscious. Like in actual wrestling, rope breaks can be ordered by the referee.

This game features genuine female professional wrestlers from All Japan Women's Pro-Wrestling; unlike the non-Joshi Fire Pro games which featured carbon copies with false names. Bull Nakano and Akira Hokuto can be unlocked for completing the challenge mode. While lacking in a proper story line, players can choose from a variety of gimmick matches.

name: Suchie-Pai Adventure: Doki Doki Nightmare - Saturn Tribute
Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - China Puzzles
summary: Puzzles about China!

name: Surface: Lost Tales
summary: Surface: Lost Tales is the 9th game of the Surface series in Elephant Games.

name: Survival: Last Day
summary: The game of survival genre in the open world.

name: Super Mahjong 3
summary: Super Mahjong 3 is a Miscellaneous game, published by I'Max, which was released in Japan in 1994.

name: Supracore
summary: Supracore is a roguelike base building game. Build your base, upgrade it and defend against ongoing waves of enemies to gather more resource and expand your Core!

name: Super Vanilla World
summary: A ROM hack of Super Mario World, featuring 20 Levels. 17 Normal Vanilla Level's and 3 P-Switches which are puzzle oriented.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Vegetables
summary: Puzzles of vegetables!

name: Super Mario Bros. 5: Reborn
summary: After saving Peach and beating Bowser on the Starlight Islands, the Mario Bros, Yoshi, and Peach decide to take a vacation in the Kola Kingdom, far away from Bowser and his princess-kidnapping antics. During their vacation, they discover that Bowser has apparently taken over the Mushroom Kingdom. He’s even sent the Koopalings to steal the Star Keys that keep the warp between the Kola and Mushroom Kingdoms open. Can the Mario Bros. recover the Star Keys to re-open the warp and save their homeland?

name: Summer Rush
summary: In this classic Time Management game you have to manage a beautiful beach resort and make good business in the summer rush!

name: Sunshine
summary: If you want to have a good time playing a rpg of psychological horror and mystery setting in a boarding school and starring a student, you must play "Sunshine RPG"

name: Superfight: The Orange Deck 2
summary: Orange Deck 2 boldly goes where no Orange deck has gone before. With over 90 new cards from your favorite nerdy books, movies, comics, and TV shows, your deck will be shiny and chrome all the way to Valhalla.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Food
summary: Puzzles of Food!

name: Super Pocket Tennis
summary:
Tennis for everybody, everywhere!
Create your own tennis superstar and shot, lob, smash and volley your way to the top!
20 unique characters for you to choose from, all with different styles of play! Select different Courts, including Clay, Lawn, Hard and Carpet.

name: Super Birdie Rush
summary: Super Birdie Rush is a Sports game, developed and published by Data East, which was released in Japan in 1992.

name: Supreme God Revelations
summary: Supreme God Revelation is a fantasy action RPG which features card-based combat (with 4v4 battles and boss fights) and exploration. There are multiple classes to unlock (200 roles divided between five types of heroes that excel at different aspects), missions to complete, and endings to obtain.

name: Super Chinese Fighter EX
summary:
Super Chinese Fighter EX is a fighting video game for the Game Boy Color released by Culture Brain in 1999. It is part of the Super Chinese series and is the final Fighter game in the series.

Unlike most of the Super Chinese games, Fighter EX is not an action game or role-playing video game. The game features several characters from the Super Chinese series, including the main characters, Jack and Ryu.

name: Super Markup Man
summary: Super Markup Man is the ultimate fun way to practice web development and learn the basics of HTML and CSS. No coding skills needed!

name: Super Fun Soccer
summary: 6 player local multiplayer soccer game

name: Subtype Grounds
summary: Subtype Grounds is a multiplayer simulation game where you can choose to play the role of a fugitive, military or a K-9 unit. As a fugitive, stay alive and complete your primary goal. As military, team up with K-9 units to track fugitives down.

name: Super Star Shooter 16
summary: Super Star Shooter 16 is a psychedelic retro inspired on-rails shooter.

name: Submachine: Future Loop Foundation
summary:
In Submachine FLF (Future Loop Foundation) you find yourself locked in a padded room with only an ancient tape player at your feet. From this strange beginning unfolds an amazing mystery that you can solve in a world where memories are the key to the past, present, and future!

Who are you, and why can't you remember how you got here? Who is the Future Loop Foundation? What do they want, and why are they holding you prisoner? Play Submachine FLF and solve the riddle for yourself!

name: Survived
summary: First Person Shooter tower defensive strategy game, gather materials, build, and see how long you can survive!

name: Super Mario and the Cursed Castles
summary: Super Mario and the Cursed Castles is a major ROM hack created by Foxen, having 121 Stars (as of v1.01) to collect spread over 15 courses and a few extra levels. It is notable for two reasons: The lack of any true "secret" levels (all Stars are located in levels that are easy to find), and the sheer size of the game's levels.

name: Super Mario 64: All Star Adventure Extreme Edition
summary: All Star Adventure Extreme Edition is an extreme hack made for a blind race at Summer SM64 ROM Hack Marathon 2020.

name: Subterror
summary: At the bottom of the ocean floor lie The Biospheres. These weather-controlled domes once supported vast arrays of lifeforms, but have since been abandoned. Explore arid deserts, dark forests, and frozen tundras. But don't stay too late, as you are not alone out in the great abyss.

name: Super Luigi Bros.
summary: This is a simple hack of Super Mario Bros. that replaces Mario with Luigi. Includes Luigi’s physics from the Japanese SMB2 (aka The Lost Levels).

name: Super Mario Bros. 3 Game Watch
summary: Super Mario Bros. 3, also known as Super Mario 3 (on the bezel) and Super Mario III (in the instruction leaflet) is a watch containing a simplified game based off of Super Mario Bros. 3. It is the second of four Nelsonic Game Watch games based on the Mario franchise. The game watch was released by Nelsonic and licensed by Nintendo in 1990. In Europe, the game watch was rereleased by Zeon in 1992, alongside The Legend of Zelda and Tetris.

name: Super Sec Soccer
summary: Soccer without the BS!

name: Super Slime Seriously Sticky Sassy Scripted Survival Simulator
summary:
Get a closer look into the daily hazards of a common slime during their life (and death). Adapt. Survive. EVOLVE. Not just your character, but your mind as you come to figure out the ins and outs of this cute little puzzlish- simulator. Die, repeat and learn from your mistakes!

A gamejam game created by Riazey for the Go Godot Jam 3!

name: Succulents
summary: An abandoned garden growing strange plants.

name: Sun Haven: Mushy Pack
summary: This Mushy Pack includes a Mushroom Furniture Set, 1 Mushroom-themed Mount, 1 Mushroom-Themed Pet, and 15 Mushroom-themed outfits.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Random Puzzles 4
summary: Puzzles of incredible random images!

name: Super Owlboy
summary: "Super Owlboy" is a side-view 2D platform game. The goal is to complete levels of varying difficulty by overcoming obstacles. Spikes, saws, flying projectiles and moving platforms are waiting to stop you on your way.

name: Super Dany
summary: A French puzzle-platformer advergame in which the player switches between Dany and friends, each with their own special ability, in order to progress through stages.

name: Surviving the Apocalypse Is More Fun When There’s Sex
summary: Embark on a perilous journey through a post-apocalyptic wasteland, where survival is paramount and moral choices shape your fate. Forge deep connections and explore the depths of desire amidst the chaos of a world on the brink of collapse.

name: Super Fists
summary: Beat up your enemies with your mighty fist and improve your power level. Enemies can do the same and in the end, only the mightiest shall be victorious and win this tournament of strength! Or something like that! :D

name: Super Lovely Planet
summary: Old-School Precision Platforming in 3D

name: Suspirium
summary: Ambient jam game inspired by the movie Suspiria

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Switzerland
summary: A downloadable content pack for Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations featuring 22 high-resolution puzzles themed around scenic landscapes and cultural imagery from Switzerland. Includes four difficulty levels and integrates seamlessly with the base game’s relaxing interface and music.

name: Surge Deluxe
summary: A new energy source provides humanity with enormous electrical power, but by-product materials build up fast, and must be constantly cleared to keep pressure levels in check. Shatter the dangerous by-products by routing electrical surges between matching blocks, and then vent pressure in huge blasts to buy you more time! Surge Deluxe puts sizzling electrical energy at your fingertips!

name: Sudoku Slam
summary: A free web Sudoku site unlike any other. Use smart hints to teach you new moves, save/share puzzles, undo screw-ups, print to PDF, enter your own puzzle, and download puzzles to play offline. Designed by AJ Shankar and Bill McCloskey.

name: Supercup Online
summary: Online Football Game

name: Super Mando
summary: Platform game in pixel art 2D where you can run, jump, dodge obstacles and crush enemies, a challenging retro adventure

name: Super Mario Holidays
summary: Super Mario Holidays is a fangame about Mario in a strange new world of Holidays.

name: Super Cucumber
summary: Super Cucumber is a 16-bit inspired action-adventure game filled with tight platforming, unlockable abilities and plenty of secrets to discover. Traverse more than six towers and overcome dozens of levels, fight your way past devious bosses and become the greatest Aardvark Superhero in the world!

name: Super Gerry
summary: Laxity Media presents a wonderful Jump 'n Run game. You must help Gerry to find the exit portal of the music wonderland. Don't lose the violin or you will not be able to return. Collect all the note bubbles. Don't fall into the rift. Be aware of the Groupies ! GO GO GO !!!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Illustrations 2
summary: Puzzles of beautiful Illustrations!

name: Super Crown Land
summary: The Ultimate Anime Crossover

name: Supercar Street Challenge
summary: Climb in, get behind the wheel and buckle up for the ride of your life! Street Lethal is no ordinary racing game. Rampage through the streets of spectacular interactive city envrionments such as London and Paris. Hold on tight as you drive the hottest modern concept cars. If you've ever dreamed about driving high-class speedsters like the Callaway C12, the Pagani Zonda C12-S, and the Fiorvanti F100, you're in luck. Travel through the streets of the world's most prominent cities in a race of the ultimate driving machines. You'll hit speeds above 200 miles per hour as you dodge through street fairs, back alleys, and more in an attempt to win. Experience the power of driving these previously inaccessible vehicles, enjoying 3D graphics and an awesome soundtrack all the while.

name: Survive Zombies.exe
summary: zombie arcade shooter is what this game is for the most part about. with a lot of action and many weapons. beat your way through sewer tunnels, alley streets, apartments, subways and factory area.

name: Sunnyside vs. the Eggies
summary:
Sunnyside is a farmer who lives in Monkey World. One day he goes outside to pick from
his banana trees only to be levitated up from the ground and abducted by egg aliens.
Filled with rage and egg hatred he must make his way through floor after floor of the
mothership. Blasting egg aliens and spilling their yolk all over the walls in this endless

name: Super Sonic in Sonic 3D
summary:
Super Sonic in Sonic 3D is a hack of Sonic 3D: Flickies' Island made by Sik. This hack allows the player to turn into Super Sonic in said game after collecting all seven Chaos Emeralds, mimicking its prequels Sonic 2, Sonic 3 and Sonic & Knuckles. The rules are borrowed from the latter two games, so the player must double jump to transform and also must not have a shield in that moment, besides the basic requirements (having all emeralds and 50 rings).

All of Super Sonic's behaviour is implemented: a custom palette, a transformation pose with a fading palette, invincibility (with stars), speed shoes and a music change upon transformation. Rings drain while transformed as well. Super Sonic can still be killed by getting crushed by some falling platforms, however, so he isn't completely immune to death.

This hack is based off Sonic 3D: No Flickies, and as such it shares the same gameplay rules.

Finally, Puzzle Mode puts gamers' brains to the test as they try and solve a series of elaborate, block-collapsing puzzles. Developed by GameHouse Studios.

name: Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers
Super Street Fighter II Turbo
summary:
Super Street Fighter II Turbo, released in Japan as Super Street Fighter II X: Grand Master Challenge, is a competitive fighting game released for the arcades by Capcom in 1994. It is the fifth installment in the Street Fighter II sub-series of Street Fighter games, following Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers. Like its predecessor, it ran on the CP System II hardware.

Super Turbo introduced several new gameplay mechanics not present in previous versions of Street Fighter II, including the addition of Super Combos and air combos. It also introduced the secret character Akuma, who would go on to become a recurring character in later Street Fighter installments and other Capcom fighting games.

Super Turbo was originally ported to the 3DO Interactive Multiplayer, followed by the PlayStation and Sega Saturn (under the title of Super Street Fighter II Turbo: The Ultimate Championship) as part of the Street Fighter Collection, and for the Dreamcast in Japan under the title of Super Street Fighter II X for Matching Service. A remake of the game was released for the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 titled Super Street Fighter II Turbo HD Remix.

name: Surviving Mars: First Colony Edition
summary:
Welcome Home! The time has come to stake your claim on the Red Planet and build the first functioning human colonies on Mars! All you need are supplies, oxygen, decades of training, experience with sandstorms, and a can-do attitude to discover the purpose of those weird black cubes that appeared out of nowhere. With a bit of sprucing up, this place is going to be awesome!

Surviving Mars is a sci-fi city builder all about colonizing Mars and surviving the process. Choose a space agency for resources and financial support before determining a location for your colony. Build domes and infrastructure, research new possibilities and utilize drones to unlock more elaborate ways to shape and expand your settlement. Cultivate your own food, mine minerals or just relax by the bar after a hard day’s work. Most important of all, though, is keeping your colonists alive. Not an easy task on a strange new planet.

There will be challenges to overcome. Execute your strategy and improve your colony’s chances of survival while unlocking the mysteries of this alien world. Are you ready? Mars is waiting for you.

The First Colony Edition of Surviving Mars provides ambitious colonists with a variety of new ways to customize their new homes and domes. Included with this edition are is the Season Pass, which will add two full expansions and two content packs to Surviving Mars in the months following launch.

In addition, this edition includes new in-game features at launch:

The “Metropolis” Building Set: Add some chrome to your dome with a shiny new visual upgrade to your infrastructure, providing you with chromatic skins for Oxygen Tanks, Water Towers, Fuel Refineries, and more.

Radio Station: An additional in-game radio station, with new music and chatter, comes exclusively with this Edition.

New Housing Styles: Three alternative skins for residential housing structures allow you to add different flair and design to your colonies.

name: Summer Beach Vacation Objects - Hidden Object Time
Surgeon Simulator: Experience Reality
summary:
Forget everything you know about backstreet surgery. The moment you have been waiting for your whole life is here! Surgeon Simulator: Experience Reality is taking the ER to VR, where you can perform all of Bob’s favourite procedures with your OWN TWO HANDS in brand new surgery environments designed from the ground up for VR!

If you’ve ever actually wanted to know what it feels like to delicately remove teeth from a patient using nothing but a subtle claw hammer, or perform a touch of eye surgery in Zero-G, now is your chance (without all the added hassle of flashing blue lights, plane tickets, rushed flights and Interpol). Featuring all of the surgeries and twisted humour of the original favourite, this is one surgical experience you will never want to forget!

Be transported into some of the most unlikely and possibly unsanitary surgeries possible with a totally new control system – you can no longer blame the keyboard or gamepad this time – this is on YOU, Dr Burke.

Remember, no matter what happens and how things work out – Bob loves you!

name: Survive Now

summary: Superior Crack Relatives is a meme, couch-based multiplayer fighting game. Choose from a variety of balls and battle it out with up to 4 players in online multiplayer. Enjoy a variety of maps and characters, as you battle it out to be the ultimate champion.

name: Summer Olympix
summary: There are 8 different events to compete in. Some are really easy if you fast on the buttons, like Swimming and 100 meter sprint. But others like Long jump, Javelin and Archery needs more technique then hammering on the buttons.

name: Super Strike Beach Volleyball
summary: Train your character to become the best in Campaign Mode.

name: Super!! Card collect
summary: You are playing a casual game “I want to spin more gachas!” “I achieved something more by collecting more things!” Have you ever wondered...? Super!! Card Collect is a simple game that focuses on collecting cards by opening packs of cards like a trading card game!

name: Super Cloud Fight
summary: Super Cloud Fight elevates aerial combat to new heights! Engage in thrilling dogfights, unleash epic maneuvers from your biplane in a sky-bound battleground. Dive into clouds for cover, seize power-ups, and dominate the skies to become the ultimate airborne champion!

name: Super Loop Drive
summary:
The most addicting crash game is here! 
 
Play tracks with easy and hard difficulty options, unique environments and iconic cars from the '70s! 
 
Adjust your speed as you accelerate and brake at the right moments to avoid crashing into another vehicle. 
 
Earn more coins with every loop, unlock cars, expand your collection and see what suits you best.

name: Subway Surfers Tag
summary: Join the Crew across multiple off-limit, interactive city locations. Skate over the retired trains in the railyard, play in the park after dark, pick up some power-ups at the cargo docks or investigate the mysterious underground. But watch out! Guard is not about to put up with these shenanigans and is hot on your heels - and this time, he’s brought reinforcements!

name: Surveillance Simulator
summary: Using surveillance equipment to complete a series of tasks, or lighting up a cigarette and gazing at the real-time footage from various cameras on the screen.

name: Sushi Factory
summary:
Enjoy this super cute sushi puzzle!
Put sushi on a plate to serve your guests and earn money!
Solve puzzles to collect sushi recipes and upgrade to the beautiful interior!

name: Super Kenney
summary: A relaxed and enjoyable platform jumping puzzle adventure game, come and complete the adventure with Kenney! ! !

name: Super Panic Monsters
summary: An anime style action game similar to Lode Runner.

name: Super Vecter Elite Turbo
summary: You're the pilot in a scouting ship sent ahead of the mothership to ensure the area is clean and safe for its passage. You have to hunt down, at insane high speeds, all the enemies that might get in your way and clear a path for the home that's racing behind you.

name: SuperBeam
summary: Super Beam is a fascinating VR rhythm game which has variety of methods to be with fantastic music. When targets are coming to you, you can slash them out and you will feel fantastic VR experence. You can feel like dancing while slashing targets listening to music!!

name: Sushi Battle Rambunctiously
summary: "Sushi Battle Rambunctiously" is a comical physics-based action battle royale party game where appetizing sushi, created by combining various types of 'shari' and 'tane', engages in fierce combat alongside zombified sushi to survive until the end.

name: Super Real Mahjong vs.
summary: A mahjong game for the Aleck 64 arcade system. The arcade unit consisted of a row of lettered buttons that corresponded to mahjong tiles. This a 2-player variant of mahjong.

name: Super Destroyer
summary: Super Destroyer is Konami's third ever video game. Like its first two games, Blockade and Destroyer, it is a clone of Atari's Breakout, which had become a phenomenom in Japan at the time.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Chile
summary: Puzzles of Chile!

name: Sumomomo Momomo ~Shijou Saikyou no Yome~ Keishou Shimasho!? Koi no Hanamuko Soudatsusen!!
summary: A Visual Novel based on the Sumomomo Momomo ~Shijou Saikyou no Yome~ manga and anime series. The game was developed by Marvelous Interactive.

name: Susan Taxpayer
summary: Susan Taxpayer is a free 2D platformer made in the SMBX2 engine, meant to imitate the likes of the later Wario Land games, with music by the Super Lesbian Animal RPG Composer, Beatrix Quinn! Follow Susan and her coworker Franky as she powers through the worst workday ever. Help her platform through a myriad of office-themed levels, from orientation videos to mailrooms to forests made of printer paper!

name: Sudden Death Soccer
summary: Pit pirates against aliens in a different take on a classic game of soccer--a match to the death. Battle head to head against the opposing team to score a goal on the enemy, sending them flying with an explosion. But, watch the timer. If neither team scores prepare to blast off. Get ready for loads of fun with a new twist on an old game.

name: Suichara: Sweets Chara Mode - Sweets Gakkou he Youkoso!
Sunu Ikkibu: Din Nahu
summary:
Travels alongside Serena to Martin Garcia Island, to discover what happened to his disappeared inhabitants, including her mother. Discover the mystery surrounding the island by translating texts in Sumerian scattered throughout the place. Solve difficult Puzzles and fight puzzles with "They".

Experience horror in the purest Survival Horror Classic style. The scenarios are based on the real island, completely 3D. And enjoy the 1st / 3rd person mode, where there will be times when the game's camera is changed for greater immersion.

name: Suffering
summary: Suffering is a very difficult turn-based RPG with a unique system. The main character is an ordinary human that accidentally fell into the Room of Suffering, and players won't be able to return to the mortal realm unless they defeat every Sinner in the Room of Suffering.

name: Super Starfish
summary:
Take control of a fish from intergalactic space and swim through the swirling cosmos. Bring your space aquarium to life by avoiding meteors, black holes, quasars and other obstacles in your path.
Super Starfish offers visual effects never before seen in a mobile application thanks to cutting-edge technology. Travel the galaxy with your galactic fish and admire the sublime waves of swirling colors.
Collect exotic plants and create your own space aquarium. Watch your space plants grow as you create a habitat for your amazing collection of galactic fish.

name: Survive In Russia
summary: Survive in Russia is a survival quest in Russia. You will be available a selection of characters. Each of them presents survival mode and story mode. Only on your choice will depend on the life of the character.

name: Super Nothing World
summary:
The gameplay is fun and simple, but varied.

There are 3 worlds: standard, platforming, and kaizo. Players can choose which worlds they want to play. Also there are optional secret levels: cape, water, motor skills, and more. These levels don't unlock more levels, and they aren't necessary to see the credits. Also, there are many fast strats built into the levels to reward continued play.

name: Sunburnt
summary: Sunburnt is a short, arcade-style game following a rather unfortunate fellow, seeking shelter from the sun in a desert oasis. How long will you survive?

name: Super Ball Arena
summary: Multiplayer ‘couch game’ that can be played up to 4 players. The primary purpose is to defeat others by hitting a ball so that it collides with the target, inflicting damage in the process.

name: Suzuki TT Superbikes Real Road Racing Championship
summary: Suzuki TT Superbikes Real Road Racing Championship is a motorcycle racing game that is a sequel to Suzuki TT Superbikes Real Road Racing.

name: Survival Crisis Z
summary: The game takes place in a city during the wake of a zombie apocalypse. Players assume the role of a survivor, and are given free rein in how they deal with the hostile world.

name: Super Bot
summary: Take part in the adventures of "Super Bot", an action adventure game from a third person perspective. The main character is a cute robot, which, due to the domination of the industrial planet by nasty bugs, sets out to fight to regain energy and save his friends.

name: Sub-Optimal
summary: Online Multiplayer - Grab some friends to pilot a submarine and defeat the Kraken!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Bugs Puzzles
summary: Puzzles about bugs!

name: Super Luigi Trick or Treat
summary: A Halloween themed mod of New Super Mario Bros U with Luigi in the spotlight.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - SJP Space Puzzles
summary: All puzzles included in Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Space!

name: Super Mixtape
summary: Super Mixtape is a retro physics based rhythm-puzzle-platformer where you guide cassette tape ‘Mix’ across a fully reversible 2D world of A-Sides and B-Sides, completing puzzles as you progress to find the perfect beat.

name: Submarine Samurai
summary: Shred submarines with your battleship using explosives and powerups

name: Summer: Life in the Countryside
summary:
A simulation game about reuniting with your childhood friend,
and spending your summer vacation having her.

She doesn't talk much, but she's full of curiosity.
Let's spend a special summer with her in the countryside.

name: Super Samtong
summary: Developed at Mirinae Software before the split with Sailon Soft, but released afterwards under the Sailon label, this game is introduced at the Sailon Soft profile.

name: Super Bread Box
summary: Super Bread Box is an official demake of Super Crate Box for the Commodore 64, created for the 2012 RGCD 16k competion, later expanded and released on cartridge and as a digital download

name: Successfully Learning Mathematics: Year 3
summary: In Successfully Learning: Mathematics, Year 3, your task is to complete a range of exercises which will help you to learn maths in a playful way.

name: Super Gigadroid
summary: A metroidvania action adventure game that will challenge your platformer skills!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Paintings 2
summary: Puzzles of famous paintings!

name: Super Robot Taisen Neo
summary: Super Robot Taisen NEO is a Super Robot Wars video game that was released on the Nintendo Wii console on 29 October 2009. Neo was developed by Banpresto and published in Japan by Namcot Bandai Games.

name: Suicide Voyage
summary: Side-Scrolling shooter for the C64

name: Superstar Racing
summary: Superstar Racing is a popular arcade-style MMO racing game. Superstar Racing Features – Invite other players and create your own Racing Team! – Create your own personal driver and take it to the track. – Race with players around the world and become your own racing superstar!

name: Sushi Surf: Endless Run Fun
summary: Surf, fish and make sushi! New fantastic endless-runner fun. Help Kirashi and Miyu surf amazing sea and under-water landscapes. While you surf, catch unusual fish and complete missions for Grandma Hinata to prepare the most delicious sushi. Collect coins on sunken pirate ships and under-water volcanoes. Watch out for dangerous fish and the rocky sea!

name: Sushi Cat 2: The Great Purrade
summary: After losing his wife at a parade, help Sushi Cat find her again - by eating sushi!

name: Super Slime Rush
summary: In Slime Rush you will have to complete levels as fast as you can while testing your skills. Move and Jump as you try to reach the end of the stage before slime gets you, or you run out of time!

name: Super Momotarou Dentetsu III
summary: Super Momotaro Dentetsu III was the first (and only) game in the series to be released on a Sega console: it saw a Sega Game Gear port in 1995. It's the fourth game in Hudson's Momotaro Dentetsu series of train simulation board games. It plays similarly to Itadaki Street or Monopoly in that the player has to accrue wealth by purchasing properties and making other business deals that are often dependent on the square they end their turn on. The Momotaro Dentetsu model received a multitude of small tweaks and additions in this fourth entry but otherwise plays identically to its predecessors.

name: Surrogate
summary: dead pet purgatory

name: Super Chinese 3
summary:
Super Chinese 3 is a Role-Playing game, published by Culture Brain, which was released in Japan in 1991.

Final Famicom game in the series.

name: Supermotor
summary: Supermotor is a racing game for the Timetop GameKing.

name: S.U.B.
summary: Navigate through the dark, deep seas with your best friend to infiltrate the Evil Doctor's Secret Underwater Base  in this two-person local couch co-op game! Will you be able to outrun the dreadful laser-robot-sharks long enough to foil the Evil Doctor's plans?

name: Super Bub Contest
summary:
Super Bub is a Net Yaroze game created by Alex Herbert that was featured on the Euro Demo 43, French Euro Demo 29 and the Euro Demo 04/99 demo discs that were distributed with the official PlayStation Official Magazine.

It is a Puzzle Bobble-like game where colored bubbles are shot towards the ceiling. If you then shoot fireballs in a matching color at them they will break.

name: Summer Meetings
summary: We meet many people in our lives. Relationships with them are different and can be changed.

name: Supreme Courtship
summary: Supreme Courtship: Comedy, Adventure, JUSTICE! Order in the Court! This comedy visual novel puts YOU on the Supreme Court! Befriend the Justices, argue cases, and solve a mystery!

name: Super Karts
summary: Super Karts is a go-kart racing game for Wii. It was only released in Europe.

name: Supermarket Tycoon
summary: Ready to be a millionaire? broke? robbed? or finally receive the sweet release of death? Well Supermarket Tycoon is the game for you! Build up and manage your own super market and much much more!

name: Super Kyousouba: Kaze no Silpheed
summary: Super Kyousouba: Kaze no Silpheed is a Sports game, published by King Records, which was released in Japan in 1993.

name: Superfly Santa Claus
summary: With his sleigh in the shop, Santa Claus must swing across rooftops with a magic rope

name: Succubus With Guns: Campaign "Winding Path"
summary: New campaign consisting of 5 lengthy missions. Even more enemies and more epic battles!

name: Subscribe & Punch!
summary: Subscribe & Punch! is an easy to play versus fighting game based on the wacky YouTubers universe. Roast the face of your opponents and experiment various humorous interactions inside with YouFight: the virtual platform hosting the craziest fights!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Airplanes Puzzles
summary: Puzzles of spectacular airplanes!

name: Sushi'd
summary: Brisbane, Australia based CloudBNE produced Sushi'd, which is an infinite jumper set in Japanese landscape.

name: Survivals: Battle Royale
summary: SURVIVORS: Battle Royale is a last-man-standing third person shooter game. Players are taken as prisoners and thrown to an abandoned island. Players must fight with whaterever they can find on the island. Whoever survivals to be the last lone survior wins the game.

name: Sudoku the Puzzle Game Collection
summary:
* Put yourself to the test and tackle Japanese puzzles as you’ve never seen them before in Sudoku – The Puzzle Game Collection for Nintendo 3DS.
* Tackle 600 puzzles that include Sudoku and other Japanese favourites Shikaku, Hashi and Akari.
* Unlock hints by using the Play Coins you acquire whilst walking around with your Nintendo 3DS in Sleep Mode.
* Watch puzzles come to life in a new way thanks to the unique graphical capabilities of the Nintendo 3DS system.

name: Survival & Horror: Hangman's Rope
summary: Are you ready to uncover the secret of the cursed town? Immerse yourself in the ambiance of the Wild West and its mysterious events, and discover the truth about what lurks on the grim streets of this town.

name: Sunset Overdrive: Mystery of the Mooil Rig
summary: When a distress signal cries out from a Mooil Oil rig off the shores of Sunset City, Bryllcream emphatically asks for your help investigating. You swim right smack in the middle of a violent turf war between disgruntled and well-armed rig workers. Plus, you have mutants of the aquatic flair on your plate, too. But, you can handle it and set things straight. And if you can’t – well – there’s no use crying over spilt oil. Go forth!

name: Sudoku
summary: This popular logic puzzle is a numbers game, minus the math.

name: Super Mario Bros. 64
summary: Super Mario Bros. 64 is a ROM hack/mod of Super Mario 64 that recreates the whole Super Mario Bros. (NES/Famicom) game to the Super Mario 64 engine, plus adding new playable characters (Mario, Luigi, Waluigi and Wario are playable).

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Beaches Puzzles
summary: Puzzles of beautiful beaches!

name: Summer Numbers
summary: Challenging and fun puzzle game with beautiful hand-drawn anime illustrations.

name: SUS
summary: SUS : Survivors Under Space is 80s arcade inspired rougelite space shooter. Defend yourself from endless enemies. Select your weapons carefully and grab items to manipulate time and space, blow up the asteroids, and shoot down the enemies. Leave no survivors.

name: Sumairu Cubic! -Suiheisen made Nan Mile? After & Another Stories-
summary: A fandisc for the visual novel Suiheisen made Nan Mile? - Deep Blue Sky & Pure White Wings - developed by Abhar.

name: Super Chains
summary: Experience the all-new challenges designed to perplex, delight and unwind the mind. Super Chains combines a variety of puzzles that everybody can enjoy.

name: Super Locomotive
summary: A port of the Arcade game, made exclusively for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive Mini 2.

name: Sudoku Fever
summary: Sudoku is the puzzle phenomenon from Japan, a game that looks like a math problem, but is in fact a twisting puzzler. The rules are simple: start with a grid consisting of nine three-by-three squares in which some of the numbers are already supplied. Fill in the blank squares so that each column, row, and three-by-three grid contains a number from 1 to 9 with none repeated.

name: Sunny Smiles
summary: Sunny smile, is cheerful, charming, modest and sweet, but cunning foes do not give him rest. Again and again you have to pacify villains, saving from the conclusion of nice birds. You are waited by the sea of adventures and good mood.

name: Sun-Rise.exe
summary: Adventure through bizarre and intricately made levels in this 2D platformer game.

name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Ninten Moveset
summary: A mod which adds Ninten to Super Smash Bros. Ultimate, along with his moves from EarthBound Beginnings.

name: Supersonic HD
summary: Race on tracks created from your own music! Supersonic HD is an adrenaline-charged, music-driven 3D ride game. Blaze through radiant neon racing circuits at ever faster speeds, accompanied by electronic beats from Finnish artist collective Kitkaliitto. The ultimate challenge comes in the 30-second Blitz mode with speed boosts, time extends and other special collectibles.

name: Sushi Wildlands
summary: An open world RPG where you catch cute monsters for your farm and harvest the ingredients for your sushi shop!

name: Surviving Hunter
summary: Welcome to the thrilling adventure of Surviving Hunter, where you will embark on a perilous journey to save your homeland from the clutches of ancient rulers.

name: Super Ick
summary: A cartoony mix of peaceful fishing and chaotic bullet hell action, with dozens of fish to collect and over twenty planets to discover! Explore a densely packed galaxy filled to the brim with charming characters and alien landscapes, and work your way toward uncovering Super Ick's dark truth.

name: Survival VR
summary: “Survival VR” is a Virtual Reality zombie shooting survival game for the HTC Vive. The player has to kill waves of zombies to survive. Shot them in the head and mind your bullets. Struggle for survival!

name: Super Mario Galaxy: Nvidia Shield TV
summary: A port of Mario Galaxy 1 to the Nvidia Shield console fully translated into Mandarin, and bundled with quality of life features like HD resolution and 4k textures.

name: Sudoku-Nbp
summary: Play Sudoku on your Arduboy. Includes 45 puzzles (easy, medium, hard) and allows custom puzzles to be entered manually or via serial input. Four players or puzzles can be save and restored from non-volatile memory (EEPROM).

name: Super Block Crush
summary: Super block crash is a new Breakout game, with a sprinkle of RPG.

name: Super Pac-Man
summary: Game Boy Color port of Super Pac-Man.

name: Sunday Sundae
summary: Make a tasty ice-cream sundae!

name: Super Donkey Kong 64
summary: Super Donkey Kong 64 is a rom-hack made by Kaze Emanuar, which was released in April 2016. The hack is a re-creation of Donkey Kong 64 using the Super Mario 64 engine. It features eight levels from DK64, and several new power-ups. There is only one overworld, DK Isle, which is an island in the shape of a giant DK head.

name: Super Astrovade
summary: Super Astrovade is a shoot-em up with no shooting. A bullet hell without bullets. Evade enemies and absorb stardust to unleash a powerful supernova bomb that destroys everything around you. Evade, absorb, destroy, survive.

name: SuperPower
summary: Lead a country to glory, ruin or stable mediocrity in this "geo-political world simulator" of Earth circa 1997.

name: Super Black Bass Pocket 2
summary: Super Black Bass Pocket 2 is a Game Boy fishing game.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Random Puzzles 3
summary: Puzzles of incredible random images!

name: Super Mega Baseball 2: El Viejo Stadium
summary: Take a step back in time with the classical grandstand design and vibrant cityscape of historic El Viejo Stadium. This DLC gets you El Viejo Stadium, an additional ballpark for Super Mega Baseball 2.

name: Superstar Streetz
summary: Superstar Streetz is a multiplayer action-packed racing game. Race to success in 2 minute races, and outcompete your opponents with a range of destructive and fancy weapons across different race tracks.

name: Sukebe Beach
summary: Break all the blocks and collect the images.

name: Super Nario World
summary: Super Nario World is a hard 10 level rom hack which is centered around vanilla Super Mario World mechanics.

name: Super Space Planet Fighter
summary: Fight fast-paced boss battles against Moons, Planets, and even Stars as you travel through solar systems on a perilous mission to destroy the Core of the Universe as pirates, aliens, and cosmic horrors hunt you down while you explore the depths of the cosmos and collect unique technologies.

name: Survivor in Summer
summary: Try to keep 3 people surviving the plane crash

name: Super Toxicboy
summary: Help for this crazy green unidentifying toxicly thing for collect his coints in this 2D pixel art super colorful platformer!

name: Super City
summary: Create your own superhero and cross paths with up to 150 other heroes & villains in the ultimate shared universe! Decide where your loyalties lie and fight for control of every corner of Super City as your own unique story plays out. Inheriting the combat system from wrestling, this game supercharges the action with new powers, technology, costumes and locations!

name: Super Bounce Out
summary:
Super Bounce Out! is a single player, shareware, tile matching game

In this game the tiles are balls and they descend from the top of the screen. The player uses the mouse to swap adjacent balls to make rows of three or more, such rows disappear, the remaining balls fall down and new balls are added. Black balls if/when they appear cannot be swapped with anything. The objective is to clear a specified number of balls on each level within a time limit, as the player progresses the time limit gets shorter.

name: Super Bikkuriman
summary:
Super Bikkuriman is a fighter game from BEC (Interbec) and Tom Create, based on a popular collectible sticker franchise. Specifically, the game is based on the 44 episode 1992-93 anime adaptation with the same name, and features most of its cast of characters in the roster. The game includes two modes: a single-player elimination tournament against increasingly difficult computer opponents, and a versus mode for up to two players.

In the single-player mode, the player can only choose from two characters: Phoenix and Tiki. The two characters fight almost identically. They fight through the other six characters from the versus mode and a "clone fight" against the character they did not select. Beating the game leads to the ending and a password (A, B, L, R, X, Y, Start) that allows players to select the same character as their opponent in versus mode.

name: Super Clown 3: Revenge
summary: Sorcerer and his army has captured Stars who keep peace in world. So Super Clown is only brave hero who can defeat enemy army and evil leaders to save Stars

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Horses Puzzles
summary: Puzzles of horses!Content: 30 Puzzles in 4 levels of difficulty.

name: Sunken
summary:
Take t' th' high seas wit' yer wits about ye, 
Fight endless hoards o' scallywags all on one screen, 
sharpen yer teeth on th' blades o' yer fallen foes. 
Sunken be action an packed retro pirate game fer th' cot pvp crowd! 
Y'arrrr!

name: Survive & Craft
summary: You survive in a terrible plane crash and now you are out of civilization. Around the endless ocean, exhausting sun and hungry sharks. There is only one thing left for you - to survive at any cost.

name: Super Little Jogger
summary:
Super Little Jogger is a fusion of nerve whacking avoider and endless runner.
Looking for a casual endless runner? Super Little Jogger is perfect for you! It’s super easy to play. Stop at the right time and run within the time gap! Patience is the key!

name: Sulky Manager
summary: Discover the equestrian world through harness racing in many 3D hippodromes and challenge yourself to win trophies and position in multiplayer ranking ! Produce your foals and train your horses in your ranch.

name: Super Mario 64 3D World
summary: Super Mario 64 3D World is a ROM Hack made by Kaze Emanuar. This is a character hack that allows players to play as Mario, Luigi, Toad, Peach or Rosalina, each one with their signature abilities and gameplay from Super Mario 3D World. Unlike in Super Mario 64 DS, players can select a character in the file select screen and star select screen.

name: Super Gravitron
summary: How long can you survive? I hear it's pretty hard.

name: Super Mario Kart in Sonic Mania+
SuperDanny Powered Up
summary:
Take control of the craziest Mega Man fan alive as you take on Dr. Wily and Robot Masters from MegaMan 1 & 2 in this epic Classic series game. Get equipped with power-enhancing items, classic-character costumes, and Cross Fusions--the ability to change into the Robot Master himself and inherit both his weapon and attributes--as you overcome up to 20 levels in various difficulty modes and conquer the 18 Challenges.

SuperDanny Powered Up is a loving fan tribute to Classic Mega Man that delivers content from the original NES games remixed in cool and unique ways, backed by a rock-solid engine widely praised for its precise accuracy with Capcom's.

name: Super Mario: The End of the Stars
Suburban Commando
summary: A 1993 computer game based on the Hulk Hogan-headlined film of the same name.

name: Super Goribei
summary: Super Goribei is a retro style platformer with a small comic-book like story. All original pixel art made by the Dev. Tyler Kingsbury self proclaimed Artist and is bracking in to the gaming scene with this Mario copy. It's some what hard but you'll have so much fun getting to the goal.

name: Sugoi Girls: Mighty Mecha
summary: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Super Smash Bros. for Nintendo 3DS: Cloud
summary: Cloud from Final Fantasy Vll joins the brawl coming with the iconic Midgar stage and 2 music tracks.

name: Super Fishbird
summary:
Get ready to fly high and do crazy tricks with Super Fishbird! Take control of bird and keep your fishy friend out of water for as long as possible.
It's not just about knocking around a fish though - it's about doing it with style! Pull off flips, tail stalls, fin shakes, faceplants and other acrobatic maneuvers to earn points. Then, compare your best scores with friends and others around the world!
If you want to get fancy, you can unlock Fancy Mode, which gives your fish a fancy hat, and lets you do even more cool tricks like 'The Gentleman'!
So what are you waiting for? Join the feathered frenzy and play Super Fishbird today! You'll be hooked in no time.

name: Super Vili
summary: Help minister of health destroy deadly virus!

name: Successfully Learning Mathematics: Year 2
summary: Take on exciting maths problems with the little vampire Freddy in Successfully Learning: Mathematics, Year 2.

name: Super Kiwi 64: Doomsday
summary: An update to Super Kiwi 64 adding in a new campaign, cutscenes/voice acting, save files, and time trials.

name: Sumtune
summary: Sumtune is an application that can mix the input voice with chosen audio sources and play it out in different applications, so your friends can hear it in real-time.

name: Superman Batman: Heroes United
summary: Team up with two of the world's greatest heroes to fight evil in Superman & Batman: Heroes United. Play as Superman and Batman as you battle through the DC Universe to save the planet from complete annihilation. Choose to play as the Man of Steel to counter opponents with flight, superstrength and heat vision. Select the Dark Knight to stun adversaries with gadgets and martial arts.

name: Sunrise Tragedy
summary: Traverse an old, abandoned cathedral filled with grotesque monsters and bloodthirsty vampires. Overcome relentless enemies and heart-pounding boss fights with your choice of weapons, costumes, and spells in this macabre 2D Action-RPG.

name: Super Mahjong 3: Karakuchi
summary: A mahjong game for the Super Famicom and the third in the Super Mahjong series from I'Max.

name: Sudoku
summary: A sudoku game for the Game Wave.

name: Successfully Learning German: Year 2
summary: Learn German from Freddy the vampire!

name: Subterra
summary: An epic 10 hour adventure in the underworld of Subterra.  Earth is but a memory and the mighty Devordor casts a shadow of evil over all that remains.  Can you reclaim your home?  Can you escape Subterra?

name: Supermarket Simulation Grocery Empire 3D
summary: Get ready to step into the shoes of a supermarket manager !

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - New Zealand
summary: Puzzles about New Zealand!

name: Survival Shot
summary: Survival Shot designed for VR, Zombie apocalypse set for lone survivors. Uncover a sinister plan that takes survivors through Bridge/Town survival & Zombie Run. Be ready to cast undead into hell. Armed weapons with real-life movements to explore a post apocalyptic world in VR.

name: Super Mario Bros. 5
summary: Super Mario Bros. 5 is a fan game and is suppose to be a fan made sequel to the original quadology. The Game is inspired by the old Classic Mario Games (SMB3 and SMBW mainly).

name: Sugoi RPG?: Kouhen
summary: Sugoi RPG?: Kouhen is a game made with RPG Tsukuuru Super Dante and released for the Satellaview as a stand-alone game. It is the second in the Sugoi RPG? series.

name: Super Mario Construct
summary: Super Mario Construct is a browser-based Mario level editor focusing on ease of use and advanced editing tools at the same time.

name: Super Snowmobile Rally
summary: Super Snowmobile Rally is a crossover Cartoon Network game, with The Grim Adventures of Billy & Mandy characters featured on it.

name: Super Maruo
summary: Super Maruo is an unlicensed game released in Japan in 1986. Although very rare, this game is the first unlicensed Famicom game and the first unlicensed adult Famicom game as well. Despite the name, it has no relation to Mario at all.

name: Survivor: Stay in the Light
summary: Stay in the light, hunt the dark. Create your own hero through the four dimensions of role, skill, talent, and blessing outside the battle. In the battle, choose the most suitable equipment and weapons strategically to improve your strength and continue to fight.

name: Subject: Relictus
summary: Fight bosses and enemies to collect items and survive on the increasingly hostile planet

name: Sultan's Maze
summary: A first-person maze game where players attempt to collect jewels while evading a ghost.

name: Super Mario Storm 2
summary: Welcome to Talon Crossing, a world filled with guys even weirder than Mario's "normal" friends! The sequel to the original Super Mario Storm I, this time Mario faces 8 chapters filled with MFGG members, minigames, and make-what-you-will-with-it plot lines.

name: Super Mario Wonderland 1987
summary: Super Mario Bros. Wonderland 1987 (also known as Wonderland 87), is a fan game that portrays Super Mario Bros. Wonder in a different way. It's as if the game was released around 1987 after SMB Lost Levels and before Super Mario Bros. 3. The story is completely different from the original game.

name: Super Stacker
summary: Carefully stack the shapes in this fun physics puzzle game!

name: Successfully Learning English: Year 4
summary: In Successfully Learning: English Year 4, your task is to complete a range of exciting exercises which will help you to learn English in a playful way.

name: Super Botte & Bamba II Turbo
summary: Super Botte & Bamba II Turbo is a MUGEN based fighting game created by Giochi Penosi, a team known for creating controversial games. The game uses average Italian humor and features various characters from TV shows and politics.

name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Special Edition
summary: With the Super Smash Bros. Ultimate Special Edition, you will receive a Super Smash Bros. Ultimate game in a steel case and a Super Smash Bros. Ultimate Edition Nintendo Switch Pro Controller to take down your friends in style

name: Suddenly Meow
summary: Tim is an adventurous cat who loves to explore mysterious places and is always hungry for more. In this Match3 adventure he is lost in a dark forest full of shadows and dangers lurking under the silent trees. Help Tim escape and restore peace to the forest!

name: Sumy Shelltris: Iceblocks 2
summary: Tetris? Not! Mutant Tetris!

name: Successfully Learning English: Year 3
summary: In Successfully Learning English Year 3, pupils will solve exciting exercises to learn English in a playful way.

name: Sunset Riders
summary: The Genesis port of the Arcade Classic

name: Super Monkey Ball: Ticket Blitz
summary: Super Monkey Ball: Ticket Blitz continues the adventures of AIAI. The adorable Monkey-in-a-Ball who started the Monkey Ball franchise 10 years ago. Perfect for all ages. This Super Monkey Ball Ticket Blitz arcade machine is the must-have ticket redemption game of the year! Let your players go bananas with Super Monkey Ball Blitz!

name: SuperLite 2000: Othello
summary: Othello is a board game, published by Success, which was released in Japan in 2003.

name: Summer Night
summary: From the creator of FAITH. Run around in your backyard picking toadstools and chasing monkeys in this LCD handheld game where nothing scary happens!

name: Survival: Wicked Forest
summary:
After awakening in a forest cold and helpless, your mission is to survive. Forage the forest for crafting items, or scavenge scattered buildings to help your survivor cope with the dangers of The Wicked Forest. Beware the night, powerful lurking creatures will come until dawn.

Build up your own world by crafting shelters, buildings, water pumps, weapons or invade other worlds to steal supplies. Of all the dangers in The Dead Forest, be aware of others players. Will they be friend or foe? What will you be when you join another players world? Are they there to help you build your world or to steal your supplies and resources. Resources are fixed and will not replenish. Protect what you have.

name: Sunrider: First Arrival
summary: Sunrider: First Arrival is a visual novel strategy game.

name: Sushi Monster
summary: A math game that involves solving math problems in order to feed sushi to various monsters.

name: Sudoku Time
summary: Sudoku Time is a classic logical puzzle with combinatorics of numbers. The goal of the puzzle is to fill in the empty cells with numbers from 1 to 9 so that in each row, in each column, and in each small square (region) 3 × 3, each digit occurs only once. Each puzzle has only one solution!

name: Suds
summary: Join the Suds and protect their village from invading evil slimes. Compete to defeat the most enemies and climb the world leaderboard. With engaging gameplay, stunning graphics, and cute characters, Suds is an adventure you won't want to miss!

name: Super Sunburnt Siesta Snoozer
summary: A playdate game where you crank to control an umbrella.

name: Super Ryu World
summary: A Super Mario World kaizo rom hack.

name: Sudden Death Air Hockey
summary: Three, 90 second periods of air hockey, if tied at the end, you play Sudden Death!

name: Subway Simulator
summary: Become a subway train driver and ascend to the top of this not so ordinary career!

name: Super Contraption 3D
summary:
Super Contraption 3D is a database driven 3D physics sandbox game with powerful capabilities.
This is not for everyone! The building process can be complicated. Only people who want to tinker around in a physics sandbox should try this.
Since this is a physics simulation game it should be played on a relatively modern device, preferably plugged into power.

name: Super Blackout
summary: An indie puzzle game.

name: Super Tank War
summary: Super Tank War is an unlicensed action game developed for the Sega Mega Drive. It was developed by Gamtec, and therefore its origin is Taiwan.

name: Suspended Workshops
summary: Suspended Workshop is a VR Puzzle/Crafting game with hints of tower defense, in which you will encounter multiple different worlds where you will setup remote workshops to gather resources to protect and update the time clock and your arsenal.

name: Suguru Nature
summary: Suguru Nature is a great logic puzzle with two simple rules. The cells in each puzzle grid are divided into groups, and each group contains the numbers from 1 to N, where N is the number of cells in the group. Thus, a group containing 5 cells will contain numbers from 1 to 5. The second rule is that no two adjacent cells, including diagonal, can contain the same number.

name: Superation
summary: You are Thoridar Valkyrsson, bastard child of Thor. Fight the Aesir and earn your place among them in Superation: a boxing roguelite experience

name: Survive and Revenge
summary: Survive and Revenge is an action and survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Driven by revenge, forced to explore and loot to advance and find out what happened to you.

name: Superheroes: Power of New Horizons Legacy
summary: In a world where young people with special abilities are trained to become heroes, Kai is a boy who discovers a mysterious power after an unexpected incident.

name: Super Muscle Mario Bros
summary: A standalone game made using sprite assets from early Super Mario games. This game would be like if you crossed Dark Souls with Mario, all of the enemies are powerful and the bosses have phases to their fights.

name: Survival In Africa
summary: 'Survival In Africa' is an RPG-type survival game that survives using items and crafted items that are dropped when various monsters are defeated.

name: Sustainable Shaun
summary: Create a sustainable home for stray animals

name: Superbike GP
summary: Experience the full on thrills and spills of a high-speed Superbike competition. You will have to drive fast, play hard and watch your back. There are miles and miles of unrelenting track to cover before you can be crowned the champion as you speed through chicanes, power-slide around corners as you race for the chequered flag.

name: Super Fire Pro Wrestling III: Easy Type
summary: Released just 5 weeks after "Final Bout" and due to difficulty criticism, Human's "Easy Type" sadly removed the Wrestler Edit feature altogether but did bring the 8 legendary wrestler unlocked from the start. The timing on the grapples was far more forgiving, make the game much easier to play against the CPU. A curious update but there is a lack of the Wrestler Edit mode.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Random Puzzles 2
summary: Puzzles of incredible random images!Content: 30 Puzzles in 4 levels of difficulty.

name: Summer Road
summary: Summer Road is a new RPG based on the concept of playing RPGs more casually. It targets people who are tired of AAA RPGs and want to play in a short time, and want to immerse themselves in nostalgia.

name: Super Bash Goats
summary: Make a bloody mess by bashing your friends into rocks and be the last goat standing in this local multiplayer brawler!

name: Suddenly Meow 2
summary: In the second part of the fantastical Match3 game, Tim the cat is hungry for more adventure! Lord Devious broke free from the seal of the fairies and now his ominous shadow is threatening the peace of the forest. Help Tim use his meowtastic skills to save the fairies!

name: Super Basketball
summary: Compete against different computer-controlled teams such as Junior High School, High School, College, University, etc. After you beat a team you will move on to the next until you compete against the ultimate team

name: Super Blasting Boy
summary: Super Blasting Boy is a logical platform platformer made in the best traditions of retro games of the late 80's and 90's.

name: Suzy's Modular Run
summary: A little endless game!

name: Supersonic Fight
summary: Supersonic Fight is a modern combat flight game with authentic jet handling and cinematic, story-driven missions. Fly high-stakes battles over San Francisco where timing, precision, and decisive strikes matter, without the complexity of hardcore simulators.

name: Super Welder
summary: Super Welder is a simple and easy to play game that can play all levels with just a mouse.

name: Super Rocket Pets
summary: The Rocket Pets are blasting off through a galaxy not so far, far away. These flying fur balls are on a thrilling quest for coins. Explore the beautiful planets as you try to travel as far as possible in this action platform game. Customize your wonderful pets as you see fit, upgrade their gear and beat your previous records in Rocket Pets!

name: Surface: Alone in the Mist - Collector's Edition
summary: All the adults have vanished. Is this a child's dream, or nightmare?

name: Surgeon Simulator 2 Launch Bundle
summary: It's time to ‘scrub in' solo or jump into 4 player online games in this physics-based surgery sim with ludicrous coop and competitive play, plus an awesome builder mode. Unearth the mysteries of the Bossa Labs Medical Facility and save Bob's life. Get ready to team up for trauma!

name: Super Dungeon Master
summary: Play the top-down RPG-Maker version of Dungeon Master and battle your way through all 14 levels of this classic dungeon crawler.

name: Summon Night 6: Lost Borders - Amu Edition
Super Mario Strikers
summary: Super Mario Strikers was an online Adobe Flash game developed by Blit Interactive and published by Nintendo to promote the release of Super Mario Strikers on the Nintendo GameCube. It could be played from the official Blit Interactive website.

name: Summoner Symbols
summary: Two friends try to summon a demon to fulfill their wish. Can you solve the riddles to figure out which symbols to use? An entry for Ludum Dare #55.

name: Super Mabus Mania
summary: We play the role of mabus, a retro collector who must collect all the games that his wife has taken away from home, enter them on the computer and advance to the next level. It's a fun screen-to-screen arcade game where your goal is to collect all the ga…

name: Supreme Race on Highway
summary: Let's see how good are you. Get your favorite car and get on the road!

name: Super Swunsh World 2
summary: An intermediate shell hack with 16 exits.

name: Super Dirt Racers
summary: Drive through water and over bumps and dips. Pick up nitro boosts along the way but use them carefully to beat your rivals.

name: Super Smash Asteroids
summary: "Super Smash Asteroids" is a high-speed, twin-stick, top-down, rogue-like space shooter. Choose from 6 unique ships, upgrade with 70+ items & blast through epic bosses. Level up for intense, action-packed battles in a futuristic universe. Buckle up for a thrilling journey to glory!

name: Super Mario 64 Multiplayer
summary:
Super Mario 64 Multiplayer is a ROM hack/mod of Super Mario 64 which adds multiplayer support for the original game. It can also be added to many other mods.
It shouldn't be confused with Super Mario 64 Splitscreen Multiplayer, the former doesn't make the game splitscreen, both players share the same screen.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Abandoned Places 2
summary: Puzzles of intriguing abandoned places!

name: Super Dynamite Fishing
summary: Super Dynamite Fishing is a violent fishing game from HandyGames.

name: Super Jet Juck
summary: Super Jet Juck is a dynamic puzzle and adventure game. Join the soldiers Juck and Tom!

name: Sunrise Village: Farm Game
summary: Explore a peaceful village surrounded by nature  Help your grandfather with handling a farm  Meet friendly villagers  Dive into exciting mysteries along your way

name: Super Robot Taisen Impact
summary: Super Robot Wars Impact is the first SRW game for the Playstation 2. It is an enhanced remake of the three chapters of Compact 2 and contains over 100 stages, making it the longest SRW to date.

name: Super Bumble Trials
summary:
Fresh outside and hardcore inside bike trials

Super Bumble Trials is a new bike racing game in the trials genre with a fresh art style and elaborate physics, bright locations and hardcore gameplay.

This is an alternative take on the trials genre from developer Psebay: Gravity Moto Trials, in which you have to overcome a path consisting of levels, each of which is filled with a wide variety of obstacles. For example, on one level you can find giant plants and mushrooms, on another - big logs and boulders, and on the third - a huge pumpkin in the clouds.

There is nothing superfluous here, just you and the hardcore gameplay of the game, one on one!

Forward! A challenging but exciting adventure awaits you!

name: Super Flippin' Phones
summary: In Super Flippin' Phones, you flip phones out of people's hands to warn them about an impending disaster. Unfortunately, no one in the mall is listening to you because they're too busy with their phones. While slapping away phones you evade cops, save humanity and unlock new officers, floors and outfits!

name: Super Mario Bros: Restless Reality
summary: Many years have passed since the Mario Bros last defeated Bowser and stopped his plans for world domination. The Mushroom Kingdom enjoyed years of peace. Until one day... Bowser is up to no good again! He is invading the once peaceful kingdom, and setting up forts! What could he be planning!? Mario must travel through many different locations to find out what Bowser is up to and stop his evil plans!

name: Suncore Chronicles: The Tower - Level 1
summary: The first DLC for Suncore Chronicles: The Tower, granting access to the tower's first floor with all its dungeons, enemies and loot.

name: Superbike Masters
summary: Superbike Masters is a Racing game, published by Phoenix Games, which was released in Europe in 2003

name: Super Stickman Golf 3
summary: The award winning Super Stickman Golf series is back and better than ever! Super Stickman Golf 3 is packed full of new courses, power ups, collectable cards, game modes, multiplayer madness and a ton of new surprises for you to discover. It’s a new spin on a classic game!

name: Subject Debris
summary: Subject Debris is an indie 3D Dungeon-crawler game

name: Subsist: Apocalypse Survival
summary: Subsist is a single-player survival FPS game set in a post-apocalyptic world. The aftermath of a global apocalypse has left the world in ruins, and you have to survive into a harsh, unforgiving landscape teeming with zombies and hostile creatures.

name: Sun Haven: Ocean Shores Pack
summary: This Ocean Shores Pack includes a Mermaid Furniture Set, 1 Ocean-themed Mount, and 7 Beach themed outfits!

name: Super Clash Bros.
summary: Super Clash Bros is a fan-made crossover game with an adventure mode and battle mode. Both modes support up to 4 players. The characters are generally accurate & faithful recreations: same abilities, controls, health systems, inventories, etc. from their games. The levels in adventure mode are remakes from their games too.

name: Super Spike V'Ball/Nintendo World Cup
summary: Super Spike V'Ball/Nintendo World Cup is a bundle containing the games in the title. It was released for the Nintendo Entertainment System (NES).

name: Super Mario Epic 2: Dream Machine
summary: The sequel to Super Mario Epic, Super Mario Epic 2 has over 15 levels and features like Flippers, Hammer Brothers suit, and more!

name: Super Cubiform
summary: As a Guildship Captain you must rely on your wits and a computer repair program to survive! Super Cubiform is a sandwich of genres, Arena Action Platformer + First Person Adventure! Enjoy arena-based platforming action as the Cubiform, and an urgent mystery as the Guildship Captain...

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Landscapes 2
summary: Puzzles of Landscapes!

name: Sukutte: Save Me...
summary: Konchi (Kondo Chiyo)’s friend Mari (Abe Marisa) asks her to accompany her to a place that is as haunted. Mari refuses to go, so your friend Konchi ends up entering the place alone. Since then, Mari never hears again from Konchi, so Mari decides to go to that place to look for her friend. Once inside, Mari realizes she is not alone and that something has been killing people in the place.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Streets Puzzles
summary: Puzzles of streets!

name: Sublime Element
summary: Sublime Element is an open-ended puzzle game where you have to build and program mechanisms to mix elements and create new ones.
